column3: Flutter - Marketplace - Store Details - Gift Card tab
column4:
*AC:*

On Store details screen, I can see the Gift cards tab

Tapping on this opens Gift card list screen, list of all gift cards which are approved and active from that store in the system

* Each gift card displayed here must belong to at least one Konnect Category of this active Konnect Zone
* -I can filter gift card with category by the filter icon on the Search field:-
** -On clicking the icon, show the list of categories screen.-
** -I can select/deselect one or multiple categories to filter.-
** -I can search by category name. If there are not any categories of no results when searching, show the message- *-_“No Categories Found.“_-*
** -For each selected category, it will be highlighted.-
** -I can tap the Clear button to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories will be unselected, I can select other categories and get back to the Gift card tab.-
** -Filter icon should be highlighted and colored if I am using the filter.-
** -Keep the filtering results screen when switching between tabs Nearby, Products-
* -By default, I will see the list of Gift cards from all categories (-*-All-*-).-
* I can search gift card by gift card name:
** I can search with any words, characters, or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.
** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keywords.
** Keep the searching results screen when switching between Nearby, Online, and Products.
* By default, the list of the gift cards will be sorted by create/ modified date, -the value range pricing and price(highest to lowest)-, discount percentage (high to low), if multiple gift cards have the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).
* If no gift card is available or no matched searching/filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No Gift Cards found.“_*{color}.
* For each gift card, I want to see:
** Gift card image
** The value of a gift card
** Gift card name:
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use an ellipsis if the name is too long.
* On tapping a gift card, I can see the detail screen.

column3: Flutter - Marketplace - Store Details - Products tab
column4:
*AC:*

On Store details screen, I can see the Products tab

Tapping on it opens Product list screen, these are all products of that store

* The list of products will be shown as grid view mode.
* Each product being shown here must belong to at least one konnect category
* I can search product by product name
** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.
** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keyword.
** Keep the searching results screen when switching between Home, Products and Gift card in store details
* I can filter product with product category by the filter icon on Search field:
** On clicking the icon, show the Filter Product screen.
*** In this screen, separating 2 sections:
*** Category: Tapping on this opens Select Category screen
**** I can select / deselect one or multiple categories to filter.
**** I can search by category name. In case there’s not any categories of no results when searching, show the message *_“No Categories Found.“_*
**** For each selected category, it will be highlighted.
** Filter icon should be highlighted and colored if I am using filter.
** Keep the filtering results screen when switching between tabs Home, Products and Gift card in store details
*** Sort by: I can sort product list by
**** Latest: sorting product list by latest created date
**** Price:
***** Lowest to Highest
***** Highest to Lowest
*** By default, the list of products will be sorted by discount price (low to high), if multiple products has the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).
*** For the sort buttons (Latest, Price), there must always one button checked. If user tap another button, the checked button is auto-unchecked.
** I can tap Clear button on Filter screen to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories and sort by will be unselected and reloaded, I can select other categories and get back to Products tab.
** If no products is available or no matched searching / filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No products found.“_*{color}.
* By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (*All*).
* For each product, I want to see:
** Product image
** Product name:
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.
** Product price:
*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the price is too long.
* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.
* User can scroll down to view all products

column3: [BE] - Integrate with JoyID API to detect unqualified documents
column4:
The goal is to detect unqualified documents in the image, so that it can be prevented from the beginning. Ideally, detection should happen in real time, so that the user can interactively move the camera to capture the best image possible. 

*AC:*

While submitting KYC, I want my document to be detected 

* When document has low image quality:
** For passport, display message: Poor scanned image quality. Please try again
** For ID card, Diver’s License, Residence Permit
*** When scanning the front side, display message: The front of image has poor quality. Please try again
*** When scanning the back side, display message: The back of image has poor quality. Please try again
* When the image of document is not identity document, display message: There was an error submitting your identity document. We can only accept original documents to verify your KYC. Please try again

column3: [Backend] - User loads money for Kash Kard from cryptocurrency wallet
column4:
*AC:*

* After loading successfully, the money flow of cryptocurrency directly goes to Prime Trust, meanwhile the money (no fee) will go through to user’s KK
** Prime Trust fee will be kept at Prime Trust
** Reserve account will receive Markup earn (if it’s configured on Visipay) and Crypto fee in cryptocurrency
* In case of the small amount (under $10.00), the money flow of cryptocurrency will go through to Reserve account as the current
** The UI should not change in this case
* Prime Trust fee, Markup earn, Crypto fee should be deducted from cryptocurrency wallet.

!image-20210706-083639.png|width=352,height=458!

The items should be saved on DB:

* Mark-up %
* VK fee %
* VK fixed fee
* Fee VAT %
* PT rate (include PT fee)
* Mark-up rate (Displayed rate)
* Mark-up earn
* VK Fee
* VK Fee VAT
* Total VK Fee
* Total VK earn
* You pay
* You receive

*Error handling:*

* If transaction fails due to lacking of money in PT/ unknown error occurred, display message: *_“Unable to load money. Please try again later“._* The Crypto fee and Markup earn that were transferred to Reserve Account will be returned to user immediately.
* If the user does not have enough quantity or money, display message: "*Your card does not have enough money. Please choose another card*"
column30:
Assumption:

* Input USD

Scope:

* Update API fund to KK:
*# Create quote
*# Calculate all amounts and fees
*# Charge fee for VK, make transaction on PT to transfer crypto fee amount to reserve account
*# Execute quote (if quote expired, recreate quote and execute)
*# Revert transaction on step c if the quote execution was failed
* Update API get fee
* Update transaction detail, more information;Done Testing on Staging

column3: [Backend] - User loads money for cryptocurrency wallet from Kash Kard.
column4:
*AC:*

* After loading successfully, the money flow in USD should go directly to Prime Trust, meanwhile the quantity of cryptocurrency will go through to user’s cryptocurrency wallet
** Prime Trust fee will be kept at Prime Trust
** Reserve account will receive Markup earn (if it’s configured on Visipay) and Crypto fee in USD
* In case of the small amount (under $10.00), the money flow  will go through to Reserve account as the current
** The new UI should not change in this case
* Prime Trust fee, Markup earn, Crypto fee should be deducted from KK.

!image-20210706-083618.png|width=33.33333333333333%!

The items should be saved on DB:

* Mark-up %
* VK fee %
* VK fixed fee
* Fee VAT %
* PT rate (include PT fee)
* Mark-up rate (Displayed rate)
* Mark-up earn
* VK Fee
* VK Fee VAT
* Total VK Fee
* Total VK earn
* You pay
* You receive

*Error handling:*

* If transaction fails due to lacking of money in PT/ unknown error occurred, display message: *_“Unable to load money. Please try again later“._* The Crypto fee and Markup earn that were transferred to Reserve Account will be returned to user immediately.
* If the user does not have enough quantity or money, display message: "*Your card does not have enough money. Please choose another card*"

** Name
** Email
** Phone number
** Date
** Title
** Message: display a tooltip when the text is long
* Pagination

column3: [FE] - Guest - Delivery method
column4:
*AC:*

Clicking on *“Select“* displays Select Delivery Method modal with 3 methods: Pickup, Delivery, Pay Now

* Pickup: selecting Pickup displays a modal including following things 
** Back button: clicking on this is back to Select Delivery Method modal
** Full Name
** Phone Number
** Email: This is added for guest mode
** Pickup Date
** Pickup Time
** Pickup Address: display all locations of that merchant
** *“Confirm”* button
*** When clicking on the button, we apply the same validation rules as in case of logged user
*** After clicking on this button, the modal is closed. Now, *“Select“* text link is changed into *“Pickup”*
* Delivery: selecting Delivery displays a modal including following things
** Back button: clicking on this is back to Select Delivery Method modal
** Full Name
** Phone Number
** Email: This is added for guest mode
** Shipping Address
** Receive Order Method: includes 2 radios buttons
*** Scan QR Code (displayed as default)
*** Leave At Door
** Delivery Date: display date-picker
** Delivery Time: display time milestones
** “Confirm” button
*** When clicking on the button, we apply the same validation rules as in case of logged user
*** After clicking on the button, the modal is closed. Now, “Select“ text link is changed into “Scan QR Code” or “Leave At Door“ depending on my selected Receive Order Method.
* Pay Now: selecting Pay Now displays a modal including following things: these fields are added for guest mode only
** Phone Number
** Email
** “Confirm” button
*** If the phone number is not entered, clicking on “Confirm“ button displays message “Please input phone number“
*** If the email is an invalid format, clicking on “Confirm“ button displays message “Invalid email address format.“
*** If the email is not entered, clicking on “Confirm“ button displays message “Please input email address“
*** After clicking on the button, the modal is closed. Now, “Select“ text link is changed into “Pay Now”
* If I enter Delivery or Pickup or Pay Now information then log in, after login all information is clear so that I have to select Delivery Method again

column3: [BE] Web App - Guest - Confirm & Payment
column4:
As a guest experiencing Greencom products, I should have the ability to check out based on what I have added to shopping cart.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

+*_Login form_*+

* After logging in successfully, I navigate back to shopping cart. Clicking on *“Proceed to checkout“* button navigates to Confirm & Payment screen. This works expectedly as in case of logged user

* After payment is complete
** It leads me to Complete page including Order ID displayed. There is “Great\!” button. Clicking on this works as normal.
** Order: the product should be saved in Orders
** Transactions: it records transaction in  Web & Mobile Apps, Vispay, ARM Merchant, ARM Master, VK/Tenant Admin
*** Transaction Type: Card Purchase

+*_“Checkout as a Guest”_*+ +_button_+

* If I do not have an account, selecting +*_“Checkout as a Guest”_*+ is a quickly better solution.
* Selecting this keeps me on *“Confirm Purchase“* screen, includes following things:
!image-20210702-010827.png|width=29.953051643192484%!
** Delivery Method: _this is the same behavior and UI as in case of logged user_ [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5246|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5246|smart-link] 
** Sub total
** Tax
** You pay
** Payment Method: 
*** Selecting this opens Credit card information pop-up (_this is the same behavior and UI as in case of logged user)_
** Only when a delivery method is selected, *“Confirm Payment“* button is appeared and disabled until the user has already confirmed payment method.
* After payment is complete
* It leads me to Complete page including following things: 
** There are a button “Great\!“. Clicking on this navigates to Marketplace.
** The text: 
*** Thank you for ordering via Coffee House.
We have received your order number #210702UPE8
Kindly check your order status via email.

!image-20210702-010209.png|width=33.33333333333333%!



* Transactions: it records transaction in  Visipay, ARM Merchant, ARM Master, VK/Tenant Admin/ CRS
** Transaction Type: Card Purchase
* On Confirm & Payment screen, if I log in by Login option from the top menu, it navigates back to Shopping Cart so that I have to proceed to checkout again.
* On Complete screen, if I log in by Login option from the top menu, it navigates back to Marketplace

column3: [BE] - Guest - Order Status Emails
column4:
As a guest making payment in Greencom site, I’m able to receive emails about my order status. This help guest keep track of how the status of order is.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

After completing an order as guest, I receive emails based on delivery methods

* Pick up orders: there is always an email sent in cases below
** When the order is just created, status is New. This is new email enhanced *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been created“*
** When the order status is changed to Preparing *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been preparing“*
** When the order status is changed to Ready (the email here includes a QR code and character code to confirm pick-up) *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been ready“*
** When the order status is changed to Completed *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been completed“*
* Delivery orders: there is always an email sent in cases below
** When the order is just created, status is New. This is new email enhanced *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been created“*
** When the order status is changed to Preparing
** When the order status is changed to Ready
** When the order status is changed to Shipping (the email here includes a QR code and character code to confirm delivery)
** When the order status is changed to Completed
* Pay Now Order
** When the order is made payment successfully, status is Completed. This is new email enhanced *“Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] has been completed“*

Email subject is “*Your order \[#210630K1AW] at \[store] is now ready for \[status]*“

*Email Template:*

!image-20210630-123733.png|width=534,height=522!

*Note:* For guest, do *not* display _“Click_ [_here_|https://kard-staging.kardsys.com/admin/order/210630K1AW] _to view your order at Greencom“_
column30:
Scope:

* Create email inform new order
* Update email template - Remove “Click here…” for guest
* Fix text and direct link;change due date to 28/07/2021 (waiting [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5213|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5213|smart-link] )

column3: Web App - Guest Workflow - Handle the payment validation
column4:
When guest makes payments by credit card, there is validation message enhancement

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* When making failed payments, display message “We could not verify your payment details, try a different card or contact customer service.“
* When AVS failed, display message “Your billing address could not be verified. Please contact your bank.”
* When using invalid Credit Card Number, display message “ The card number entered is invalid.”
* When entering CVV incorrect, display message “The card authentication data is incorrect.“
* When server is not allowed, display message “This card is not supported. Please contact your bank.”
* When transaction has been declined, display message “Your transaction has been declined. Please contact your bank.”
* In case of insufficient funds, display message “Your transaction has been declined because of insufficient funds. Please contact your bank.”
* When credit card token is expired, display message “The card authentication data is incorrect.“
* In case of any other reason “We could not verify your payment details. Please try a different card or contact your bank.”

column3: [BE] Web App - Guest - Shopping Cart
column4:
As a guest experiencing Greencom Web platform, I should be able to access shopping cart where I can get a review of selected products. Shopping carts bridge the gap between shopping and buying, so having the shopping cart is extremely important to both guests and logged users

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* There is shopping cart icon on the navigation bar. Clicking on the icon goes to Shopping Cart page where I can view added products
* Re-use logics of shopping cart from [\[KP-990] Backend - Save Shopping Cart - Jira (atlassian.net)|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-990]
* When I click on *“Proceed to checkout“* button in shopping cart, there is a pop-up displayed, including Login form, *“Checkout as a Guest”* button

+*_Login form_*+

* This is the form that I can enter my account to make payment 
** I can also register as a new user to make payment 
* The validation is the same as the normal login form
* After logging in successfully, I navigate back to shopping cart. Clicking on *“Proceed to checkout“* button navigates to Confirm & Payment screen. This works expectedly as in case of logged user. [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5213|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5213|smart-link] 

+*_“Checkout as a Guest”_*+ +_button_+

* If I do not have an account, selecting +*_“Checkout as a Guest”_*+ is a quickly better solution.
* Selecting this navigates to *“Confirm Purchase“* screen [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5213|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5213|smart-link] 

+_Rules for calculating the number of added products_+

* As a guest, refreshing page always keeps added products. For instance, a guest has added 4 products then the shopping cart is refreshed. Guest still sees 4 products displayed in cart
* If I clear cookies, it clears added products.
* If a guest adds some products to cart then logs in, the number of products is the sum of ones added when being a guest and ones added when being a logged user. For instance, user A has signed in and added 4 products to cart then logged out. He adds 6 products to cart as a guest then logs in as account A. After logging in, totally 10 products displayed in cart
* If a guest adds 2 products to cart on Greencom site, then continue adding 3 products on Kard site, and logs on to Greencom site. The number of products is not counted when logging on Greencom site, he/she will see 2 products displayed in cart
column30:
Scope:

* API validate shopping cart for Guest
* Update API load shopping cart
* Update API process payment (add email) for Guest
* Create API to sync shopping cart;API validate shopping cart for Guest

POST /visikard/v1/shopping-carts/guest/validate

Body:

{noformat}[
    {

column3: [BE] GreenCom - Web App - Guest - Marketplace - Business To Business Advertising
column4:
Business To Business Advertising is corporate market advertising*.* This type of advertising aimed only at customers who are other businesses.

*AC:*

In this section, I have knowledge about the benefits when I register to be a merchant

I’m able to see business packages that I can drive my business growth

* When tapping on *“Get Started“* button of packages opens new ARM site tab - Registration page straightaway.
* Ensure that this works functionally as in case of users who are in ARM site already  and clicked on *“Start“* there

*Note:* This only displays on Greencom site

* Display the headers as Winter Green color (#70AD47)

Following the feedback to have the correct display

column3: [FE] Web App - Guest View
column4:
As a guest, I should have a specific view when accessing Greencom site. This is a first approach to handle workflows of Kanoo guests who verily want take less time to experience the site.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Accessing Greencom site navigates to Home page instantly. 
* On this screen, Marketplace menu and Shopping cart icon are added on the navigation bar
** I should have the ability to access Marketplace, Shopping Cart in navigation bar
** Marketplace (view this to get more details [\[KP-5207] Web App - Guest mode - Marketplace - Jira (atlassian.net)|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5207])
** Shopping Cart (view this to get more details [\[KP-5210] Web App - Guest - Shopping Cart - Jira (atlassian.net)|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5210])
column30: Scope: Clone Marketplace page to pre-login state

column3: [BE] Web App - Guest - Marketplace
column4:
As a guest experiencing Greencom Web platform, I should be able to buy products without logging in. 

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* On Home screen, clicking on Marketplace menu navigates to Nearby tab in Marketplace page. This tab is always the default tab of page. I can also see tabs: Products, Gift cards, Offers in Marketplace
* The Marketplace page is split into 2 sections: 
** Stores/products/gift cards/offers will be displayed in 2 rows in the above section 
*** Display  view more Stores/products/gift cards/offers
** The below section is used for Business To Business Advertising [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5209|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-5209|smart-link] 

+_Nearby tab_+

* Search merchants: ensure this works functionally as in case of logged users
* Filter categories: ensure this works functionally as in case of logged users
* Store map and location selection: ensure this works functionally as in case of logged users
* When doing actions below, it displays Login Modal
** Clicking on *“Connect”* button to connect with merchant on Merchant Details page. After logging in successfully, I stay at Merchant Details page.
** Clicking on *“Pay”* button to connect with merchant on Merchant Details page. After logging in successfully, I stay at Merchant Details page.
** Clicking on “*Add to Wallet“* buttons of coupons in Campaign section on Merchant Details page.  After logging in successfully, I stay at Merchant Details page.
** Clicking on *“Add to Wallet“* buttons of coupons on Coupon Category page. After logging in successfully, I stay at Coupon Category page.
** When clicking on *“Gift to Friend“* and *“Add to my Wallet“* buttons on Gift card Details modal in Gift Card Category page.  After logging in successfully, I stay at Gift Card Category page.
* Login modal: this the new modal enhanced. It includes
** Login form: this applies the validation as login form in [https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/login|https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/login|smart-link] 
** Forgot Password:  clicking on this navigates to [https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/forgot-password|https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/forgot-password|smart-link] 
** Register: clicking on this navigates to [https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/register|https://greencom-staging.kardsys.com/user/register|smart-link] 
*  I can click on *“Add to cart“* buttons to add products to my shopping cart as normal

+_Gift Cards tab_+

* I can see the list of gift cards and search gift cards as normal
* When clicking on a gift card, I see Login Modal after clicking on *“Gift to Friend“* and *“Add to my Wallet“* buttons

+_Products tab_+

* I can see products of all merchants here and click on them to go to their details as normal.
* I can click on *“Add to cart“* buttons to add the product to my shopping cart as normal

+_Offers tab_+

* I can see the list of offers and search offers as normal
* When clicking on an offer, I see Login Modal if I click on *“Save Offer“* or *“Redeem Now“* button

column3: Flutter App - Category - Products
column4:
*AC:*

On Store details screen, I can see the Category of Products

Tapping on that category opens Product list screen, list of products only belongs to that Category

* The list of products will be shown as grid view mode.
* -I can search product by product name-
** -I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.-
** -Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keyword.-
** -Keep the searching results screen when switching between Home, Products and Gift card in store details-
* -I can filter product with product category by the filter icon on Search field:-
** -On clicking the icon, show the Filter Product screen.-
*** -In this screen, separating 2 sections:-
*** -Category: Tapping on this opens Select Category screen-
**** -I can select / deselect one or multiple categories to filter.-
**** -I can search by category name. In case there’s not any categories of no results when searching, show the message- *-_“No Categories Found.“_-*
**** -For each selected category, it will be highlighted.-
** -Filter icon should be highlighted and colored if I am using filter.-
** -Keep the filtering results screen when switching between tabs Home, Products and Gift card in store details-
*** -Sort by: I can sort product list by-
**** -Latest: sorting product list by latest created date-
**** -Price:-
***** -Lowest to Highest-
***** -Highest to Lowest-
*** -By default, the list of products will be sorted by discount price (low to high), if multiple products has the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).-
*** -For the sort buttons (Latest, Price), there must always one button checked. If user tap another button, the checked button is auto-unchecked.-
** -I can tap Clear button on Filter screen to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories and sort by will be unselected and reloaded, I can select other categories and get back to Products tab.-
** -If no products is available or no matched searching / filtering results, display- {color:#00b8d9}*-_“No products found.“_-*{color}-.-
* -By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (-*-All-*-).-
* For each product, I want to see:
** Product image
** Product name:
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.
** Product price:
*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the price is too long.
* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.
* User can scroll down to view all products

* -By default, the list of the gift cards will be sorted by the value range pricing and price(highest to lowest), discount percentage (high to low), if multiple gift cards have the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).-
* -If no gift card is available or no matched searching/filtering results, display- {color:#00b8d9}*-_“No Gift Cards found.“_-*{color}-.-
* For each gift card, I want to see:
** Gift card image
** The value of a gift card
** Gift card name:
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use an ellipsis if the name is too long.
* On tapping a gift card, I can see the detail screen.
* Tap on Back icon to return Store details screen

**** Enter Point field

**** Point to Dollar
** Total Payment: The final total price 
** Cashback: Point reward of merchant

** When I have not verified KYC, display the ‘Select Payment Method’ hyperlink
*** Tapping on it leads me to the Select Payment Method screen. I can add or select any cards

column3: Flutter App - Marketplace - Gift Card tab
column4:
+*AC:*+

On the Marketplace screen, I want to have one more tab named Gift Cards

I can also tap on the Gift Cards button on the Home screen to open the Gift Cards tab

On this tab, I want to see the list of all gift cards which are approved and active from all businesses in the system

* Each gift card displayed here must belong to at least one Konnect Category of any Konnect Zone and the Konnect Zone must be active
* I can filter gift card with category by the filter icon on the Search field:
** On clicking the icon, show the list of categories screen.
** I can select/deselect one or multiple categories to filter.
** I  can search by category name. If there are not any categories of no results when searching, show the message *_“No Categories Found.“_*
** For each selected category, it will be highlighted.
** I can tap the Clear button to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories will be unselected, I can select other categories and get back to the Gift card tab.
** Filter icon should be bold and colored if I am using the filter.
** Keep the filtering results screen when switching between tabs Nearby, Products 
* By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (*All*).
* For each gift card, I want to see:
** Gift card  image
** The value of a gift card
** Discount percentage
** Business name:
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use an ellipsis if the name is too long.
* On tapping a gift card, I can see the detail screen.
* I can search gift card  by gift card name and business name:
** I can search with any words, characters, or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.
** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keywords.
** Keep the searching results screen when switching between Nearby, Online, and Products.
* By default, the list of the gift cards will be sorted by the value range pricing and price(highest to lowest), discount percentage (high to low), if multiple gift cards have the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).
* If no gift card is available or no matched searching/filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No Gift Cards found.“_*{color}.

column3: Flutter App - Enhancement for UI Checkout screen
column4:
+*AC:*+

* The delivery method:
** Pickup At:
*** Display the store address fully
** Delivery Method
*** Pay Now
** Delivery To: displaying the user information:
*** Name
*** Phone Number
*** Address

 

* Order items: displaying the text ‘Smart Shopping Mall’
** Product logo
** Product name: displaying full name
** Options (if available): displaying full options
** Price: only displaying Original Price or Discounted price 
** Quantity
** The total of all products in a store

 

* Calculating
** Sub Total
** Tax (VAT)
** Coupon - default ‘Select Coupon'. 
*** When a coupon is selected, ‘Select Coupon’ is updated to the value of the coupon
*** When the ‘Buy 1 get 1 fee' coupon is selected, 'Select Coupon’ is updated to the value of that coupon in a line, if it is long, should display ellipsis.
**** The ‘Buy 1 get 1 fee' coupon is displayed when it’s already in the Wallet, the user has bought enough required quantity. After selecting that coupon, the product that is gifted should be also displayed on the ‘Smart Shopping Mall’ section with the price is $0.00
** Gift card- default ‘Select Gift Card’. When gift cards are selected, ‘Select Gift Card’ is updated to the value of each gift card
** Point Redemption
** Total Payment
** Cashback Point (If available)
** Order Number

 

* C2F
** Display the project name fully
** The amount that the user has donated

 

* Payment Method
** Kash Kard: if the user has KYC verified
** Select Payment Method: if the user does not have KYC verified
*** When tapping on it will open the Payment Method screen, 
**** If the user has added a card already, the user can select a card for payment
**** If the user has not added any cards yet, the user can tap on ‘Add a card’ to open Adding Card screen. After adding successfully, the user can use it for payment.

column3: Flutter App - Orders
column4:
As a customer, I want my orders to be kept in the Orders history so that I can track the processing of my order more conveniently and easily.

+*AC:*+

There are 2 tabs that are displayed on the Orders screen: Processing tab and Completed tab

Each tab will contain all the corresponding orders

* For Processing tab: displaying the list of orders with the status is New/ Preparing/ Ready/ Shipping when the delivery method is Pickup or Delivery
** For each order, I want to see:
*** Merchant logo image
*** Business Name: display full name
*** Delivery method
*** Order ID
*** Status
**** After a new order is created, the status is New
**** The rest of the statuses are auto-synced from Order Process App whenever my order status is updated.
**** Unpaid order which is created by staff at the store should be also displayed with the status Unpaid
** Tapping on an Order opens the Order Details screen
* For Completed tab: only displaying the orders which the status is Completed. 
** The delivery method should be kept
** Pay Now delivery method will be displayed in the Completed tab all the time

The list of orders is sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. Updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.

column3: Marketplace - Nearby tab
column4:
As a customer, I want to be able to view the list of merchants who are selling products near me. Depending on the location will display the list of merchants.

+*AC:*+

* On the *Nearby* tab, I want to see the list of all konnect zones (store) near my position (within 10 miles). 
* I can scroll down to view more and the list will be sorted by:
** Distance from my position (nearest)
** Alphabet (business name)
* I can tap on Change to update location, all konnect zones (store) near to the new position will be displayed
** Tapping on Change will open the Select Location screen ([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4870|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4870|smart-link] )
*** Searching the location will display the address suggestion, the user can tap on it to select the location
*** After selecting, the address is displayed, and ‘Set Location’ button is enabled
* Each konnect zone must be active and selected as Show On Marketplace to be shown on this tab.
* For each store, I want to see:
** Merchant logo image
** Business Name: display full name
** Store’s address: display full address
** The distance from my position to the store
** Discount percentage (if available)
** Points Cashback (if available)
* I can tap on any store to open the Store Details screen (Konnect Zone detail).
* I can search store by business name or business category, placeholder text: *_“Search…“_*
** I can search with any words, characters, or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.
** Show all results if searching by *blank characters* or clearing keywords.
** Keep the searching results screen when:
*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.
*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online, and Shopping.
* I can filter stores by tapping the Filter icon on the Search field:
** On clicking the icon, show the list of business categories screen.
** I can select/deselect only one category to filter.
** Show the name of the selected category. (the default value is *All Categories*).
** I can select the *All Categories* to clear the filter.
** The filter icon should be bold and colored (depending on tenant theme color) if I am using the filter.
** Keep the filtering results screen when:
*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.
*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online, and Shopping.
* If no stores are available or no matched searching results, display *_“No stores found“_*.

column3: Visipay - Payment Gateway - Separate the Worldnet gateway tab into 2 small tabs

*Acceptance Criteria: *

Separate the Worldnet gateway tab into 2 small tabs: 

* E-commerce Credential: work as the current behavior
* Add a new tab, called: Card Present Credential. This is used in Card Present to create a group
** Display the ‘Add Key’ button so that I should add the key
** After adding a key, I can edit or removes it.
*** When I remove a key that is being used, display the message: *_“The payment gateway is being used. Are you sure to remove it?”_*
*** If I remove a key that is not used yet, display the message: “*_Are you sure to remove it?_*”

column3: BE - Visipay - Pay flow Gateway Processing Platforms for Card-Present Transactions
column4:
As a Visipay Admin, I want to configure for Card-Present Transactions using the Worldnet gateway beside the current gateway: Vantiv. So that when unexpected errors occur, transactions still keep going through the  payment gateways configured 

h3. *Acceptance Criteria:*

On the left menu, adding a new item called: *Card Present*

Clicking on the Card Present menu opens the Card Present page with the info below:

* *Search*: work as the current behavior. When searching no result, display the message: No groups found
* *The Group Grid with* 
** +Default:+
*** _Priority_: 1
*** _Group Name_: Default
*** _Merchants_: number of merchants
*** _Payment Gateways_ - Default: Vantiv
*** _Status_: Enable
*** _Actions_: Edit and Disable. I can edit the information in a group or disable it.
* *Create New Group button:* 
** Clicking on it opens the *Create New Group*’ modal with the below details
*** _Group Name_: display textbox, max length 50 chars, alphanumeric
*** _Merchant Lists_: only displaying the active merchants  
**** Allow users to search the names of merchants
**** Allow selecting one, multiple, all merchants to add into a group.
**** The merchant list in group 1 can be selected to add into the other groups
*** _Available Payment Gateways_: display Combobox with
****  Default: Vantiv
**** Worldnet key names: getting in Card Present Credential
*** _Status_ - Default: Enable
*** _Save button_: 
**** Disable the button when not entering the group name or adding merchants
**** If entering the same group name(insensitive case), display the message: *_“The group name is existing. Please try another one”_*
**** I can add many groups with different names.
*** Clicking on the 'X' icon or Cancel button to close the modal. 
* After creating a new group, the information of that group will be displayed on the Group Grid.
* If a group using the gateway and that gateway is removed, that group is automatically disabled. When I try to enable that group, display the message: *_“The gateway is not available. Please try another gateway”_*
** I should be able to edit that group to use another gateway.
* The newly created group should be placed on the top with priority 1. I can drag and drop a group to change the priority of it.
** Editing the group will not change the priority of that group.
** The priority is set with the highest is 1

column3: Marketplace - Checkout - Delivery Method
column4:
Tapping on Select Delivery Method should open the Delivery Method screen containing Pay Now, Pickup, Delivery methods.

* +*_Pay Now_*+: when tapping on this will back to the Confirm & Payment screen, Select Delivery Method is updated to the Pay Now method
* +*_Pickup_*+: when tapping on this will navigate to the screen, named: Pickup with the below information:
** _User name_
** _Phone number_
** _Address_
** _Date chooser: The user can change the day to receive the order._ 
** _Time chooser: The user can change the time to receive the order._ 
** All changed information should be kept even if the user changes another payment method and back to it.
** _Confirm button_
*** When a field is empty, should disable and grey out the button
*** Enable the button when all fields are filled up: tapping on it will back to the Confirm & Payment screen, Select Delivery Method is updated to the Pickup method
* +*_Delivery_*+: when tapping on this will navigate to the screen, named: Delivery with the below information:
** _Receive order method options: Scan QR Code and Leave At Door_
** _User name_
** _Phone number_
** _Address:_ 
*** If the user has verified KYC, the delivery address should be the KYC address. 
*** If the user has not verified KYC, the delivery address will be empty, user can base on the google maps suggestion to input another one.
*** The user can change the address if he/she wants
*** After changing the address, this address should be kept even if the user changes another payment method 
** _Date chooser:_ The user can change the day to receive the order. 
** _Time chooser_: The user can change the time to receive the order.
** All changed information should be kept even if the user changes another payment method and back to it.
** _Confirm button:_ 
*** Disable and grey out when one field is empty
*** Enable the button when all fields are filled up: tapping on it will back to the Confirm & Payment screen, Select Delivery Method is updated to the Receive order method option as Scan QR Code(default) or Leave At Door
* Ensure that the address should be saved exactly on the Orders screen, KardPOS, Kard Order Delivery 

*Validation rule* 

[^Validation.xlsx]

column3: Marketplace - Product detail
column4:
On tapping a product name or product image in Marketplace goes to the details screen of that product

There is a 'Back' button to return the Product screen

The Product Details include

* Product image
* Product name
* The Original Price and Discounted Price (if have)
* Options
* Description: display maximum 2 rows. If the text is too long, display the ellipsis and View More
* Store Information: Tapping on it redirects to that store details
** Merchant logo
** Business name
** Business Address
** Discount and Cashback
* Add to Cart section, including:
** Product name
** The Original Price or Discounted Price 
** Num. Stepper
** Add to Cart button:
*** This is placed below each product
*** Tapping on the button of a product adds that product to the Cart and display the toast message: Product added to card.
**** Meanwhile, the number badge of shopping cart is also increased

Ensure that the options should be displayed correctly as the user has selected

column3: Marketplace - Checkout
column4:
When the products are selected, tapping on the Checkout button on the Cart screen should navigate to the Confirm & Payment screen. In this screen should contain the information as below:

* *The title: Confirm & Payment*
* There is a back button on the top left corner so that I can tap on it to back to the shopping cart
* *Delivery method section, called: Select Delivery Method*. This is to select a method to take the products. Refer this ticket: [\[KP-4708] Marketplace - Checkout - Delivery Method - Jira (atlassian.net)|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4708]
* *Summary section*: This is to display all total amount
** Sub Total: the total price of items
** Tax: tax of merchant
** Coupons: selecting it will open the 'Select Coupon' screen. All added coupons of that store should be displayed. 
** Gift card: selecting it will open the 'Select Gift Cards' screen. All GCs which are bought at that store should be displayed. 
** Points: display the available point. When selecting it will open a select point modal including: 
*** Point Availability
*** Point to US Dollar
*** {color:#ff5630}TBD{color}
*** Confirm button
** Total: The total price including tax or being discounted by Coupon/GC/Points
** Cashback: Point reward of merchant
* *Payment method section*: This is to select the method to make payment
** When I have verified KYC, display the image of the KK (set as default) with user name and the 4 last number of KK. I can also change another card to make payment
**  When I have not verified KYC, display ‘Select Payment Method’ hyperlink
*** Tapping on it leads me to the Select Payment Method screen. I can add or select any cards
* *'Confirm Payment'* *button*: 
** When Delivery or Payment method is not selected, disable and grey out the Confirm Payment button 
** When the button is enabled, tapping on it to complete the payment
* After payment is complete
** It leads me to the Complete screen with the Check icon and the text Payment Completed displayed
*** Tapping on “Close” button goes to the Orders screen. Depending on the selected delivery method will navigate to Processing or Completed tab
**** Selecting the Pay Now method should navigate to the Completed tab
**** Pickup and Delivery should navigate to the Processing tab
** Transactions: it records the transaction in Vispay, ARM Merchant, ARM Master, Customer Support, VK/Tenant Admin
*** Transaction Type: Payment
** Ensure the order is also displayed in KardPOS 
** Ensure that point rewards function is worked as normal

column3: Marketplace - Product tab
column4:
+*AC:*+

On Marketplace screen, I want to have one more tab named Products.

*_Products_*

* On this tab, I want to see the list of all products which are active from all businesses in system.
* The list of products will be shown as grid view mode.
* Each product being shown here must belong to at least one konnect category of any konnect zones and the konnect zone must be active.
* I can filter product with category by the filter icon on Search field:
** On clicking the icon, show the list of product categories screen.
** I can select / deselect one or multiple categories to filter.
** I can search by category name. In case there’s not any categories of no results when searching, show the message *_“No Categories Found.“_*
** For each selected category, it will be highlighted.
** I can tap Clear button to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories will be unselected, I can select other categories and get back to Products tab.
** Filter icon should be bold and colored if I am using filter.
** Keep the filtering results screen when switching between tabs Nearby, Online and Products.
* By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (*All*).
* For each product, I want to see:
** Product image
** Product name:
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.
** Product price:
*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the price is too long.
** Business name:
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the business name is too long.
* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.
* I can search product by product name and business name:
** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.
** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keyword.
** Keep the searching results screen when switching between Nearby, Online and Products.
* I can sort product list by:
** Latest: sorting product list by latest created date
** Price:
*** Low to High.
*** High to Low.
** Most discounted (based on discount percentage): sorting product list by most discount.
* By default, the list of products will be sorted by discount price (low to high), if multiple products has the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).
* For three sort buttons (Latest, Price and Most Discounted), there must always one button checked. If user tap another button, the checked button is auto-unchecked.
* If no products is available or no matched searching / filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No products found.“_*{color}.
* User can scroll down to hide Search field and Sorting price lines, but when they scroll up those lines should appear right away. (make it like Shopee app as the video attachment below).

column3: iOS/Android/Web - Consumer Apps - Crypto Card - Open KYC Form from Information pop-up of KYC message
column4:
With new flow for Crypto server, we will save the Crypto sever on PT acc so user need to pass KYC before using the Crypto card. We need to change new logic for them:

*  Crypto SEND MONEY to another Crypto: when tapping/clicking on Send button in crypto card detail, we need to display a button Get KYC Verified on that pop-up so that they can open KYC screen quickly with below logic:
* If user is pending for verification, show message: “Your KYC submission is being reviewed and the result will be sent to you soon.” and we need to direct user to KYC status view instead of KYC submit form.
* If user is LV1, show the message: “You need to get KYC verified to access this feature” then we have 2 cases:

a. User failed KYC verification, after pressing “Get KYC Verified” we need redirect user to KYC status view like #2

b. User has never submitted KYC, after pressing “Get KYC Verified”, redirect user to KYC form.

column3: Q5ID fee configuration
column4:
h1. Description:

As a master admin on Visipay
I want to able to configure the fee for using Q5id
So that I can apply the fee rules that I want the users to pay when they using the fee

----

h1. UI mockup



----

h1. Acceptance criteria

# *Admin configures the Q5id fee on Visipay*
GIVEN I’m a master admin
AND I’m on the Visipage site - Fee configuration page
THEN I should see a new tab called: “Q5ID Fees“
# *Admin configures the Initial Fee*
GIVEN I’m a master admin
AND I’m on the Visipage site - Fee configuration page - Q5Id Fees tab
THEN I should be able to configure the fee for creating a Q5id account
AND I can enter a specific amount for this fee
# *Admin configures the Monthly Fee*
GIVEN I’m a master admin
AND I’m on the Visipage site - Fee configuration page - Q5Id Fees tab
THEN I should be able to configure the monthly fee for using the Q5id account on our app
AND I can enter a specific amount for this fee

column3: [Backend] - Register for the Q5ID account
column4:
h1. Description:

As a customer user on the mobile app
I want to have the ability to register Q5ID
So that I can use that as my payment verification.

----

h1. UI mockup

[https://xd.adobe.com/view/b5e40a0c-b9d6-4a8d-92f8-75d5810bf44e-e0b7/screen/477c9a99-2f43-43cd-886e-0410996a7d9b/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b5e40a0c-b9d6-4a8d-92f8-75d5810bf44e-e0b7/screen/477c9a99-2f43-43cd-886e-0410996a7d9b/|smart-link] 

----

h1. Acceptance criteria

# *-Step 0: Agree on the fee-*
-GIVEN I’m a user of the app and I’m  about to turn on the Q5id for the payment verification-
-WHEN I click on the Q5id option and passed the PIN (the entering PIN step is defined on- [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4249|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4249|smart-link] -)-
-THEN I will navigate to a screen that has the information of the fee I need to pay to use this feature:-
-- Initial Sign-Up fee: Configurable value on Visipay-
-- Monthly fee: Configurable value on Visipay-
-AND a button to agree with the fee and start the register steps:- {color:#00b8d9}-“Create account“-{color} -button-
# *Step 1: Verify Wallet PIN*
GIVEN I’m a user of the app
WHEN I click on the option Q5ID option on the Payment Authenticatio page
THEN I will be navigated to the screen for entering PIN
# *Step 1: Face capturing*
GIVEN I’m a user of the app and I’m registering a Q5id account
WHEN I entered the correct PIN and click Continue
THEN I will be navigated to the next screen that allows me to capture my face with the front camera
# *Step 2: Palm scanning*
GIVEN I’m a user of the app and I’m on the face capturing step for registering a Q5id account
WHEN I click on the capture button
THEN I will be navigated to the next screen that allows me to scan my palms.
AND I should be required to scan my palm
# *Complete the registration*
GIVEN I’m a user of the app and I’m on the face capturing step for registering a Q5id account
WHEN I complete my scanning
THEN I should be received a toast message {color:#00b8d9}“Success\!“{color}
AND I should be redirected back to the setting page.
AND I should be required to scan my face and palm on next payments
# *A user who had registered the Q5id on our app turns on the Q5id method for payment verification*
GIVEN I’m a user of the app
AND I already have a Q5ID account
AND I registered this account on our app
AND I’m on the Setting page
WHEN I click on the Q5id option for verification payment method
AND I pass the PIN
THEN I should be redirected back to the Setting page
AND I should be required to scan my face and palm on next payments

column3: Web App - Allow user to select the payment verification method
column4:
h1. Description:

As a customer user on the mobile app
I want to have the ability to choose the payment verification method on the setting page
So I can choose the best method for me.

h1. UI Mockup updated

[https://xd.adobe.com/view/3bff05de-8eff-4960-95dc-bdc0cd93ba72-6eac/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3bff05de-8eff-4960-95dc-bdc0cd93ba72-6eac/|smart-link] 

h1. Acceptance criteria

# *A customer selects the verification method on the setting page*
GIVEN I’m an user of the web app 
WHEN I open the setting page
THEN I should able to select the verification payment method among the following options:
- None (Default option)
- Wallet PIN
# *A customer selects None as a verification method*
GIVEN I’m an user of the web app and I selected None for the verification method
WHEN I make the payment 
THEN I should not see any verification step
# *A customer selects Wallet PIN as a verification method*
GIVEN I’m an user of the web app and I selected PIN for the verification method
WHEN I make the payment 
THEN I have to enter the PIN to verify the payment
# *A customer choose None as a verification method on the setting page*
GIVEN I’m a user of the mobile app and I’m selecting None for the verification method
WHEN I try to change this to NONE
THEN I have to enter the wallet PIN before I can do that
column30:
[~accountid:5b102742c2fc1b1bc37ba3ef] On milestone 2 (June 18 - June 29) we need to implement this item;API get config payment verification

GET /visikard/v1/paymentVerification/getConfig

Header: token, deviceId

column3: [Backend] - Using Q5id for payment verification
column4:
h1. Description:

As a customer user on the mobile app
I want to have the ability to use Q5ID for payment verification
So that I can secure my payments

h1. UI mockup

[https://xd.adobe.com/view/887464e2-fd21-491d-9e2b-b87933e6a8cd-dd27/screen/e00e5ee3-3419-460e-94fc-27fc3590afd6/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/887464e2-fd21-491d-9e2b-b87933e6a8cd-dd27/screen/e00e5ee3-3419-460e-94fc-27fc3590afd6/|smart-link] 

h1. Acceptance criteria

# *A customer selects Q5ID as a verification method*
GIVEN I’m a user of the mobile app and I selected None for the verification method
WHEN I make the payment 
THEN I have to scan my face and my palm to verify the payment
# *A customer uses Q5ID for payment verification successfully*
GIVEN I’m a user of the mobile app
WHEN I use Q5id to verify my payment with the correct face and palm
THEN I will be redirected to the next screen of payment (Success step)
# *A customer uses Q5ID for payment verification unsuccessfully*
GIVEN I’m a user of the mobile app
WHEN I use Q5id to verify my payment with the incorrect face or palm
THEN I receive a toast message: {color:#00b8d9}“Verification unsuccessfully. Please try again\!“{color}
AND I should be redirected back the face capturing step

column3: [Backend] - Mobile app - Allow user to select the payment verification method
column4:
h1. Description:

As a customer user on the mobile app
I want to have the ability to choose the payment verification method on the setting page
So I can choose the best method for me.



*UI Mockup Updated*

[https://xd.adobe.com/view/887464e2-fd21-491d-9e2b-b87933e6a8cd-dd27/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/887464e2-fd21-491d-9e2b-b87933e6a8cd-dd27/|smart-link] 

h1. Acceptance criteria

# *A customer selects the verification method on the setting page*
GIVEN I’m a user of the mobile app 
WHEN I open the setting page
THEN I should able to select the verification payment method among the following options:
- None (Default option)
- TouchID/FaceID
- Q5ID
# *A customer selects None as a verification method*
GIVEN I’m a user of the mobile app and I selected None for the verification method
WHEN I make the payment
THEN I should not see any verification step
# *A customer selects FaceID/TouchID as a verification method*
GIVEN I’m a user of the mobile app and I selected None for the verification method
WHEN I make the payment 
THEN I have to scan my face or my fingerprint to verify the payment
# *A customer choose None as a verification method on the setting page*
GIVEN I’m a user of the mobile app and I’m selecting a verification method (PIN/touchID/faceID/Q5id)
WHEN I try to change this to another method
THEN I have to enter the wallet PIN before I can do that

When the user cannot save payment authentication, show the message: *Save Failed. Please Try Again.*

h1. Developer Scope:

API get PIN (encrypted)
column30:
Scope for this ticket:
API get PIN (encrypted)

column3: [Backend]  List of users whose KYC status is pending on the CSR page
column4:
h1. Description:

As a customer support
I want to have a page on CSR site that include the list of user whose KYC status is pending
So I can have more useful information to help user when they call us

h1. 
UI mockup updated

[https://xd.adobe.com/view/7a5984bb-b1c4-46d5-8f73-6c21dcf0917d-2f0a/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/7a5984bb-b1c4-46d5-8f73-6c21dcf0917d-2f0a/|smart-link] 

h1. Acceptance criteria

*1. A customer support have ability to view the list of the user whose KYC status is pending on CSR site from the Twilio Flex*

GIVEN I’m a customer support
WHEN I access the CSR site
THEN I should be able to open a new section (name: {color:#00b8d9}Pending KYC Users{color}) that contains a list of users whose KYC status is pending with the following information:

* User’s first name
* User’s last name
* User’s email
* User’s phone number
* The reason for their pending KYC status (English only)
* Resubmitted: Yes/No

AND the list should be updated automatically when PrimeTrust send us a new list of users whose KYC status is pending.
AND I should not see the users that already verified KYC
AND I should be able to search the user by: name, email, phone number
AND I should be able to sort the list by: name, email, phone number

column3: [Backend] - Send notification for users whose KYC status is pending when we got the email from PT
column4:
h1. Description:

As an HYT user whose KYC status is pending
I want to receive a notification about my KYC status and the action I should do next
So I can update my information to get the KYC verified

h1. Acceptance criteria

# *A user who has pending KYC status receive an email notification about that*
GIVEN I’m an HYT user and my KYC status is pending
WHEN PrimeTrust sends an email to Visikard to inform about the users whose KYS status is pending. The email includes a spreadsheet for the account list
AND My account is on that list
THEN I should receive an email and the notification on my installed app (refer ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-1799|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-1799|smart-link] for the email and notification detail)
AND if I view the notification list, I should see an item as below:
- Title: The same with current notification on System notification list for this type
- Description: The same with current notification on System notification list for this type
- Icon: on the mockup
- Mockup:  [https://xd.adobe.com/view/5fb9cc88-f3dd-4902-ad46-21cfe1fa41a4-0aea/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/5fb9cc88-f3dd-4902-ad46-21cfe1fa41a4-0aea/|smart-link] 
AND When I click on this item I should be redirected to the KYC screen just like clicking on the notification on the system notification list.
# *A user who received the KYC pending status notification will not receive the same notification again.*
GIVEN I’m an HYT user and my KYC status is pending
WHEN PrimeTrust sends an email to Visikard to inform about the users whose KYS status is pending. The email includes a spreadsheet for the account list
AND My account is on that list but I have received the same notification before
THEN I should *NOT* receive an email nor the notification on my installed app
# *A user who has resubmitted the KYC information but their status is pending again for any reason will receive a new notification*
GIVEN I’m an HYT user and I resubmitted my KYC status after I had received the notification about my pending status.
WHEN PrimeTrust sends an email to Visikard to inform about the users whose KYS status is pending. The email includes a spreadsheet for the account list
AND My account is on that list
THEN I should receive a new email and a new notification on my installed app

Note:
The email will look like this


!image004.png|width=587,height=1600!

column3: New Kard App - Optimize and improve structure
[Web] Entertainment - Offer detail - Available redemption times
column4:
h1. Description:

As a user on consumer web or app
I want to see the remaining time of redemption for an offer
So I can redeem it with my personal plan

h1. Acceptance criteria:

# User view the remaining available redemption time on the offer detail
GIVEN I am a user of consumer app/web
WHEN I open the offer detail (Entertainment offer)
THEN I should see the number of the remaining time that I can redeem that offer (See the mockup for UI detail and below cases for the message)
Note: There are 3 cases for the message:
1. When user has not redeem the coupon: “This coupon can be redeemed x times“
2. When user has redeem the coupon: “This coupon can be redeemed x more times“
3. When the coupon has unlimited redemption time: “This is an unlimited-redeem coupon“

[https://xd.adobe.com/view/56fedcd6-27b3-4b7e-b473-946f9ecba138-03ad/screen/b1e9c576-43f0-433d-8375-b2523d924d35/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/56fedcd6-27b3-4b7e-b473-946f9ecba138-03ad/screen/b1e9c576-43f0-433d-8375-b2523d924d35/|smart-link]

* BANK ADDRESS:
* BANK PHONE:
* CREDIT TO:
* ADDRESS:
* ROUTING NUMBER:
* ACCOUNT NUMBER:
* SWIFT CODE:
* REFERENCE:

*_\[Tenant Name] Team_*

column3: PathoCare / BHT  - Email for user if the donate transaction is completed or failed
column4:
As a consumer, I want to be able to receive the email for the result of donate transaction after donating with bank account.

+*AC:*+

*_Transactions Completed_*

* Subject: *PathoCare / Black Health Trust - Donate Transaction Completed*
* Content:

||*Users*||*Guests*||
|*_“Dear \[Customer Name],_*
*_A transaction of donating $<amount> by your bank account has been completed._*
*_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxx_*
*_Sincerely,_*
*_\[Tenant Name] Team_*
*_\[Tenant Signature]“_*|*_“Hello,_*
*_A transaction of donating $<amount> by your bank account has been completed._*
*_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxx_*
*_Sincerely,_*
*_\[Tenant Name] Team_*
*_\[Tenant Signature]“_*|

*_Transactions Failed_*

* Subject: *PathoCare / Black Health Trust - Donate Transaction Failed*
* Content:

||*Users*||*Guests*||
|*_“Dear \[Customer Name],_*
*_A transaction of donating $<amount> by your bank account has been failed._*
*_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxx_*
*_Sincerely,_*
*_\[Tenant Name] Team_*
*_\[Tenant Signature]“_*|*_“Hello,_*
*_A transaction of donating $<amount> by your bank account has been failed._*
*_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxx_*
*_Sincerely,_*
*_\[Tenant Name] Team_*

column3: PathoCare / BHT - Cancel the donate transaction after a month (Wire Transfer)
column4:
As a admin, I want to cancel the pending donate transaction of users or guests if they do not take any actions for a month.

+*AC:*+

After a month since the time user donates to a project, if user does not take any actions, the pending transaction will be canceled automatically.

The transaction status will be updated to Rejected.

User will receive a notification email for this:

* Subject: *PathoCare / Black Health Trust - Donate Transaction Canceled*
* Content:

||*Users*||*Guests*||
|*_“Dear \[Customer Name],_*
*_We are sorry to inform that the transaction of donating $<amount> by your bank account via Wire Transfer has been canceled._* 
*_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxx_*
*_Sincerely,_*
*_\[Tenant Name] Team_*
*_\[Tenant Signature]“_*|*_“Hello,_*
*_We are sorry to inform that the transaction of donating $<amount> by your bank account via Wire Transfer has been canceled._* 
*_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxx_*
*_Sincerely,_*
*_\[Tenant Name] Team_*
*_\[Tenant Signature]“_*|

column3: BHT - Transactions page - Enhance UI to display the transaction of donating
column4:
As a BHT consumer, I want to have the transactions page, so that I can view and keep track my transactions history.

+*AC:*+

After login to BHT web, I click my avatar to open the user profile pop-up.

Below Account I can see a new item named Transactions, on clicking I can open the Transaction History page:

For each transaction I can see:

* Transaction Date: sample format Apr 8th, 2021 11:25 AM
* Transaction Type: *Cause2Fund*
* Amount: {color:#ff5630}*-*{color}{color:#ff5630}${color}{color:#ff5630}*<amount>*{color} (Ex: - $5,000.00)
* Status: *Pending* / *Completed / Rejected*

I can click on each row of transaction to open the transaction details page: the UI and data displayed this page should be as same as GreenCom web (with black background):

!image-20210409-075601.png|width=1636,height=879!

I can filter the transaction by date range, status.

column3: Admin - Record transaction after donating with bank account
column4:
As a system admin or a tenant admin of PathoCare / BHT, I want to be able to view the donate transaction after donating with bank account.

+*AC:*+

*_Transaction List_*

For each donate transaction, I can see info below:

* Transaction ID
* Category: Cause2Fund
* Status: Pending / Completed / Rejected
* Beneficiary: \[*Business Name]* (the owner name of the program to which the project belongs)
* Beneficiary Kard: *xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of Kash Kard)
* Remitter:
** Guest: displaying Anonymous
** Logged user: displaying User name (from Account Information page of web app)
* Remitter Kard: not available (displaying “-”)
* Transaction Amount: displaying the donate amount, format: *$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: $2.400.00)
* Transaction Date: displaying the donate date, sample format: *Apr 05, 2021, 10:55*
* Location: not available (displaying “-”)
* Channel Name: not available (displaying “-”)
* Action: View Detail, I can click to open the transaction details dialog (or click transaction ID).

*_Transaction Details_*

* Transaction ID
* Transaction Category: *Cause2Fund*
* Status: *Completed*
* Beneficiary: \[*Business Name]* (the owner name of the program to which the project belongs)
* Beneficiary Kard: *Kash Kard - *xxxx* (xxxx: the last four digits of merchant KK)
* Remitter: 
** Guest: displaying Anonymous
** Logged user: displaying User name (from Account Information page of web app)
* Remitter Kard: not available (displaying “-”)
* Staff Name: displaying nothing
* Staff ID: displaying nothing
* Terminal ID: displaying nothing
* Transaction Amount: displaying the donate amount, format: *$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: $2.400.00)
* Fee: displaying the fee (not including VAT), format: *$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: $10.00)
* Fee VAT: displaying the VAT amount of fee, format: *$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: $10.00)
* Transaction Date: displaying the donate date, sample format: *Apr 05, 2021, 10:55*
* Location: displaying nothing
* Auth Code: displaying nothing
* Channel Name: displaying nothing

column3: PathoCare / BHT - Remind email for user to settle the pending transaction (donating by bank account via Wire Transfer)
column4:
As a consumer, I want to be reminded to settle the pending transaction.

+*AC:*+

After finishing donating 24 hours, user will be reminded through the email.

This remind email will be sent to user only {color:#ff5630}*once*{color}.

Email content:

* Subject: *PathoCare / Black Health Trust - Remind for Pending transaction*
* Content:

||*Users*||*Guests*||
|*_“Dear \[Customer Name],_*
*_A transaction of donating $<amount> with your bank account via Wire Transfer is pending for your confirmation._*
*_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxx_*
*_Sincerely,_*
*_\[Tenant Name] Team_*
*_\[Tenant Signature]“_*|*_“Hello,_*
*_A transaction of donating $<amount> with your bank account via Wire Transfer is pending for your confirmation._*
*_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxx_*
*_Sincerely,_*
*_\[Tenant Name] Team_*
*_\[Tenant Signature]“_*|

column3: BHT Web App - Resources - Products
column4:
As a BHT user, I’m able to purchase medical products such as face masks, gloves, oxygen tank,.. etc. This has a benefit on economic development when we are trying to provide users with expeditious medical solutions in quarantine

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Add a new tab called Products next to Articles
* Both guest and logged user can access Product tab

+_Product list_+

* Display products of BHT default merchant
* A product display includes
** Image
** Name (display ellipsis if its length takes more than 2 lines)
** Discount price
** Original price
* “Add to cart” button
** This is positioned below each product
** Clicking on the button of a product adds that product to cart and display toast message, “Product has been added to shopping cart“
*** In the mean time, the number badge of shopping cart is also increased (more about shopping cart [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-1597|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-1597|smart-link] )
* If there are more than 8 products, there is “View more“ button to see next items
* Search products
** There is a search bar positioned on the top-right corner
** Search products based on their names, including normal letters, special characters, accented languages
** When there is no results, display “No products found“
* Sort by
** This is drop-down menu including 2 options
*** “Price: Low to High“: this is the default sort. This sorts products from lowest to highest price When a product has a discount price, it is sorted by discount price
*** “Price: High to Low“: This sorts products from highest to lowest price. When a product has a discount price, it is sorted by discount price


+_Product details_+

* Clicking on a product name or product image goes to detail page of that product
* There is a back button to return Product page
** If I have searched something before, when clicking on back it keeps the result 
* Product details includes
** Image
** Name
** Description
** Options
* “Add to cart” button
** This is positioned below each product
** Clicking on the button of a product adds that product to cart and display toast message, “Product has been added to shopping cart“
*** In the mean time, the number badge of shopping cart is also increased

Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/36deaada-e95b-453b-b1bc-7c8ef9ac95b7/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/36deaada-e95b-453b-b1bc-7c8ef9ac95b7/|smart-link]

column3: BHT Web App - Logged users - Orders
column4:
As a BHT user, I should have the ability to view my orders even order details. This is beneficial source to keep track what I have ordered

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Add a new menu called Orders to profile menu. It is positioned below “Account“ menu.
* Only logged users can access Orders page
* There are 2 main tabs in Orders page: Processing and Completed

+_Processing tab_+

* Display orders whose delivery methods are Pickup and Delivery and they are not complete
* With {color:#6554c0}*Pick up orders*{color}
** Display following things
*** Store Name
*** Order Number
*** Delivery Type: this is “Pickup“
*** Order Date
*** Order Amount
*** Pickup Address
*** Pickup Time
*** Status: this includes New, Preparing, Ready
*** “Scan to Pickup“ button: clicking on this displays a modal including following things:
**** Store Name
**** QR code
**** Store logo
**** Order Number
**** Order Amount
** When clicking on a pick up order, user goes to the detail of that order, including following things
*** Store Name
*** Order Number
*** Delivery Type: this is “Pickup“
*** Pickup Address
*** Pickup Time
*** Status
*** “Pick up“ button: clicking on this displays a modal as when clicking on “Scan to Pickup“ button
*** The list of items
*** “Total“ area
*** Back button: clicking on this is back to Processing tab
* With {color:#ff5630}*Confirm Delivery orders*{color}
** Display following things
*** Store Name
*** Order Number
*** Delivery Type: this may be “Delivery \[Scan QR Code]“ or “Delivery \[Leave at Door]“
*** Order Date
*** Order Amount
*** Delivery Address
*** Delivery Time
*** Status: this includes New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping
*** “Scan to Confirm Delivery“ button: clicking on this displays a modal including following things:
**** Store Name
**** QR code
**** Store logo
**** Order Number
**** Order Amount
** When clicking on a delivery order, user goes to the detail of that order, including following things
*** Store Name
*** Order Number
*** Delivery Type: this may be “Delivery \[Scan QR Code]“ or “Delivery \[Leave at Door]“
*** Delivery Address
*** Delivery Time
*** Status
*** “Delivery“ button: clicking on this displays a modal as when clicking on “Scan to Confirm Delivery“ button
*** The list of items
*** “Total“ area
*** Back button: clicking on this is back to Processing tab

+_Completed tab_+

* Display orders whose delivery methods are Pickup and Delivery and they are complete
* With {color:#6554c0}*Pick up orders*{color}
** Display information as that in Processing tab but there are no status and “Scan to Pickup“ button
** When clicking on a pick up order, it goes to details of order and displays information as that in Processing tab but status is Completed and there is not “Pick Up“ button

* With {color:#ff5630}*Confirm Delivery orders*{color}
** Display information as that in Processing tab but there are no status and “Scan to Confirm Delivery“ button
** When clicking on a pick up order, it goes to details of order and displays information as that in Processing tab but status is Completed and there is not “Delivery“ button

+_KardPOS and KardOrderDelivery app_+

* Ensure KardPOS and KardOrderDelivery can work functionally when scanning QR code of pickup or delivery orders. It should work the same as Kard did. 

Mockup: see attached images
