column3: BHT Web App - Orders - Order Confirmation email
column4:
As a BHT user or a guest, I’m able to receive email about my order status.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

+_Orders of BHT users_+

* This logic is the same with that in Kard Web.
* With Pickup orders: 
** When the order is just created, status is New, there is no email sent
** When the order status is changed to Preparing, there is an email sent
** When the order status is changed to Ready, there is an email sent
** When the order status is changed to Completed, there is an email sent
* With Delivery orders: 
** When the order is just created, status is New, there is no email sent
** When the order status is changed to Preparing, there is an email sent
** When the order status is changed to Ready, there is an email sent
** When the order status is changed to Shipping, there is an email sent
** When the order status is changed to Completed, there is an email sent

+_Orders of guest_+

* With Pickup orders: 
** When the order is just created, status is New, there is an email sent. Email content includes
*** Order ID
*** Order Date
*** Unit Price
*** Total Price
*** Sub total
*** Tax
*** Total
*** QR code
** When the order status is changed to Preparing, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created.
** When the order status is changed to Ready, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created.
** When the order status is changed to Completed, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created but there is no QR code
** Ensure KardPOS can functionally scan QR Code attached in emails as Kard has worked
* With Delivery orders: 
** When the order is just created, status is New, there is an email sent. Email content includes
*** Order ID
*** Quantity
*** Product Name
*** Unit Price
*** Total Price
*** Sub total
*** Tax
*** Total
*** QR code
** When the order status is changed to Preparing, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created
** When the order status is changed to Ready, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created.
** When the order status is changed to Shipping, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created.
** When the order status is changed to Completed, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created but there is no QR code
** Ensure KardOrderDelivery can functionally scan QR Code attached in emails as Kard has worked

Email Templates:

[^PickupOrderEmail.rar]
[^DeliveryOrderEmail.rar]

column3: BHT Web App - Shopping Cart
column4:
As as BHT user, I should have the ability to access shopping cart where I can see added products and proceed to checkout

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* There is shopping cart icon added to navigation bar
* Re-use logics of shopping cart from[https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-990|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-990|smart-link] 
* Display the list of added products
* On each product, display following things:
** Product image
** Product name
** Price on one unit
** Price on total units
** Quantity-adjusting tool
** Thrash button
* Order Summary section: includes following things
** Sub total
** Tax
** You pay
** Payment Method
** Delivery Method
** “Proceed to checkout“ button


+_Payment method_+

* If I’m a guest, I do not see Pay,ment method
* If I’m a logged user, I see the list of cards that I have added
** I can select one of cards to be payment method
** It only allows Credit Cards usage
** I can select another card by clicking on arrow button. Clicking on arrow buttons displays a modal including added cards.
** I can add a new card by clicking on “Add new card“ button. It only allows adding Credit Cards
** If I have not added any cards, display text link “Select payment method”. When clicking on the link text, display the modal including “Add new card“ button

+_Delivery method_+

* It displays “Select“ text link as default. Clicking on it displays Select Delivery Method modal with 2 methods
** Delivery
*** Both guest and logged user can select this
*** If I’m a guest, selecting Delivery displays a modal including following things
**** Full Name
**** Phone Number
**** Email
**** Shipping Address
**** Receive Order Method: includes 2 radios buttons
***** Scan QR Code (displayed as default)
***** Leave At Door
**** Delivery Date: display date-picker
**** Delivery Time: display time milestones
**** “Confirm” button: display validation text in case I click on the button while fields are blank.
**** Back button: clicking on this is back to Select Delivery Method modal 
**** After clicking on the button, I navigate back to shopping cart. Now, “Select“ text link is changed into “Scan QR Code” or “Leave At Door“ depending on my selected Receive Order Method. Clicking on it displays Select Delivery Method modal again
**** I can update any fields as well
*** If I’m a logged user, it also displays fields as in case of guest but it automatically fills in Full Name, Email. This logic is nearly the same with that in Kard Web app.
** Pickup
*** Both guest and logged user can select this
*** If I’m a guest, selecting Pickup displays a modal including following things
**** Full Name
**** Phone Number
**** Email
**** Pickup Address: display all the locations of merchants
**** Pickup Date: display date-picker
**** Pickup Time:display time milestones
**** “Confirm” button: display validation text in case I click on the button while fields are blank.
**** Back button: clicking on this is back to Select Delivery Method modal 
**** After clicking on the button, I navigate back to shopping cart. Now, “Select“ text link is changed into “Pickup“. Clicking on it displays Select Delivery Method modal again
**** I can update any fields as well
*** If I’m a logged user, it also displays fields as in case of guest but it automatically fills in Full Name, Email. This logic is nearly the same with that in Kard Web app.

+_Shopping Cart rules based on guest and logged users_+

*  As a guest, refreshing page keeps product added until I clear cookies. For instance, a guest has added 4 products then the shopping cart is refreshed. Guest still sees 4 products displayed in cart
* If a guest adds some products to cart then logs in, shopping cart displays products that guest has added. For instance, BHT user (account A) added 4 products to cart then logged out. A guest goes to BHT site and adds 10 products to cart then logs in as account A. After logging in, I see 4 products displayed in cart
* If a BHT user adds some products to cart then logs out, I see nothing in cart

Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/ed6916ee-a9a5-489e-9074-8f7e5e7734fb/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/ed6916ee-a9a5-489e-9074-8f7e5e7734fb/|smart-link]

column3: BHT Web App - Checkout
column4:
As a user experiencing BHT products, I should have the ability to check out based on what I have added to shopping cart.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* {color:#36b37e}*In case of a guest*{color}*,* when I click on “Proceed to checkout“ button in shopping cart, there is a pop-up displayed, including Login form, Pay as Guest button, Register hyperlink
** Login: after logging in successfully, I still stay at shopping cart. Clicking on “Proceed to checkout“ button navigates to Confirm&Payment screen 
*** Confirm&Payment screen includes 
**** Summary section: include Your total (the total price of items), Tax (tax of merchant), You Pay (The total price including tax)
**** Card Image: this is the image of card that I have selected as a payment method
**** “Pay” button: clicking on this completes the payment
*** After payment is complete
**** It leads me to Complete page including order ID displayed
***** There is “Great\!” button. Clicking on this goes to Processing tab of Order page
**** Transactions: it records transaction in Vispay, ARM Merchant, ARM Master, Customer Support, BHT Tenant Admin
***** Transaction Type: Payment
**** Ensure the order is displayed in KardPOS to works functionally as Kard has worked
** Pay as Guest: selecting this navigates to Confirm&Payment screen 
*** There is a back button called Confirm Purchase. Clicking on this is back to shopping cart
*** Confirm&Payment screen includes 
**** Summary section: include Your total (the total price of items), Tax (tax of merchant), You Pay (The total price including tax)
**** Payment Information: this is to enter Credit Card information
**** Billing Address
**** “Shipping Address same as Billing Address“ checkbox
***** When this is selected, it means Shipping Address is the same as Billing Address
***** The default value is SELECTED
***** When this is not selected, display Shipping Address section
**** Shipping Address
**** “Pay <you pay value>” button:
***** Clicking on this completes the payment
***** If I have not selected Payment Method, the button is disabled
***** If there are some fields being blank in Shipping Address or Billing Address section, clicking on the button sees some validation text
*** After payment is complete
**** It leads me to Complete page including order ID displayed
***** There is “Great\!” button. Clicking on this goes to Processing tab of Order page
**** Transactions: it records transaction in Vispay, ARM Merchant, ARM Master, Customer Support, BHT Tenant Admin
***** Transaction Type: Payment
**** Ensure the order is displayed in KardPOS to works functionally as Kard has worked
* {color:#ff5630}*In case of a logged user*{color}, when I click on “Proceed to checkout“ button in shopping cart, it navigates to Confirm&Payment screen. It works functionally as the case guest logs in


+_Confirm&Payment rules based on guest and logged users_+

* As a guest that has added some products, while staying at Confirm&Payment screen, if I log in with BHT user, it navigates back to shopping cart and displays products that guest has added. For instance, a BHT user (account A) added 4 products to cart then logged out. A guest goes to BHT site and adds 6 products then goes to Confirm&Payment screen, if that guest logs in as account A, it’s immediately back to shopping cart and displays 6 products 

Mockup: 

* Logged user: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/9f0b8e09-bc6d-49cf-845a-7f615419c09b/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/9f0b8e09-bc6d-49cf-845a-7f615419c09b/|smart-link] 
* Guest: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/6f22df17-3517-4b30-8130-adda2ed83451/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/6f22df17-3517-4b30-8130-adda2ed83451/|smart-link]

column4:

* Hide the transactions from Wallet page.

!image-20210405-072410.png|width=1612,height=674!

!image-20210405-072434.png|width=1621,height=762!

!image-20210405-064832.png|width=1636,height=1146!

* For the donate transaction, user can click on the row of transaction to open the transaction details page:
** Title: Transaction Type (*Cause2Fund*)
** Amount: *-* *<money amount>* (Ex: - $5,000.00)
** Transaction ID: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- Display an icon next to that allows user to add this transaction ID to clipboard.
** Description:{color:#ff5630} {color}*_“Donate to a project“_*
** Status: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- {color:#ff991f}*Pending* {color}/ {color:#36b37e}*Completed* {color}*/* {color:#ff5630}*Rejected*{color}
** Transaction Date: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- Sample format (Oct 06 at 06:49 PM)
** Remitter:
*** If using Kash Kard to donate: show Kash Kard/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of K.K)
*** If using Credit Card to donate: show Credit Card/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of C.C)
*** If using Bank Account to donate: show Bank Account
** Beneficiary: Merchant Name/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of KK)
** Donate Method: displaying all the methods which has been used to donated
** -Gift Card Name:- *-Gift Card Name-*
** -Gift Card Amount: diplaying the amount of gift card which has been used.-
** -Point Amount: diplaying the amount of points which has been used.-
** -Point Exchange Rate-
** Project: *Project Name*

column3: PathoCare / BHT - Support user donating with bank account (via Plaid or Wire Transfer method)
column4:
As a consumer, I want to be able to donate a project by the added bank account in my wallet.

+*AC:*+

*_For PathoCare / BHT users:_*

* On the project page, user clicks Donate button, then they enter amount to donate.
* User will click Select Payment Method below or the default card to change the method.
* There are two methods that I can use to donate by the bank account, we will apply these two methods with the function and UI as same as loading money from bank account to kash kard.
** *_ACH via Plaid_*
** *_Wire Transfer_*_: For this method:_
*** User can receive the info via an email to transfer money. ([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4072|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4072|smart-link]) 
*** User can be reminded to settle after 24 hours. ([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4053|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4053|smart-link]) 
* After finishing, the transactions will be recorded with Pending status on: 
** Transactions page on the web app
** Transactions page on VisiPay site 
** Transactions page on Admin site
* When the transaction is completed:
** Transaction will be recorded on ARM site (Master Admin and Merchant Admin).
* User can receive the result of transaction (completed or failed) via email ([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4071|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4071|smart-link])

*_For guest users:_*

* The flow will be as same as the one for users.
* Beside entering amount, a guest user needs to enter the email address to receive the relevant emails.

column3: [Backend] - Update the donation with CC using Stripe
column4:
h3. *Description:*

The problem we're trying to solve, is that when a consumer user or a guest user that want to donate to a merchant on Patho Care site for BHT site, they should be able to donate via their Credit Card and the donation will be sent to Merchant’s Stripe account

h3. *Acceptance Criteria:*

GIVEN that I am user of PathoCare or BHT or a guest user of these sites
WHEN I am on donation page
THEN I should be able to sent my donation via Credit Card

----

GIVEN that I am user of PathoCare or BHT or a guest user of these sites
WHEN I am on donation page
AND I sent my donation to the Merchant
THEN this merchant will receive my donation on their Stripe account
AND they will see that they need to pay a fee for Stripe and the processing fee for Visikard, the NET amount that they received
AND the processing fee should be configured on Visipay just like current flow

----

GIVEN that the ARM user
WHEN I am on the transactions page
THEN I should be able to see the transaction list about the donation as currently
AND the fee should be total fee of procession fee and Stripe’s fee

column3: ARM - Stripe account configuration page
column4:
h3. *Description:*

The problem we're trying to solve, is that when a merchant user that providing the donation feature for their users access the Account tab, the should have the ability to connect their Stripe account to our Stripe account so they can receive the donation via Credit cards.

h3. *Acceptance Criteria:*

*Scenario 1: Merchant admin have a place to connect their Stripe account and manage it on ARM*
GIVEN that I am an Merchant admin
WHEN I am on the Payment tab of the Account page
THEN I should now see the new tab on the right of “AirPay“ tab call “Stripe“

----

*Scenario 2: Merchant admin that never connect their Stripe account with Visikard will be able to do that*
GIVEN that I am an Merchant admin
WHEN I am on the Stripe tab
AND my account has not connected with Visikard’s Stripe account
THEN I should see my account status is {color:#ff5630}Not connected{color}
AND A message _“Please connect your Stripe account to get the payments with credit card to this account“_
AND A button {color:#00b8d9}\[Connect]{color}

----

*Scenario 3: Merchant admin connect their Stripe account to Visikard account*
GIVEN that I am an Merchant admin
WHEN I am on the Stripe tab
AND I click on the {color:#00b8d9}\[Connect]{color} button
THEN I should be directed to a page of Stripe so I can login or create a new Stripe account if I don’t have a Stripe account yet
AND after I login
THEN I should be able to fill up my information to complete the connection flow on the Connect Onboarding page: business information, personal information, customer support information, etc.
AND after I complete the flow
THEN I will should redirected back to the previous page on ARM.

----

*Scenario 4: Merchant admin with a pending account*
GIVEN that I am an Merchant admin
WHEN I completed providing all information on the Connect Onboarding page
AND Stripe is verifying my information
AND I go to the Stripe connection page on ARM
THEN I should see my account status is {color:#ff991f}Pending{color}
AND I should see a message “Payments are paused while Stripe tries to verify recently provided details about your account“

----

*Scenario 5: Merchant admin with a restricted account*
GIVEN that I am an Merchant admin
WHEN I have not complete providing my information on the Connect Onboarding or there is information that is failed verified
AND I go to the Stripe connection page on ARM
THEN I should see my account status is {color:#ff5630}Restricted{color}
AND I should see a message “You need to provide more information to Stripe to enable payments on this account“
AND I should see a {color:#00b8d9}\[Update Information]{color} button

----

*Scenario 6: Merchant admin with a restricted account update their information*
GIVEN that I am an Merchant admin
AND my Stripe account status is Restricted
WHEN I click on the {color:#00b8d9}\[Update Information]{color} button 
THEN I should be redirected to the Connect Onboarding page to update my information

----

*Scenario 7: Merchant admin with a completed account*
GIVEN that I am an Merchant admin
WHEN I have provided the required information to fully onboard onto Stripe
AND The information is verified by Stripe
AND I go to the Stripe connection page on ARM
THEN I should see my account status is {color:#36b37e}Completed{color}
AND I should see a message “Your account has provided the required information to fully onboard onto Stripe. You can accept payments.“

----

*Scenario 8: Merchant admin with a connected account with any status*
GIVEN that I am an Merchant admin
WHEN My connected Stripe has one of these status: {color:#36b37e}Completed{color}/{color:#ff5630}Restricted{color}/{color:#ff991f}Pending{color}
AND I go to the Stripe connection page on ARM
THEN I should see a button {color:#00b8d9}\[View Stripe Dashboard]{color}

----

*Scenario 9: Merchant admin with a connected account with any status view the Stripe dashboard*
GIVEN that I am an Merchant admin
WHEN My connected Stripe has one of these status: {color:#36b37e}Completed{color}/{color:#ff5630}Restricted{color}/{color:#ff991f}Pending{color}
AND I go to the Stripe connection page on ARM
AND I click button {color:#00b8d9}\[View Stripe Dashboard]{color}
THEN I should be redirected to the Stripe dashboard.

column3: Kard Affiliate Web App - Affiliate - Member Accounts - FE
column4:
As an Affiliate user, I should have the ability to see all my members including basic information such as full name, email, join date,… etc. This makes a manageable contact with others members.

*Acceptance Criteria:*
There are two main tabs, Affiliate Accounts and Business Accounts

+_Affiliate Accounts_+

* Display the information of the invitees (Referrals) who are signed up to any of the affiliate products (Affiliate, Agency, Driver, Concierge).
* Information of invitees includes the following things:
** User ID
** Full Name
** Business Name
** Email address
** Sales Channel 
*** This always is Kard Affiliate
** Joined date
** Active status
** KYC status.
* There is a search bar
** Search members based on Business Name or Email Address, or Full Name
* There is page size menu


+_Business Accounts_+

* Display the information of the invitees (Referrals) who are signed up to any of the ARM products (Economy, Bronze, Silver, Gold).
* Information of invitees includes the following things:
** User ID
** Full Name
** Business Name
** Email address
** Sales Channel 
*** This always is Kard ARM
** Joined date
** Active status
** KYC status.

* There is a search bar
** Search members based on Business Name or Email Address, or Full Name
* There is page size menu

column3: Kard Affiliate Web App - Affiliate - Products
column4:
As an Affiliate user, I’m be able to view information of packages. This is an benefit of users on suggesting available packages for sales.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* There is a new option on the left panel, called PRODUCTS.
* Accessing PRODUCTS page, there are 2 main tabs, Affiliate Packages and Business Packages
** Affiliate Packages: display Affiliate, Agency, Driver, and Concierge packages, including their benefits.
** Business Packages: display Economy, Bronze, Silver, and Gold packages, including their benefits.


+_Package buying_+

* If I’m a user that has not purchased any Affiliate packages, I’m be able to purchase them.
* Clicking on Select buttons postioned below each Affiliate package navigates to Shopping Cart page 
** I can go to checkout 
** There are some payment methods such as Credit Card, BTC, ETH, Kash Kard


+_Package renewing_+

* If I have purchased an Affiliate package, I’m be able to renew it
* There is a button called Renew postioned below the Affiliate package that I have purchased
** Clicking on the button goes to Shopping Cart page then goes to checkout as normal

column3: Kard Affiliate Web App - Affiliate - Dashboard
column4:
As an Affiliate user via Kard Affiliate platform, I should have the ability to get a dashboard including statistical data such as the number of packages, the percentage of commission,… etc

*Acceptance Criteria*:

+_Bonus sections_+

* There are 2 bonus sections, Monthly Bonus and Bonus Analysis
** Monthly Bonus:
*** This is a column graph
*** Display data of 4 commission types, including
**** Membership Commission
**** One Time Achievement Commission
**** Retail Commission
**** Referral ARM Sale
** Bonus Analysis: this includes the following donut charts
*** Commission Analysis: display the data of 4 commission types, including
**** Membership Commission
**** One Time Achievement Commission
**** Retail Commission
**** Referral ARM Sale
*** Referrals Analysis: display the following data
**** ARM packages including Kard Economy, Kard Bronze, Kard Silver, Kard Gold
**** Kard Affiliate packages including Affiliate, Agency, Driver, Concierge
**** Regular
*** One-time Achievement commission
**** This is a number-counting chart, like a clock
**** Display the total data of commissions on both Affiliate and ARM packages
***** The Total Achievement Bonus on Affiliate packages is $74,000.00
***** The Total Achievement Bonus on ARM packages is $74,000.00
**** Calculate the remaining days until Affilate user reaches $148,000.00
***** For example, I have reached $11,000.00 in total of Affiliate packages and $12,000.00 in total of ARM packages so that both reaches 10,000 volume milstone. Therefore, each one gives user $500.00 so that the total is $500.00+$500.00 = $1,000.00. The remaining part that I have to try is $148,000.00 - $1,000.00 = $147,000.00 so that the text is “$147,000.00 remaining to reach $148,000.00 milestone“

+_Top winner sections_+

* I can see “TOP 5 WINNERS IN SALES“ section
* I can see “TOP 5 WINNERS IN COMMISSIONS“ section

column3: Add the idTransaction into the push notification payload of the Pay Card notification type
column30:
Push type:
Send money to friend: 28, {{idTransaction}} key stored transaction id
Load money/withdraw money from bank account: 53, {{transactionId}} key stored transaction id. It’s old source, so I think we shouldn’t change it if we don’t know the impact of it. If we need to get consistency for transaction key, I’ll change it for send money to friend type [~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] [~accountid:5f83c71bbd30210069cbc5eb] ;[~accountid:5da045fbe881600dc8fd01a5] Please list out what things QC needs to test?

column3: Kard Web - Transactions - Display Exchange Rate
column4:
*Steps:*

# Log in (trikard@yopmail.com/1234@Tps) to [Kard site|https://kard-staging.kardsys.com/].
# Load money from KK to BTC.
# Export CSV in the transaction screen.
# Open file CSV.
# Check the result.

*Actual:* The exchange rate does not display in the CSV FILE.

!image-2021-03-22-14-45-50-617.png|width=200,height=183!

 
*Expected:* Should display the exchange rate in the CSV FILE.

[https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJG1gOoCqrffq2Jma2t?e=E3dxFH|https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJG1gOoCqrffq2Jma2t?e=E3dxFH|smart-link]
column30:
[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] Until now, we do not have an exchange rate on the transaction list & transaction details when loading KK from crypto and vice versa. 

!image-20210322-110031.png|width=1455,height=941!

So when exporting to CSV file, the exchange rate does not show as well. Please define another ticket to handle displaying an exchange rate on the transaction list first. ;[https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJG1gOoCqrffq2Jma2t?e=E3dxFH|https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJG1gOoCqrffq2Jma2t?e=E3dxFH|smart-link] 

[~accountid:5f47923442959b0039d98798] Here is the link which I have noted which transaction needs to be displayed crypto/point amount and the exchange rate, please follow and feedback to me if you have any concerns.

CC: [~accountid:5b43ade2a492e959f3f3248b] [~accountid:6033551b4623c60069994488]

column3: Update email template for ARM

column3: [Android] - Entertainment - Redeem Offer
column4:
+*AC:*+

*For the offer which can be redeemable:*

From the offer detail screen, I can see a button named *Redeem Now*. On tapping, display a confimation pop-up with two options:

* No: close the pop-up, cancel the redeem action.
* Yes: open the Redeem screen.

On Redeem screen, the web view of the offer info details returned from API of Entertainment should be opened, all the info below should be match the one from Entertainment site:

* Business name
* Offer description
* Redemption ID (or barcode or QR code depending on offer type)
* Expiration date
* Entertainment logo
* Store address
* Phone number
* Fine Print
* Rule of Use

Depending on each type of offer, merchant staff can enter offer ID, scan barcode or QR code to redeem for me.

After redeeming successfully, I can tap Done to get back to Offers tab of Marketplace screen, on exactly the category containing the store that I have selected before.

+_Note:_+

If an offer cannot be redeemed, when tapping Redeem button show the message pop-up *_“This offer cannot be redeemed now“._*



+*_Mockup:_*+ 

Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/31ea19e1-27f6-43b6-8385-fee9425427b6-64b9/screen/b8142c30-a43f-45be-bba1-460844c3514e/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/31ea19e1-27f6-43b6-8385-fee9425427b6-64b9/screen/b8142c30-a43f-45be-bba1-460844c3514e/|smart-link] 

Web: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/56fedcd6-27b3-4b7e-b473-946f9ecba138-03ad/screen/6570a970-4bd2-4738-828f-594c6aca6290/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/56fedcd6-27b3-4b7e-b473-946f9ecba138-03ad/screen/6570a970-4bd2-4738-828f-594c6aca6290/|smart-link]

column3: ARM - KYC Form - Allow multiple business owners
column4:
As a system admin, I want merchants to be able to specify the information of multiple owners who own more than 25% the company.

* Merchant can submit multiple owners in KYC form. 
* Title field is required for Business Owner. (*updated on Mar 24 2021*)
* Merchant can remove owner that they do not need anymore. In case there’s only one owner left, they cannot remove.
* When resubmitting KYC, merchant can add or remove owner as normal.
* Master admin can see the information of multiple owners on KYC Verification screen.
* Visipay admin can see the information of multiple owners on Users list too.

+*_Mockup:_*+

Submit form: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b825d31e-b7c6-452f-4b9e-d4a144485670-ce14/screen/f0318613-9f11-4524-8b99-e9b59b738145/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b825d31e-b7c6-452f-4b9e-d4a144485670-ce14/screen/f0318613-9f11-4524-8b99-e9b59b738145/|smart-link]

VisiPay: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/e2bac202-2355-48c5-b79c-929d4b0feda3-b7e9/screen/f9cdfb42-5cd2-48ed-aaa3-94f3c9c208f6/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/e2bac202-2355-48c5-b79c-929d4b0feda3-b7e9/screen/f9cdfb42-5cd2-48ed-aaa3-94f3c9c208f6/|smart-link]

column3: New Kard App - Push Notifications - Receiving message and handle click event on notifications

* Successful to load money to KK from a bank account
* Unsuccessful to load money to KK from bank account
* Successful withdrawing money from KK from a bank account
* Failed to withdraw money from KK from a bank account
* Withdraw cash at store
* Pay with QR - POS scan QR code from consumer app (Silent push notification)

Refer to this document for the notification detail requirement: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/edit-v2/210173981|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/edit-v2/210173981|smart-link]

column3: ARM Merchant - Configure Default Business Location
column4:
As a merchant, I need to be able to configure a business location as a default one.

+*AC:*+

I login to ARM by merchant admin role.

I click Business Locations item on left menu to open business location page.

At Location tab, on the table of added locations, I want to have one more *Default* icon Default beside edit icon on Action column. I can select a location and check to set that location as a default one. When being selected, the icon should be highlighted.

On Search screen of mobile / web app, if user searches a business, show the store of the default location I have configured in ARM.

+*_Mockup:_*+[https://xd.adobe.com/view/c7b27a1e-283f-4c44-a0b5-05fc3ed5a5c3-92e1/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/c7b27a1e-283f-4c44-a0b5-05fc3ed5a5c3-92e1/|smart-link]

!image-20210316-022820.png|width=1620,height=725!

column3: [Backend] - Consumer App - Store Detail - Filter by Business Location
column4:
As a consumer, I want to be able to view the products, gift cards and promotions at a business location on Store Detail screen.

+*AC:*+

*From Marketplace screen*

I select a store to open the store detail screen of the selected business location.

On Store Detail screen:

* I can see the address info as the location I have selected from Marketplace.
* At Home tab:
** Each konnect zone category below should be filtered by the business location.
** For the category of products, coupons, specials: all the items inside should be filtered by the business location.
* At Products tab: I can see the list of products filtered by the business location.
* At Gift Cards tab: I can see the list of gift cards filtered by the business location.
* At Offers tab: I can see the list offers filtered by the business location.

*From Search screen*

I can search and open the store detail screen of the default business location that I have configured in ARM ([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-3488|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-3488|smart-link]).

On Store Detail screen, at Home / Products / Gift Cards tab, show all konnect zone categories, products and gift cards as normal without filtering by any business locations.

column3: [Backend] - Entertainment - Saved Offers
column4:
+*AC:*+

On this screen, I can see the list of stores which I have saved offers from, with some below info:

* Business image
* Store name
* Store address
* The number of saved offers (from the current store)
* I can see the distance from my location to the store address.
* The list of stores should be sort by the nearest location (from top downwards)
* If the list is empty, show the message at center: *_“No saved offers found“_*

On selecting any stores, I can open the store detail screen ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1445|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1445|smart-link]), but there are only saved offers displayed on that screen.

Please show gift card value instead of gift card name.

column3: [Android] - Entertainment - Offers detail
column4:
+*AC:*+

* On the screen, I can see some below info:
** At the top-right corner, I want to have an icon which I can tap to save the offer or untap to remove the saved offer:
*** Save: show the toast message *_“Offer saved\!“_*
*** Unsave: show the toast message *_“Offer unsaved\!“_*
** Business image
** Entertainment logo
** Business name
** Offer description
** The note for user “THIS SCREEN IS NOT THE COUPON“, so I can know that the current screen is not the coupon yet.
** Offer Details: Display the info returned from API of Entertainment
*** Fine Print
**** Disclaimer
**** Offer ID
** Store Information
*** Store address: Display the address and an icon which I can tap to open the map application with the location defined on it.
*** Phone number: Display the phone number and an icon which I can tap to open the phone app to contact the store.

+*_Mockup:_*+

column3: [BE] Kanoo Admin - Settlement Calculator
column4:
+*AC:*+

On Settlement Settings page, I want to have a button named *Preview*. After I configure the revenue sharing, I can click to preview the table of revenue statistis for each member in a group.

The table will be shown on a pop-up:

* Title: *Revenue Sharing Preview*
* Three fields to enter amount
** Base Amount: default $0.00
** Additional Fee: default $0.00
** Total Amount: default $0.00
* *Check* button: On clicking, the table is shown below.
* Table content: 

!Screen Shot 2021-03-02 at 14.50.23.png|width=50%!

*Revenue Sharing Flow*

* When the payment has been made, the amount of money will be allocated and deposited into the revenue-sharing accounts based on the configuration of each Fee type and the selected Payor & Payees. See the payment flow example below for details:
** I assume that I have created group A with 4 members: 1 Owner, 1 Service Provider, and 2 Partners. Three fee types are configured for this group as below:

_1.Reservation fee:_ 

* Payor: User. 
* Source: Total amount
* Payees: Owner, partner 1, partner 2, Kanoo, Service Provider.

||*No*||*Member Name*||*Type*||*Fee*||*Fee VAT(%)*||
|1|BTCU (partner)|Fixed Amount|B$0.50|0%|
|2|Uni-ride  (Owner)|Fixed Amount|B$1.00|23%|
|3|MOBI (partner)|Fixed Amount|B$3.00|12%|
|4|Kanoo|Fixed Amount|B$0.75|12%|
|5|Driver (Service Provider)|Fixed Amount|B$1.00|0%|



_2.Service fee:_ 

* Payor: Service Provider
* Source: Base amount
* Payees: Owner, partner 1, Kanoo

||*No*||*Member Name*||*Type*||*Fee*||*Fee VAT(%)*||
|1|Uni-ride  (Owner)|Percentage (%)|1.50%|12%|
|2|MOBI (partner)|Percentage (%)|2.25%|12%|
|3|Kanoo|Percentage (%)|0.50%|12%|



_3.Processing fee:_ 

* Payor: Uni-ride (Owner)
* Source: Total amount
* Payees: Kanoo 

||*No*||*Member Name*||*Type*||*Fee*||*Fee VAT(%)*||
|1|Kanoo|Percentage (%)|4.00%|12%|

* The customer pays for Uni-ride (Owner) $48.00, including a $3.00 Parking fee (Additional fee).  
** Based on the allocated Reservation fee, the system will take $6.25 for Fee, and $0.75 for VAT on the Booking fee from the amount paid by the customer. This amount will be shared among entities (Payees). The remaining amount = Total amount - Reservation fee = 48 - 6.25 - 0.75 = $41.00.
!image-20201214-104340.png|width=855,height=139!
** The system will take $3.00 as an Additional fee and pay to Service Provider. The remaining amount = 41 - 3 = $38.00. This amount will be sent to Driver (Service Provider).
** Then based on the allocated Service fee, the system will calculate based on Base amount ($38.00) then share among entities (Payees), $1.62 for Fee and $0.19 for VAT. The remaining amount = 38 - 1.62 - 0.42 = $36.19. 
!image-20201214-105458.png|width=858,height=138!
** Driver (Service Provider) will take $2.15 ($1.92 for Fee, $0.23 for VAT) and pay to Payees as a Processing fee. This fee is calculated based on Total amount ($48.00) as configured. The remaining amount = 36.19 - 1.92 - 0.23 = $34.04.
!image-20201214-105856.png|width=871,height=146!
** Summary:
*** Driver (Service Provider) will receive total = 34.04 + 3 (Additional fee) + 1 (Reservation fee) = *$38.04*.
*** Uni-ride (Owner) will receive total = 1.30 (Reservation fee) + 0.64 (Service fee) = *$1.94*.
*** Kanoo will receive total = 0.84 (Reservation fee) + 0.21 (Service fee) + 2.15 (Processing fee)= *$3.20*.
*** BTCU (Partner) will receive total = 0.50 (Reservation fee) = *$0.50*.
*** MOBI (Partner) will receive total = 3.36 (Reservation fee) + 0.96 (Service fee) = *$4.32*.

column3: ARM Merchant - Account - Display KYC status and KYC information
column4:
+*AC:*+

On Account page (Payment tab):

Display KYC Status besides Business Cash Card. ({color:#36b37e}*Approve* {color}/ {color:#ff991f}*Pending* {color}/ {color:#ff5630}*Rejected*{color} / {color:#ff5630}*Not Verified*{color})

Button: *Verify / View KYC Info*. 

* The Verify button will be displayed for *Not Verified* and *Rejected* statuses. On clicking, merchant can be navigated to the KYC form page:
** Not Verified: Display the KYC form as the first time submission.
** Rejected: Each field on KYC form is pre-filled from the previous time when merchant submitted. Merchant can edit.
* The View KYC Info button will be displayed for *Approve* and *Pending* statuses. On clicking, merchant can be navigate to the KYC form page:
** Approve: 
*** Show the text at top *_“KYC is verified“_*
*** KYC form displays fully all the fields and only in view mode.
*** Keep the document file and image.
*** If merchant selected Corporation type, combine Company Information and Representative Information as one page.
** Pending:
*** Show the text at top *_“KYC is pending“_*
*** KYC form displays fully all the fields and only in view mode.
*** Keep the document file and image.
*** If merchant selected Corporation type, combine Company Information and Representative Information as one page.

!image-20210301-044847.png|width=1032,height=516!

column3: [BE] Kanoo Admin - Settlement Group Detail - Add/Update
column4:
As a Kanoo admin, I want to be able to configure the revenue sharing groups about participants, sharing configuration.

+*AC:*+

I login to Kanoo Admin site by admin role.

On Settlements page, I click Edit Group to open the configuration page:

*Participants List*

I can see a table displaying the list of partipants of the group. The table includes below columns:

* Type: Displaying the participant type which can be
** Owner
** Service Provider
** Partner
* Name: Displaying as
** *Service Provider* (fixed): If the type is Service Provider
** *\[Business Name]*: If the type is Owner or Partner
* Action:
** When the table is in Edit mode
*** *Save:* On clicking, save the new participant or save the info of existing participant.
*** *Cancel:* On clicking, remove the added participant or cancel the edit action.
** When the table is in View mode
*** *Edit:* On clicking, show two buttons Save and Cancel. (refer to AC above)
*** *Remove:* On clicking, the selected participant should be removed.

I can add a new participant to the group by clicking Add Participant button, one more row is added temporarily on the table below the default row of Owner:

* Type: 
** Default value: *Select Type*
** When clicking, display the list of types as a drop-down list including
*** Service Provider
*** Partner
* Name:
** Default value: *Select Business*
** If the selected type is Service Provider, the name should be Service Provider (fixed value).
** If the selected type is Partner, display the list of Kanoo businesses (merchants):
*** The list only displays merchants which are active in Kanoo system.
*** I can search by name. If no results found, show the message *_“No businesses found“_*
*** I can select only one merchant. If merchant A is selected already, selecting merchant B will auto deselect merchant A.
* Action:
** Save: Save the participant on the table_._ If Type or Name is not selected yet, the button should be disabled.
*** A group can only have 1 service provider, if I add participant duplicating one of these role, show the red message below the table: *_“The service provider already exists in this group.“_*_._
*** The owner of each group must be unique, if I add owner for another group, show the red message *_“This merchant is already the owner of another group.“_*
** Note that two above rules will be validated when clicking Save Settings button.
** Cancel: Remove the added row. The action is cancelled.

{color:#00b8d9}+*_Note:_*+{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}

{color:#00b8d9}*_By default, the owner role is always available when creating a group. Admin only needs to select the business (Name) for this type._*{color}

{color:#00b8d9}*_Admin cannot remove the owner from a group._*{color}

*Splitting Configuration*

Below the pariticipants list, I can configure the revenue sharing. I can see a button named *Add Fee*. On clicking, a splitting fee configuration table should be added temporarily.

On the splitting fee, I can select Fee Type, Source, Payor and Payee. Each field will be display as a drop-down list:

* Title: *Splitting Fee n* (Ex: Splitting Fee 1, Splitting Fee 2…)
* Fee Type: Default value: *Select Fee Type*
** Processing Fee
** Reservation Fee
** Sevice Fee
* Source: Default value: *Select Source*
** Base Amount
** Total Amount
** Additional Amount
* Payor: displaying the list of participants to select including User (except Kanoo). Default value: *Select Payor*
* Payee(s):
** The payee list displayed as a table including columns:
*** Payee Name: displaying the list of participants to select including Kanoo (except User). Default value: *Select Payee*
*** Type: Default value: *Select Type*
**** Percentage (%): the charged fee should be splitted by percentage for each participant
**** Fixed Amount (B$): the charged fee should be splitted by fixed amount for each participant
*** Value: Displaying a field to enter percentage or amount. Default value: *0*. I can only number (integers or decimals)
*** VAT (%): Displaying a field to enter VAT percentage. Default value: *0*. I can only number (integers or decimals)
*** Action:
**** Remove: I can remove each payee row from the table.

I can remove the splitting fee configuration table by clicking *Delete*.

I can expand or collapse the splitting fee configuration table.

I can add new payee by clicking *Add Member* button.

At bottom, there are two buttons:

* *Save Settings:* On clicking:
** I can save a new group just added with a toast message *_“Group added\!“_*, then I should be navigated back to Setttlements page.
** I can save all configuration settings of the group with a toast message *_“Group settings saved\!“_*, then I should be navigated back to Setttlements page.
* *Cancel:* On clicking, the create action or edit action on this page is cancelled, then I should be navigated back to Setttlements page.

{color:#00b8d9}+*_Note:_*+{color}

{color:#00b8d9}*In a splitting fee configuration table, admin cannot add two row of payee having the same name, (Ex: If I added Uni-ride for the first row of payee, the next rows of payee should not contain “Uni-ride“ again)*{color}

{color:#00b8d9}*Admin cannot add multiple Splitting Fee configuration having the same fee type. (Ex: If I added already a splitting fee configuration with fee type “Service Fee“, the next fee configurations should not contain “Service Fee“ again)*{color}

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/6eec9a9d-f667-4506-9597-57f6f8ebf9a5|https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/6eec9a9d-f667-4506-9597-57f6f8ebf9a5|smart-link]
column30:
FE:

# Group name
# Add Members into group
# Add settlement configurations
# Group status

BE:

# API get group detail
# API add/update group
## Name
## members list
## Settlement configuration (Splitting configurations) list

column3: [BE] Kanoo Admin - Transactions for Merchant view
column4:
As a participant of the revenue sharing group, I want to view the transaction history after the transaction is completed successfully.

+*AC:*+

I login to the site by merchant role.

On Transactions page:

* Display the list of main transactions (from Uni-Ride to my merchant) after the transaction is completed:
* The transaction table includes columns:
** Transaction ID
** Owner Name
** Total Amount: Displaying the amount which user paid finally, format: *B$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: B$48.00)
** Revenue Amount: Displaying the final amount which I got, format: *B$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: B$48.00)
** Transaction Date: Display the date when the transaction is made, sample format: Mar 01, 2021, 13:22

* I can search by Transaction ID, Reference ID (*updated on Mar 29, 2021*)
* I can filter by date range
* I can export CSV:
** The CSV file should contain the transaction details list from all main transactions.
** I can only export CSV with maximum 3 months, if the filter range is more than that, show the message pop-up *_“This feature only supports maximum 3 months in range.“_*
* On some columns (Remitter and Transaction Date) I can sort
** By alphabet (a-z / z-a) 
** By the created date (latest to oldest / oldest to latest)
* By default, the table is sorted by the latest created date from top downwards. 

When clicking the button on each row of transaction, I can open the transaction details page. On that page:

* Display the list of transaction in details:
** For the participant which is a partner of the group: they can see the transactions of fee paying from other participants to them.
** For the participant which is an owner of the group: they can see the transactions of fee paying from all participants to each other.
* The transaction table includes columns:
** Transaction ID
** Reference ID: display the transaction ID of the selected main transaction
** Remitter: Displaying the name of fee payor
** Remitter Card: Displaying the last four digits of Cash Card / Sand Dollar
** Category: 
*** *Reservation Fee*
*** *Service Fee*
*** *Processing Fee*
** Total Amount: Displaying the total of fee amount (after VAT).
** VAT: Displaying the amount of fee VAT.
** Payment Method:
*** *Cash Card:* if the transaction is paid by cash card or gift cash card.
*** *Credit Card:* if the transaction is paid by credit card (only for Guest)
*** *Sand Dollar:* if the transaction is paid by sand dollar card
** Transaction Date: Display the date when the transaction is made.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/f7f7dc1d-f0d1-4ded-a3c3-6e54dd11476c/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/f7f7dc1d-f0d1-4ded-a3c3-6e54dd11476c/|smart-link]

column3: [BE] Kanoo Admin - Transactions for Admin view
column4:
As a Kanoo admin, I want to view the transaction history of sharing groups after the transaction is completed successfully.

+*AC:*+

On Transactions page:

* Display the list of main transactions (from User to Uni-ride (owner)) after the transaction is completed:
* The transaction table includes columns:
** Transaction ID
** Reference ID
** Status: Completed / Failed
** Beneficiary: *Uni-ride*
** Remitter: Displaying user name (Kanoo consumer who made transaction)
** Additional Amount: Displaying the amount of additional fee (parking fee, toll fee…), format: *B$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: B$3.00)
** Gross Amount: Displaying the amount of orginal sale price. format: *B$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: B$38.00)
** Total Amount: Displaying the amount which user has to pay finally, format: *B$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: B$48.00)
** Payment Method:
*** *Cash Card:* if the transaction is paid by cash card or gift cash card.
*** *Credit Card:* if the transaction is paid by credit card (only for Guest)
*** *Sand Dollar:* if the transaction is paid by sand dollar card
** Transaction Date: Display the date when the transaction is made, sample format: *Mar 01, 2021, 13:22*
* I can search by Beneficiary, Remitter, Transaction ID, Reference ID
* I can filter by date range
* I can export CSV:
** The CSV file should contain the transaction details list from all main transactions.
** I can only export CSV with maximum 3 months, if the filter range is more than that, show the message pop-up *_“This feature only supports maximum 3 months in range.“_*
* On some columns (Beneficiary, Remitter and Transaction Date) I can sort it 
** By alphabet (a-z / z-a) 
** By the created date (latest to oldest / oldest to latest)
* By default, the table is sorted by the latest created date from top downwards. 

When clicking the button on each row of transaction, I can open the transaction details page. On that page:

* Display the list of transaction which User or Driver pays the fee splitting for the remaining participants.
* The transaction table includes columns:
** Transaction ID
** Reference ID: display the transaction ID of the selected main transaction
** Beneficiary: Displaying the name of fee payee: group participants (except User)
** -Beneficiary Card: Displaying the last four digits of-
*** -Cash Card: if user made payment by cash card, gift cash card or credit card.-
*** -Sand Dollar Card: if user made payment by sand dollar card.-
** Remitter: Displaying the name of fee payor
** -Remitter Card: Displaying the last four digits of Cash Card-
** Category: 
*** *Base Cost*
*** *Reservation Fee*
*** *Service Fee*
*** *Processing Fee*
** Additional Amount: Displaying the amount of additional fee (parking fee, toll fee…)
** Total Amount: Displaying the total of fee amount (after VAT).
** VAT: Displaying the amount of fee VAT.
** -Payment Method:-
*** *-Cash Card-*
*** *-Gift Cash Card-*
*** *-Credit Card-*
*** *-Sand Dollar-*
** Transaction Date: Display the date when the transaction is made.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/3c9e97ff-196f-4813-8222-0cbd38a9c50d|https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/3c9e97ff-196f-4813-8222-0cbd38a9c50d|smart-link]

column3: [BE] Kanoo Admin - Settlement groups list
column4:
As a Kanoo admin, I want to be able to create a new group for revenue sharing among stakeholders.

+*AC:*+

I login to Kanoo Admin site, on the list of left menu items, I can click *Settlements* item to open Settlements page.

On Settlements page, I can see:

* A table of created sharing groups including columns:
** Group Name: displaying the name of group, show maximum in 1 line, if the name is too long, use ellipsis, I can hover the mouse point to view full.
** Owner Name: displaying the owner name of group, show maximum in 1 line, if the name is too long, use ellipsis, I can hover the mouse point to view full.
** Participants: displaying the number of members.
** Status: Active / Inactive. When the status is Active, the revenue sharing works normally. Otherwise, it’ll not work, the transaction amount is only shared for the owner. 
** Create Date: displaying the created date, sample format: *Mar 05, 2021*
** Action:
*** Edit Group
*** Activate / Deactivate
*** Delete
* I can create a new group.
* I can search groups by group name, owner name.
* I can filter groups by status.
* On each column (except Action) I can sort:
** By alphabet (a-z / z-a) 
** By number (smallest to largest / largest to smallest)
** By the created date (latest to oldest / oldest to latest)
* By default, the table is sorted by the latest created date from top downwards. 

*_Create New Group_*

I click New Group button to open a new page to create a group.

On the new page:

* I can input the group name at top. 
** Default value: *Group Name*
** The group name must be unique. If duplicating, show the red message *_“The group with this name exists already. Please use another name.“_*
** If the group name is empty, show the red message *_“Group name is required.“_*
** Max length: 60 characters (including spaces). If exceeding, show the red message *_“Group name cannot be more than 60 characters.“_*_._ If the name has space characters at the beginning or end, it should be auto trimmed.
* I can add / edit / remove participants.
* I can configure sharing: Add / edit / remove splitting fee configuration.
* At bottom of page, I can click *Save Settings* button to save the group, show a toast message *_“Group added\!“_*, after that I should be navigated to Settlements page.

*Edit Group*

I click Edit Group from Action column to open the editting page.

The UI should be as same as when creating group.

On the page:

* I can edit the group name. The new name must follow the same rule when creating new group.
* I can edit the list of participants.
* I can edit configuration of splitting for each participant.

*Activate / Deactivate*

When the status is Active, I can deactivate the group by clicking Deactivate from Action column:

* Show the toast message *“Group deactivated\!“*
* Update the status from Active to Inactive.

When the status is Inactive, I can deactivate the group by clicking Deactivate from Action column:

* Show the toast message *“Group activated\!“*
* Update the status from Inactive to Active.

*Delete*

I click Delete from Action column to delete a group.

When clicking, show the confirmation pop-up *_“Are you sure to delete the group \[Group Name]?“_* with two buttons:

* Delete: closing the pop-up and deleting the group, show a toast message *_“Group deleted\!“_*
* Cancel: closing the pop-up, the action is cancelled.

+_Note:_+

If the Settlementspage has no groups at all or no searching results, show the message *_“No Groups Found.“_*

+*Mockup:*+ 

[https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/bf207ea6-01c7-473a-b708-62c17f58e090|https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/bf207ea6-01c7-473a-b708-62c17f58e090|smart-link]

column3: Visikard Admin - Dashboard - Fee Report
column4:
As a Visikard Admin, I want to see the statistics report for Fee.

+*AC:*+

*Fee Report*

* I can select to review the report of a month or a year. 
** All: it will show the total of each year from the beginning to the current year. 
** Default is the current month.
* I can select multiple Fee types to view the report.
* I can see the total fee for the selected month or year.
* The list of fee types include:
** Load Fee
*** Load money from Credit Card to Kash Kard
*** Load money from Bank Account to Kash Kard
*** Load money from Crypto Card to Kash Kard
*** Load money from Kash Kard to Crypto Card
** Withdraw Fee:
*** Withdraw cash from Kash Kard
*** Withdraw to Bank Account from Kash Kard
*** Withdraw from Crypto Card
** Transfer Fee
*** Transfer money from consumer to consumer (kash kard / crypto card)
*** Transfer money from merchant to merchant
** Merchant Processing Fee
** Refund Fee
** Mastercard Fee
*** Create a Mastercard
* I can export the statistic report to the pdf file. (*updated on Mar 22, 2021*)

+*_Mockup:_*+[https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|smart-link]

column3: ARM Master - Merchant Accounts - Resend KYC email
column4:
As a master admin, I would like to resend KYC email for merchants in case they miss the previous email or they forget to submit KYC before.

+*AC:*+

* I login to ARM site by master admin role.
* On Merchant Accounts page, at Merchant Management tab, I want to have one more column named *KYC* before *Action*.
* On this column:
** Display the current KYC status of merchant: 
*** Not Verified
*** Approved
*** Rejected
*** Pending
*** Inapplicable (if merchant registers an account with Free package)
** Display the *Resend* button:
*** Select Action: send again the KYC email to merchant, 
**** If sending successfully, show the message pop-up *_“KYC request email has been sent successfully.“_*
**** If sending unsuccessfully, show the message pop-up *_“KYC request email has been sent unsuccessfully.“_*
*** This button is only displayed if merchant hasn’t submitted KYC yet (*Not Verified*) or KYC status is *Rejected*, which their KYC request is not available at KYC Verification tab. For the KYC status *Approve*, *Pending*, and *Inapplicable*, this button should be hidden.
*** Resend email content:
**** *Not Verified*: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2695|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2695|smart-link] 
**** *Rejected*: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2696|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2696|smart-link]

column3: [iOS]  Spike - Consumer App -  Message Notification
column4:
Requirement: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-3140|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-3140]

[https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/ios/push-notifications-ios|https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/ios/push-notifications-ios]
column30:
[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843]

We can push notification to user by using push notification with Twilio Chat Service when:

* A new message (This is sent to all members within a Channel when a new Message is posted to the Channel)
* -Add to channel (This is sent to Users that have been added to a Channel)-
* -Invited to channel (This is sent to Users that have been invited to join a Channel)-
* -Removed from channel (This is sent to Users that have been removed from a Channel they were a Member of)-

Each of the Push Notification types has a default template for the payload (or notification body) but we can be overridden per Service instance via the Push Notification configuration. The configuration allows each notification type to be enabled or disabled.

*TO-DO*

*Backend:*

* Add credential SID to the Access Token Chat grant for iOS endpoints request tokens.

*Mobile:*

* Provisioning Apple Developer credentials for APN Pushes
* Integrating and Register Push Notification when upon client startup
* Handle new push notification type and open chat screen when tapped on notification 

[https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/push-notification-configuration|https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/push-notification-configuration]
[https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/ios/push-notifications-ios|https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/ios/push-notifications-ios];[~accountid:5f211dfac9c094001c5fc901] Thanks Hung, you did a great job on this item\!

column3: [Android] Spike - Consumer App -  Message Notification
column4:
Requirement: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1823|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1823]

[https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/android/push-notifications#push-notifications-on-android|https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/android/push-notifications#push-notifications-on-android]
column30:
We can receive notifications from anyone's messages, pushes from Twilio. With such a message we can pull out a lot of data, where {{sid_id}} is what we really need, to know who the sender is.

Based on this Spike we can do these in AC:

*  *_For Direct Message_*_:_ {color:#00b8d9}*_“\[Friend’s Name] just sent a message“_* {color}_(Ex: John Smith sent a message)_
* *_For Group Message:_* {color:#00b8d9}*_“\[Friend’s Name] just sent a message“_*{color} _(Ex: John Smith sent a message)_
* *_Tap on the notification_*_, I should be directed to the conversation screen with that friend or the group and I can see the latest message that he/she sent to me._
* *_Get message notification only when I hide the app to background_* _or the app is not being launched._

The things we need to do to get the above things are like:

# Enable push Notification chat feature of Twilio on web.
# Upload your API Key to Twilio, to generate an {{pushCredentialSid}} and from FCM SECRET.
# Provide {{pushCredentialSid}} for BE to config.
# Setup and register FCM Token for Chat feature of Twilio, when the user login to the app successfully.
#  Handle and add type to receive notifications of Twilio in FCM Service.

* Link for config on Android: [https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/android/push-notifications#push-notifications-on-android|https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/android/push-notifications#push-notifications-on-android]

* Link for config on BE: [https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/push-notification-configuration|https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/push-notification-configuration]

column3: [Backend] - Visikard Admin - Gift Card Catalog - Show all gift cards
column4:
As an Admin I want to be able to see all gift cards including ARM and Incomm ones on Gift Card Catalog page instead of seeing the gift cards associated with merchants only as now.

* Merchant and Discount columns are empty for gift cards that don't belong to any merchant. This happens for Incomm gift cards only because they are not associated to any merchant when getting from Incomm server.
* Disable a gift card - make sure that it is not showed on Online tab and other places of selling gift cards like Konnect Category, Marketplace of Points.
* I want to be able to filter gift cards by type (In-Store, Incomm) like Gift Card Report page.
* I can search gift cards by name or business name.
* On Brand column, I want to view merchant detail of a gift card that is associated with a merchant. Otherwise, show Brand provided by Incomm if it is available. We can reuse the merchant detail form that we have from Visipay if possible. Otherwise, we can show the basic information for the associated merchant.

+*_Mockup:_*+[https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/screen/3297d28e-3254-421b-bacc-678a94a6b4c9/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/screen/3297d28e-3254-421b-bacc-678a94a6b4c9/|smart-link]

column3: Visikard/Tenant Admin Report - Dashboard - Transaction Statistics
column4:
As a VisiKard admin, I want to be able to view the transaction statistics on Dashboard page of VisiKard Admin site.

+*AC:*+

*Transaction Statistics*

* I want to have the chart displaying the transaction statistics.
* I want to have the filter set including:
** Tenant: Displaying as drop-down list field, which contains all available tenants in system. The default value is *All*.
** Type: 
*** Displaying as a drop-down list field, which contains all the transaction types from Transactions page. The default value is *Card Purchase*.
*** I can select multiple tenants to filter.
** View Mode: A drop-down list field contains two options:
*** By Year: I can select a year that I want to view the chart. The default value is the current year.
*** By Month: I select a month of the current year to view the chart. The default value is the current month.
* On the chart:
** If I select By Year view mode:
*** I can see the list of 12 months of the selected year being displayed as the column.
*** Each column is a month, which displays the total of transaction amount in that month.
** If I select By Month view mode:
*** I can see the list of days of the selected month in year displayed as the column.
*** Each column is a date, which displays the total of transaction amount on that date.
** I can see the total of revenue from All transactions by year or by month depending on what view mode I select.
** I can export the chart to pdf file.
* -Add Payment Method with below options to display the total amount of transactions that have- *-Remitter-* -or- *-Beneficiary-* -to be the selected method.-
** -Kash Kard-
** -Credit Card-
** -ETH-
** -BTC-
** -ZVC-
** -Bank-

+_Notes_+

No change for New Users -  the designer will correct the mockup because there is some change for these sections in the new mockup.



+*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|smart-link]

We also need to be able to select multiple values of Payment Method too.

Please also add a button to export each report section to PDF.;[~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] I already fixed the comment, please check: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|smart-link] ;[~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] For Visikard Admin dashboard view, we need to select a tenant to see the reports or select all tenants to view for all tenants. column3: Security issue - Create annotation to prevent consumer user access admin's APIs
column4: Currently the consumer user can call the APIs of admin user i.e load list users, load list transaction. We need to prevent them by adding the annotation which allow the visikard admin only
column30: Scope of this ticket is creating the annotation, NOT applying it for the current APIs

column3: Security issue - review internal APIs
column4:
Currently we are adding API key to header of API automatically. We need to stop this action because it's breaking the security. To stop it we have to check:
- Recheck the exclude list in each service, currently only the exclude list in api service working
- Manual add the API key for all internal APIs
- Add text "/internal/" into the internal APIs to let devops blocks the outside calling

column3: Security issue - Do not push the sensitive data to third party
column4:
Currently we are passing the header (token, API key, deviceId and also the user info) in the header to third party when calling them. Please check and ignore them before sending out

We have the flag to ignore them already, please double check and add them into your methods

There are:

* PrimeTrust
* APNS (apple)
* Google cloud message or firebase or pax notification
* Comdata
* Davinci
* Incomm
* Gift tango(still have the source code but we do not use it anymore)
* Entertainment (in future)
* Redfin
* Switchcommerce
* [Authorize.net|http://Authorize.net]
* Idology, Usio,[ACH.com|http://ACH.com] (still have the source code but we do not use it anymore)
* Twilio
* Kanoo
* AWS (S3)
* JWPlayer
* CoinLayer
* ACH
* Plaid
* QuickCard
* Others (Rtui, Ommi card, blackhawk..) - Do not know about it

column4:
As a customer, I want to be able to configure the settings to receive notifications from the system.

+*AC:*+

* I want to have a button/link from Notifications screen to open Notification Setting screen or I can open from left menu.
* On this screen, I can turn on / turn off one by one type or all types of notifications that I want to get:
** *By default:*, Enable Notifications and the types below are on.
** When Enable Notifications is on:
*** I can turn on / off the notification types below.
*** The app will remember my previous settings and turn on exactly what I turned on before.
** When Enable Notifcations is off, the notification types below are disabled.
* Types of notification.
** [Profile|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Profile]
** [Pay Card|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Pay-Card]

column3: [BE] - Consumer App - Notifications UI
column4:
As a customer, I want to view my Notifications screen more clearly and easier to keep track.

+*AC:*+

* Update the UI and content on Notifications screen: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|smart-link] (*Only update the available notification types in this scope)*
* I can filter my notifications:
** Types:
*** [Profile|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Profile]: display the notifications of connection with consumer or merchant and KYC verification.
*** [Pay Card|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Pay-Card]: display the notification of transactions (send/receive money, load money, withdraw money, refund, 
*** [Gift Card|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Gift-Card]: display the notification of receiving gift card from friend or merchant.
*** [Promotion|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Promotion]: display the notification of receiving coupon, new coupon / promotion from merchant and point reward
*** [Order|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Order]: display the notification of order status updated
** When using filter, I can see the selected type displayed above the list. I can click Show All to view all notifications as before.
* Each notification will be shown with read and unread status in the list:
** The notifications which is unread, the background is blue.
** The notification can be updated to Read when:
*** Tap banner notification (system).
*** Tap notification on the Notifications screen.
*** Tap Mark all as Read at top of Notifications screen.
*** Tap Mark as Read on each notification.
* I can mark one by one or all notification as Read:
** *_Mark all as Read:_* this option should be only shown when there is at least one notification unread. After tapping that, that one should be hidden.
** *_Mark as Read:_* this option should be only shown when the notification is unread. After tapping that, that one should be hidden.
* I can clear one by one or all notifications. When I want to clear all, show the confirmation pop-up.
* The number on Notifications item on the left menu is the number of unread message. The maximum is 99+.
* In case there’s not any notifications or no filter results, show the message at center *_“No Notifications“_*

+*_Mockup_*+: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/f73b7f97-c811-4545-bd13-9011d0d5a112/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/f73b7f97-c811-4545-bd13-9011d0d5a112/|smart-link]

*curl get all notifications:* _curl -v -X POST '_[_https://gateway-dev.kardsys.com/visikard/v1/api/notification/getAll'_|https://gateway-dev.kardsys.com/visikard/v1/api/notification/getAll'] _-H 'X-TENANT: kard' -H 'Accept: application/json' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8' -H 'deviceId: C651AA10-6036-464B-BDE3-9E8EF4332592' -H 'token: 55ff524b-92ad-4272-9c17-cdb6b371520d' -H 'app-platform: kard-IOS' -H 'User-Agent: KARD_DEVELOP/0 (iPhone; iOS 13.4.1; Scale/3.00)' -H 'Accept-Language: en-US;q=1, es-US;q=0.9, vi-US;q=0.8' -H 'Accept-Encoding: gzip' -H 'appVersion: 1.8.0.0' -d 'fkUser=32158&pageIndex=1&pageSize=100&type=0'_;[~accountid:557058:cb86e9a8-02c3-4a77-8ab9-54ed7e4df95b] [~accountid:5e7c21f83c888c0c2999c681]

I can mark one by one or all notification as Read:

* *_Mark all as Read:_* this option should be only shown when there is at least one notification unread. After tapping that, that one should be hidden.
* *_Mark as Read:_* this option should be only shown when the notification is unread. After tapping that, that one should be hidden.

column3: Security issue - Reset PIN API can used to reset PIN of all users without any authentication method
column4:
curl --location --request POST 'https://arm-dev.kardsys.com/index/changewalletpinrecover' \
--header 'sec-ch-ua: "Google Chrome";v="87", " Not;A Brand";v="99", "Chromium";v="87"' \
--header 'accept: */*' \
--header 'x-requested-with: XMLHttpRequest' \
--header 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0' \
--header 'user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.141 Safari/537.36' \
--header 'content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8' \
--header 'sec-fetch-site: same-origin' \
--header 'sec-fetch-mode: cors' \
--header 'sec-fetch-dest: empty' \
--header 'accept-language: en,es;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8' \
--header 'cookie: _ga=GA1.2.1098914514.1600161426; ARM_COUNTRY=US; lang=en; qwertyuiop=556FB4C0A09C97F283D46FBA0CC6084B; JSESSIONID=05D054673DFBA1A3511B1D26CA4EC166' \
--data-raw 'email=nguyennhatitit%2Bkard1%40gmail.com&walletPin=4321&userApp=true&tenant=kard'


The problem we are trying to fix, is the API above is insecure. Anyone that know this API can reset PIN of any user on the system.

column3: ARM Master - Review KYC requests for Merchants
column4:
+*AC:*+

* On clicking Verify button from KYC Verification tab ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2379|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2379|smart-link]), Verify New Merchant Information page will be opened. On the screen, the admin can see all information which merchant has submitted and the uploaded document files (for image admin can click to view as full mode). There are two buttons:
** Approve: On clicking, show the Approved pop-up. Closing this pop-up will direct admin to Merchant Accounts page (KYC Verification tab) and KYC status of that merchant is updated to *Approved*.
** Reject: On clicking, show the Reject Information pop-up. admin can enter reason (*this reason should be displayed in email of rejecting*):
*** Reject:
**** If Reject Reason field is missing or filled by blank, -this button is disable (grey out)- show the red message below the field *_“Reject reason is required.“_*
**** If Reject Reason field is filled, this button is enabled.
*** Cancel: On clicking, close Reject Information pop-up only, the action is cancelled.

* Merchants will be notified via email upon the approved or rejected verification.

+*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/screen/6c5a64ff-1dbe-4860-9151-e30a8ad5c556/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/screen/6c5a64ff-1dbe-4860-9151-e30a8ad5c556/|smart-link]
column30:
[~accountid:5b39a251d38a522e77ff7642] AC updated.

If Reject Reason field is missing or filled by blank, -this button is disable (grey out)-  show the red message below the field *_“Reject reason is required.“_*

[~accountid:5b43ade2a492e959f3f3248b] [~accountid:5e69e1abae59460cfb01e9cd] [~accountid:557058:27d8b1c9-b5a9-4bcc-a002-d9834fc57e78]

column3: ARM Merchant - Prevent withdraw feature if merchant does not verify KYC yet
column4:
+*AC:*+

When merchant wants to withdraw money from Kash Kard to Bank Account, if they do not verify KYC yet, the message pop-up will be shown {color:#00b8d9}*_“You need to verify KYC to use this feature.“_*{color}

This message will be shown after merchant clicks Withdraw button.

!image-20210127-030655.png|width=1623,height=608!
column30:
{code:xml}payment:
  enable:
    kyc:
      check: false{code}

Set the value of this property to “true” to enable this feature.;QA passed on Sandbox

* *Update KYC status screen to use Angular instead of JSP*;[~accountid:6033551b4623c60069994488] [~accountid:5b43ade2a492e959f3f3248b] [~accountid:5e69e1abae59460cfb01e9cd] 

We have some updates on UI of KYC Verification form.

*For Corporate type, when uploading document on Company Information step:*

!image-20210310-042029.png|width=818,height=764!

User will choose the file by Choose File button, after choosing, the file name is displayed besides. User will enter description below and click Add button to add it below:

* If there’s not any files selected: *_“Please select a file.“_*
* If the selected file is unsupported: *_“The extension of file is unsupported. Please select another file.“_*
* If the selected file is more than 50MB: *_“The file size must be less than 50MB.“_*
* If the description is missing: *_“Please input Document description.“_*

Below is Continue button, user can click to proceed to next step:

* If there’s not any files added from above: *_“Please select at least one document file.“_*



*For Individual type, when uploading document (one of four types: ID Card / Driver License / Residence Permit / Passport):*

!image-20210310-044520.png|width=548,height=503!



User will select a document type from a drop-down list. After selecting, depending on which type is selected, show one or two frames below. User will select a file by Browse button.

After selecting, Browse button is changed by Change button. User can click to select another file.

Finish button:

* If there’s not any files selected: *_“Please input a file.“_*
* If the selected file is unsupported: *_“The extension of file is unsupported. Please select a picture file (png, jpg or jpeg).“_*
* If the selected file is more than 50MB: *_“The file size must be less than 50MB._*

+_Note:_+

When user views KYC form, all the buttons should be hidden, the drop-down list is disabled. There is no action when clicking on that.

column3: ARM - KYC Verification Form
column4:
+*AC:*+

The merchant clicks at the link in email sent to them after registering a new account.

They will select Account Type they want to submit KYC verification *INDIVIDUAL* or *CORPORATE*.

*_INDIVIDUAL_*{color:#ff5630} {color}

* *General Information*
** Full Name
** Phone Number
** Email
** Date of Birth
** Gender
* *Address Information*

||*US*||*Non-US*||
|* Country
* State
* City
* Street Address
* Postal Code|* Country
* Region
* City
* Street Address
* Postal Code|



* *Identity Information*

||*US*||*Non-US*||
|* Tax Country
* Tax State
* SSN or TIN|* Tax Country
* Indentification Number|



* Continue button: On clicking, the Upload Document is opened:
** Merchant can select one of four types of {color:#ff5630}*image* {color}document to upload: ID Card / Driver Licence / Passport / Residence Permit
** Merchant clicks Continue button to finish submitting.

Refer this link for more details: [https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzqYf4ilA2o-peph?e=gwhaKA|https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzqYf4ilA2o-peph?e=gwhaKA|smart-link] 

*_CORPORATE_* 

*Company Information*

* *General Information*

* Email

* Country
* State:
* City
* Street Address
* Postal Code
* Tax Country
* Tax State
* Social Security Number
* Region of Formation|* Company Name
* Email
* Phone Number
* Country
* Region
* City
* Street Address
* Postal Code
* Tax Country
* Identification Number
* Region of Formation|



* *Documents:* Merchant can select the document to upload. ({color:#ff5630}*image* {color}and {color:#ff5630}*document*{color})
* Continue button: On clicking, the next screen (*Representative Information*)

*Representative Information*

||*US*||*Non-US*||
|* Title
* Full Name
* Email

* Gender
* Date of Birth
* Country
* State
* City
* Street Address

* Social Security Number|* Title
* Full Name
* Email
* Phone Number
* Gender
* Date of Birth
* Country
* Region
* City
* Street Address
* Postal Code
* Tax Country
* Identification Number|

* Document
** Merchant can select one of four types of {color:#ff5630}*image* {color}document to upload: ID Card / Driver Licence / Passport / Residence Permit.
* Merchant clicks Continue button to finish submitting.

Refer this link for more details: [https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzz8KLBsk7kXEbXb?e=4ZqcOe|https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzz8KLBsk7kXEbXb?e=4ZqcOe|smart-link] 

+_Note:_+

* For image documents, allow user to import the file with extensions *jpeg / jpg, png*. The maximum size is 50MB for each file.
* For text document, allow user to import the file with extensions *pdf, doc, docx*. The maximum size is 50MB for each file.
* If user uploads any other files with invalid extension, show the error message {color:#00b8d9}*_“The extension of file is unsupported. Please import another file.“_*{color}
