column3: KanooPOS - Pay Unpaid Order
column4:
+*AC:*+

* I click Pay Order button of unpaid orders from Order List or Order Detail screen to open the payment screen (same as when tapping Pay button from the menu list):
** The paid amount is auto-filled by the order amount. Payment Cards will be the same, too.
** Discount field will be not displayed.
** The function works on this screen will be as same as the old flow. (scan Cash Card / Gift Cash Card / Sand Dollar with gift card)
* After payment successfully:
** If making payment from Order List screen (Unpaid tab):
*** I will be navigated back to Order List screen (All Orders tab)
*** The order status is updated to *Completed* and it will be synced to Kanoo mobile/web app.
** If making payment from Order Detail screen (Unpaid tab):
*** I will be navigated back to Order Detail screen (All Orders tab)
*** The order status is updated to *Completed* and it will be synced to Kanoo mobile/web app.

+_Note_+

If the order is created for user A, there’s only user A who can make payment for this order, if another user makes payment, show the message *_“You cannot make payment because this order belongs to another user.“_* (this message is applied when making payment by cash card, gift cash card, sand dollar and gift card)

+*Mockup:*+

Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/cea24c53-9cb9-4d81-b8b4-34ca81967da9/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/cea24c53-9cb9-4d81-b8b4-34ca81967da9/|smart-link] 

Tablet: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/1fa22270-100f-400c-8d53-0c037b26123c-4af1/screen/71c1fefb-178f-49ec-a54b-b5e8b9b3ea75/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/1fa22270-100f-400c-8d53-0c037b26123c-4af1/screen/71c1fefb-178f-49ec-a54b-b5e8b9b3ea75/|smart-link]

column3: Notification email for KYC result (approved or rejected)
column4:
+*AC:*+

||{color:#36b37e}*_Approved_*{color}||
|Dear *\[Merchant Name]*,
We are happy to inform that your KYC verification has been approved.
Please configure your merchant account and raise your successful business\!
Arm Corporate Office
4480H South Cobb
Drive #321Smyrna, GA 30080
All Arm emails will be sent from our [support@kardsys.com|mailto:support@kardsys.com] domains to your registered email address. We will never contact you from any other addresses.|



||{color:#ff5630}*_Rejected_*{color}||
|Dear *\[Merchant Name]*,
We are sorry to inform that your KYC verification has been rejected for some reasons:
*\[Reject Reason]*
You can click {color:#00b8d9}+here+{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}to try again.
Arm Corporate Office
4480H South Cobb
Drive #321Smyrna, GA 30080
All Arm emails will be sent from our [support@kardsys.com|mailto:support@kardsys.com] domains to your registered email address. We will never contact you from any other addresses.|

Attach the hyper link at “here“, merchant can click that to open KYC form page to resubmit, on the form all inputted info should be kept for merchant (including document files and images that they uploaded), so that they can modify more quickly.

column3: iOS - Merge 4 consumer apps to 1 single branch
column4: Requirement: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2614|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2614|smart-link]

column3: Android - Merge 4 consumer apps to 1 single branch
column4:
Our 4 apps the almost the same. They only have some differences on theme but we are maintaining 4 separated branch for them. That take a lot of effort and could cause bugs if developer have mistake on code merging.
So we will change the approach to build 4 app on only 1 source code base. To do that we need:

# Create a new branch to use that to build 4 apps.
# Make this branch to have ability to build 4 apps. For iOS, we can use Build Target, for Android we can use build variants to do that.
# Here are some differences between these apps: (I will have QC to list out these differences in detail to make sure that we cover all of them)
#* Theme: colors and icons.
#* Inviting commission flow.
# Work with DevOps to integrate the CI/CD process to build these apps  from the new branch.
# Merge new feature, bug fixing of S2053 to this branch to make sure that we have the latest code

Note: This ticket will be test on next sprint

column3: Sprint S2053 - Code review
Sprint S2053 - Code review
[Backend] - Check Wallet PIN for Payment Transactions
column4:
As a system admin, I want users to authenticate by enter wallet PIN (or use fingerprint / face ID) before doing any transactions of the app.

+*AC:*+

*_Load Money_*

* Load with cash at store (KardPOS)

!image-20210128-105126.png|width=248,height=541!



* Load from card to card

!image-20210108-033626.png|width=267,height=559!

After tapping Load button, show Enter Your PIN screen:

* If the fingerprint / face ID is enabled already: Show the pop-up using fingerprint / face ID at first, if user does not want to use it, they can enter PIN, the screen will display an icon and text *_“Make Transaction with Face ID“_* / *_“Make Transaction with Fingerprint“_* for user to use if they need.
* If the fingerprint / face ID is not enabled yet: user can only enter PIN, but the screen will display a check box *“Use Face ID for next transactions”* or *“Use Fingerprint for next transactions“*, when checking that box and making the current transaction with PIN successfully, Face ID / Fingerprint feature will be auto-enabled on Settings screen and user can make transactions by Face ID / Fingerprint next time.
** If PIN is correct, Load transaction is done completely.
** If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect. Attempted x/5.“_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}_._{color} User will have maximum 5 attempts, if he/she fails at the last time (5th) show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your wallet has been locked due to entering PIN incorrecly too many times. You can reset your PIN to unlock your wallet.“_*{color}, closing pop-up will direct user to Home screen. This pop-up will appear every time user makes any other transactions.
*** After resetting PIN successfully, they can use that PIN to make transactions without being locked any more.
** The max attempt should be configurable on Server.

Enter Your PIN screen will be opened for other transactions below:

*_Withdraw:_* after tapping Withdraw button

* Withdraw cash
** If PIN is correct, show the QR code of withdraw.
** If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}

!image-20210108-033748.png|width=270,height=570!



* Withdraw to bank account:
** If PIN is correct, withdraw transaction is done completely.
** If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}

!image-20210108-040108.png|width=270,height=580!



*_Refund:_* after tapping Refund icon

* If PIN is correct, show the QR code of refund.
* If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}



!image-20210108-034003.png|width=269,height=572!

*_Send Money:_* After tapping Send button

* If PIN is correct, Send transaction is done completely.
* If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}

!image-20210108-034759.png|width=266,height=579!

*_Payment_*

* AirPay / Buy Products (by money or point): After tapping Confirm Payment
** If PIN is correct, payment transaction is done completely.
** If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}

!image-20210108-034837.png|width=268,height=573!

* Buy Gift Card (by money or point): After tapping OK on the pop-up
** If PIN is correct, payment transaction is done completely.
** If PIN is incorrect, show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“PIN is incorrect“_*{color}

!image-20210108-040758.png|width=267,height=561!

*_Direct Funding_*

!image-20210128-105154.png|width=247,height=538!

*_Membership Payment_*

!image-20210128-105540.png|width=1636,height=1108!

!image-20210128-105922.png|width=1626,height=859!



*_External Payment (Pay with HYT/Kard/GreenCom/Kingdom)_*



*_Exchange Points To Money for Mastercard_*

!image-20210128-105231.png|width=246,height=537!



+_Note:_+

+*Mockup:*+

Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3f57c22e-77b0-42bc-83a0-962d1de6028b-6a04/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3f57c22e-77b0-42bc-83a0-962d1de6028b-6a04/|smart-link] 

Web: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6b060f78-d348-462b-821b-06eeb773d76c-3e55/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6b060f78-d348-462b-821b-06eeb773d76c-3e55/|smart-link] 

+_Note:_+

If user changes wallet PIN in another device, then they uses fingerprint / face ID on their own device to make transactions, they will see a dialog message {color:#6554c0}*_“Your PIN has been changed. Please enter the new PIN to process this transaction.“_*{color}. After closing this dialog, user needs to enter their new PIN, and below the PIN field they can see a checkbox *“Use Fingerprint for next transactions“* / *“Use Face ID for next transactions“*, user can check on that to make transactions with fingerprint / face ID next time.

When user wallet was locked, everytime they make transaction by entering PIN, they will see the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your wallet has been locked due to entering PIN incorrectly too many times. You can reset your PIN to unlock your wallet.“_*{color}

We only lock them from making any payment;Got it. I will update AC later.;[~accountid:5ed479f0c3b5390c24a5905d][~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843]  List all api need update: 

* Load Money

* Load Money in primetrust

* Withdraw to bank account
/visipay/api/kashkard/withdraw/to/bank
* Send Money
/visikard/v1/payment/send/friend
* Payment
/visikard/v1/payment/\{cartId}
* Payment product with point
/visikard/v1/payment/process/point-with-delivery-info
* Buy Gift Card (by money or point)
/visikard/v1/payment/giftkard/bymoney
/visikard/v1/payment/giftkard/bypoint
* Payment airpay with merchant detail
/visikard/v1/payment/air-pay?airPayTypeEnum=MERCHANT_DETAIL
* Direct Funding
/visikard/v1/fundProject
* Membership payment
/partner/membership/upgrade
* External Payment
/visipay/api/external/payment/process-card-token;[~accountid:5ed479f0c3b5390c24a5905d] [~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] List API used in IOS:

/visipay/api/fundKashKard
# Withdraw IN store:
/visipay/api/genWithdrawInStoreQrCode
# Withdraw with bank acount:
/visipay/api/kashkard/withdraw/to/bank
# Refund monet:
/visipay/api/genQrCodeRefund
# Send money to friend: 
/visikard/v1/payment/send/friend
# Payment:
/visikard/v1/payment/492
# Buy gift card:
/visikard/v1/payment/giftkard/bymoney
# Buy product reward (only point):
*/visikard/v1/payment/process/point-with-delivery-info*
# Byt gift card reward (only point)
*/visikard/v1/payment/giftkard/bypoint*
# Load money In store
/visipay/api/genKashkardLoadQr
# Withdraw from Crypto Card
/visipay/api/crypto-accounts/\\(cardToken)/withdraw
# exchange point from master card
*/v1/payment/loading/card/byPoint*

column3: Kanoo - Buy Product - Get the Google address on making Delivery orders
column4:
As a Kanoo user, I want be able to enter exactly my delivery address while ordering, so that the shipper can find my location and deliver the order more easily and conveniently.

+*AC:*+

* On Delivery Information form, when entering the address, I want to be suggested the list of addresses from Google.
* I can see where is the most exact address that I want to select as my delivery address.
* The address should be saved correctly on Order screen (consumer app, POS app, Kard Order Delivery app).

column3: Kanoo web - Add option "Leave At Door" for Delivery orders
column4:
As a customer I want to have an option "Leave at door" for my order so that delivery staff will deliver the order by putting it at my house's door instead of giving order by hands and requires me to scan QR code to complete.

+*AC:*+

Add new field “Receive Order Method” with below options for customers to select.

* Scan QR Code (you need to present QR code of order to delivery stupaff): default value.
* Leave At Door (you don’t need to present QR code of order)

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/97ff2702-4c74-4573-9a54-de6e540c0424/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/97ff2702-4c74-4573-9a54-de6e540c0424/|smart-link]

column3: Kanoo - Notification for updating order status
column4:
As a Kanoo user, I want to see the notification every time my order status is updated.

+*AC:*+

* When the status is update to Preparing: _“_{color:#00b8d9}_Your order #_{color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Order Number]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _at_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Business Name]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}{color:#00b8d9}_is now being prepared._{color}_“_
* When the status is updated to Ready:
** Pickup order: _“_{color:#00b8d9}_Your order #_{color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Order Number]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _at_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Business Name]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}{color:#00b8d9}_is now ready for pickup._{color}_“_
** Delivery order: _“_{color:#00b8d9}_Your order #_{color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Order Number]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _at_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Business Name]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}{color:#00b8d9}_is now ready for delivery._{color}_“_
* When the status is updated to Shipping (delivery order): {color:#00b8d9}_Your order_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}#{color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Order Number]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}{color:#00b8d9}_at_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Business Name]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _is now being delivered._{color}_“_
* When the status is updated to Completed: “{color:#00b8d9}_Your Order_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}#{color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Order Number]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _at_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*\[Business Name]*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _has been completed._{color}“

Email Content:

* Subject: Kanoo - Order Updated
* Sample content:

“

Dear \[Customer Name],

Your order at \[Business Name] is now being prepared.

<Order Detail table>

Click {color:#00b8d9}+here+ {color}to view your order detail at Kanoo.

*CaribPay (Bahamas) Ltd.*
Suite #7 Millennium Mall, West
Atlantic Drive, P.O. Box F-42796
Freeport, Grand Bahama
The Bahamas

_All Kanoo emails will be sent from our_ [_customerservice@kanoopays.com_|mailto:customerservice@kanoopays.com] _domains to your registered email address. We will never contact you from any other addresses._

“

* On clicking {color:#00b8d9}+*_here_*+{color}, I can be navigated to Order Detail page of the web app. I should be required to login if I haven’t login before.

+*Mockup:*+

column3: KanooPOS - Handle order status and message on refund request from user
column4:
+*AC:*+

* When user requests refund for an order:
** This order will be moved to All Orders tab.
** \[Scan to Confirm Delivery] / \[Scan to Pickup] and \[Complete] buttons will be hidden.
** Show *Pending Refund* status below the current order status (New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed)
** *When the order status is* *New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping*:
*** If the request is approved: Show the status *Refund Approved* below the current order status (New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping).
*** If the request is rejected: 
**** Move this order to Pickup / Delivery tab (\[Scan to Confirm Delivery] / \[Scan to Pickup] and \[Complete] buttons will be displayed again).
**** Show *Refund Rejected* status below below the current order status (New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping).
**** This order should be kept processing as usual.
** *When the order status is Completed:*
***  If the request is approved: Show *Refund Approved* status below the current order status (Completed).
*** If the request is rejected: Show *Refund Rejected* status below the current order status (Completed).

+_Note:_+

* If the staff updates order status to Preparing or Ready after user requests refund: Show the message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“This order cannot be updated due to being requested to refund.“_*{color}_._ After closing pop-up:
** Order List: The order is removed from Pickup / Delivery tab and moved to All Orders tab.
** Order Detail: 
*** Reload the screen and show *Pending Refund* status below the current order status.
*** \[Pickup] / \[Delivery] and \[Complete] buttons will be hidden
* If the staff updates order status to Completed (scanning / taking note) after user requests refund: Show the message pop-up while scanning / taking note {color:#00b8d9}*_“This order cannot be completed due to being requested to refund.“_* {color}_._ After closing pop-up and get back to the previous screen:
** Order List: The order is removed from Pickup / Delivery tab and moved to All Orders tab.
** Order Detail: 
*** Reload the screen and show *Pending Refund* status below the current order status.
*** \[Pickup] / \[Delivery] and \[Complete] buttons will be hidden

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/4b1d9163-05b0-4d7d-b915-3b2c4f49ab12/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/4b1d9163-05b0-4d7d-b915-3b2c4f49ab12/|smart-link]

column4:
As a merchant admin, I want associate each of my products to a product category, so that customers can filter and buy easily.

+*AC:*+

* On Create Product page, I want to see one more field named *Category*.
* There’s a empty field and a button named Select Category.
* On clicking the button:
** Select Category pop-up is opened which contains all categories (from Category tab at Store page), each category will have a checkbox that I can select. After selecting, I can click Save button to close the pop-up and the selected categories will be filled in the empty field.
** I can select multiple categories.
** The list of categories should be sorted by alphabet.

column3: [BE] Display status for Order (Order List and Order Detail)
column4:
As a customer, I want my created orders to display the status so that I can track the processing of my order more conveniently and easily.

+*AC:*+

* There are 5 statuses that can be displayed on my orders: *_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed_**.*
* There are 3 refunding statuses that can be displayed on my orders: *_Pending Refund / Refund Approved / Refund Rejected._* (this is available now on Kanoo app)
* After a new order is created, the status is New.
* The rest of statuses are auto-synced from KanooPOS app and Order Delivery app whenever my order status is updated.
* I want the status to display on four tabs of Orders screen (Pickup, Delivery, Unpaid and All Orders tabs) and Order Detail screen.
** For Pickup tab: displaying the pickup orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready*
** For Delivery tab: displaying the delivery orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping* 
** For Unpaid tab: displaying the delivery orders which the status is *Unpaid*
** For All Orders tab: displaying both delivery and pickup orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping, Completed, Cancelled* and refund statuses *Pending Refund, Refund Approved and Refund Rejected.*
* The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/1a487558-777c-4c02-8c1b-63a4dc139d89/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/1a487558-777c-4c02-8c1b-63a4dc139d89/|smart-link]

column3: Order Delivery App - Order Detail screen
column4:
+*AC:*+

* On tapping any orders on Orders List from any tabs, I can open Order Detail screen.
* On this screen:

||*Ready*||*Shipping*||*Completed*||
|* Order number
* Order status
* Delivery Type: *Scan QR Code* / *Leave At Door*
* Delivery Time/Address
* A button to show directions on map
* Map
* Order detail information.
* \[PICK UP] button: On tapping
** The button is disappeared and reaplaced by \[COMPLETE ORDER] button.
** The status is updated to Shipping.|* Order number
* Order status
* Delivery Type: *Scan QR Code* / *Leave At Door*
* Delivery Time/Address
* A button to show directions
* Map
* Order detail information.
* \[COMPLETE ORDER] button. On tapping this:
** *Scan QR Code:* There are three options shown:
*** SCAN TO CONFIRM: The customer presents me the QR code of order to scan. After scanning successfully, navigate me back to Order Detail screen and the status updated to Completed.
*** CONFIRM WITHOUT SCANNING: I can skip scanning action and completed the order by taking note (photo or text). After taking note successfully, navigate me back to Order Detail screen and the status updated to Completed.
*** CANCEL: Close the Action Sheet, nothing’s changed.
** *Leave At Door*: Show the screen to take a photo and note. On this screen, I can take note if I want or I can skip this action. Below is DONE button, on tapping I can complete this type of order and will be navigated to Order Detail screen again (Completed status).|* Order number
* Order status
* Delivery Type: *Scan QR Code* / *Leave At Door*
* Delivery Time/Address
* A button to show directions
* Map
* Order detail information.
* Note (if available).|

+_Note:_+

* Show Direction button:
** This button is displayed when the delivery address is correct (existing on Google map). I can tap this to open the map app and that app shows me direction automatically.
** This button is hidden when the delivery address is incorrect (not existing on Google map). I have to contact customer to get the correct address and open the map application manually and find way to get there.
* Map:
** The app is displayed when the delivery address is correct (existing on Google map). I can see on the map the delivery address is marked by red icon.
** The map is hidden when the delivery address is incorrect (not existing on Google map). In this case, below the address I can see a red warning text _“_{color:#ff5630}*_The address cannot be found._*{color}_“._
* Note: This part can the note of text or photo depending which type I take note while completing order. If I can skip this action, this should show nothing here. The mamximum input at Note field is 500 characters including space.



+Mockup:+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/7bc05558-a19c-46d1-ae97-51bac5354d55/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/7bc05558-a19c-46d1-ae97-51bac5354d55/|smart-link]

column3: Order Delivery App - Order List screen
column4:
+*AC:*+

* On Order List screen:
** I can see Log Out icon and Scan icon at the top of screen. 
** On tapping Scan icon, show the scanning screen, the shipper can scan QR code of the order to view Order Detail screen. After scanning, the shipper can tap COMPLETE ORDER button to complete order right away without scanning anymore, at that time the status on Order Detail screen updated to Completed.
** Separate the screen into 3 tabs named *_Ready_*_,_ *_Shipping_* _and_ *_Completed_*

||*Ready*||*Shipping*||*Completed*||
| |* Show the number badge on the tab zone, this represents for the number of orders which I picks from Ready tab, for each order updated to Completed, this number will go down.| |
|* Show all Ready orders of delivery type.
Lazy loading: It should get 10 orders at the first time I access the list. When I scroll to the end of the list, it should load 10 more orders.|* Show all Shipping orders picked by me from Ready tab.
Lazy loading: It should get 10 orders at the first time I access the list. When I scroll to the end of the list, it should load 10 more orders.|* Show all Completed orders (picked and shipped) by me.
Lazy loading: It should get 10 orders at the first time I access the list. When I scroll to the end of the list, it should load 10 more orders.|
|* Search: customer name, phone number, order number and address.|* Search: *same as Ready list.*|* Search: *same as Ready list.*|
|* Filter:
** Delivery Type: *All* / *Leave At Door* / *Scan QR Code*. The default value is *All*.
** Date: date range. The default value is *Select a date range*.
* Filter icon should be highlighted when it’s used.|* Filter: *same as Ready list.*|* Filter: *same as Ready list.*|
|* Sorting: by the oldest one (late delivered) to the newest one from top downwards. (past orders to future orders).|* Sorting: *same as Ready list.*|* Sorting: the list will be sorted by completed date. (which one is completed first will be at the top).|
|* For each order, show:
** Customer name
** Phone number
** Order number
** Delivery time:
*** This is black normally if the time is after the current date time. (Ex: My current date time is 10/09/2020 04:13 PM, and the delivery date time shows 10/09/2020 05:13 PM).
*** This is highlighted if the time is before the current date time. (Ex: My current date time is 10/09/2020 04:13 PM, and the delivery date time shows 10/09/2020 03:13 PM).
** Delivery Type: *_Scan QR Code_* / *_Leave At Door_*
** \[PICK UP] button. On clicking:
*** The current list should be reloaded.
*** The order should be moved to Shipping tab.
*** The number badge on Shipping tab is increased.
*** The other shipper cannot see this order on his/her app.
*** Push notification on consumer apps.|* For each order, show: *same as Ready list without any buttons*.|* For each order, show: *same as Ready list without any buttons*.|
|* When the other staff updates any orders to Ready on KanooPOS, that should be synced to this list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1371|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1371|smart-link] ).| | |
|* Show Order Detail screen on tapping any orders from the list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|smart-link] )|* Show Order Detail screen on tapping any orders from the list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|smart-link] )|* Show Order Detail screen on tapping any orders from the list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|smart-link] )|

 

+_Note:_+

* The School Menu order will not be displayed on this app.
* The customer name should be displayed maximum 2 lines and show the pickup / delivery address fully.
* Search orders:
** Customer Name: I can search with first name / last name / the phrase contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.
** Phone Number: I can search with full phone number or the string of number contained in the phone number.
** Delivery Address: I can search with full address or the phrase contained in the address.
** Order Number: I can search with full order number or the string of number contained in the order number.
** If no orders found, I want to see the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“No orders found._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}. This message shown directly on the screen and center-aligned.
* Date: Follow this format MM/DD/YYYY (Ex: 04/21/2020 - 09/21/2020).
* For each order shown on the list:
** All the information displayed on the order must match to the one on consumer app.
** Customer’s name and phone number must match to the order info when customer makes the order. There info would be fixed for each order.
* In case there are two shippers tapping \[PICKUP] button at the same time on Ready tab, the one goes after will see a message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“This order has been picked up by another staff.“_*{color}
* For Scanning feature on this app (from Home screen and Shipping Order Detail screen: if scanning the QR code of order which status is New, Preparing or Ready, show the error message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“This order is not available for delivery.“_*{color}

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/7bc05558-a19c-46d1-ae97-51bac5354d55/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/7bc05558-a19c-46d1-ae97-51bac5354d55/|smart-link]

column3: [Android] KanooPOS - Display and update status for Order
column4:
As a staff using KanooPOS app, I want the created orders to display the status so that I can track and manage them more conveniently and easily.

+*AC:*+

* There are 5 statuses that can be displayed on the order: *_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed._*
* There are 3 refund statuses that can be displayed on the order: *_Pending Refund / Refund Approved / Refund Rejected_*_._ {color:#ff5630}*These statuses only displayed when user requests refund and the merchant admin approves / rejectes that request.*{color}
* After a new order is created, the status is New.
* I want the status to display on three tabs of Orders screen (Pickup, Delivery and All Orders tabs) and Order Detail screen.
** For Pickup tab: displaying the pickup orders which the status is *New*, *Preparing*, *Ready*
** For Delivery tab: displaying the delivery orders which the status is *New*, *Preparing*, *Ready*, *Shipping*.
** For Unpaid tab: displaying the unpaid orders.
** For All Orders tab: displaying both delivery and pickup orders which the status is *New*, *Preparing*, *Ready*, *Shipping*, *Completed, Unpaid* and refund statuses *Pending Refund*, *Refund Approved*, *Refund Rejected*.
* The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.
* I can update status for each order at any tabs:
** When the status is New, I can update to Preparing only: the order status is updated to Preparing
** When the status is Preparing, I can update to Ready only: the order status is updated to Ready
** When the status is Ready, 
*** Pickup orders: I can update to Completed by two ways:
**** Scan QR code: the customer will present the QR code of their order to me, after scanning succesfully, navigate me to Order Detail screen (Completed status) and show the toast message *_“Order Completed\!“_*.
**** Manually: in case the customer forgets to bring their device, I can require them to provide their personal info (phone number, ID card…) and allow them to pick up their order without scanning. I can take note (write and take a photo) to keep track or skip, after that, navigate me to Order Detail screen (Completed status) and show the toast message *_“Order Completed\!“_*. I can see the note below the Order Detail screen.
*** Delivery orders: KardPOS staff cannot update anymore. The shipper can see the Ready order at Ready tab of Order Delivery app and pick to deliver.
* For School Menu orders, it only has two statuses New and Completed. After having been just created, the status is New and the order is on Pickup tab. At Order Detail, I can complete each item of order by Complete button or I can complete all by Pickup button of Order List. After completing all items of order, the status is updated to Completed.
* When I update status an order on KanooPOS, that should be synced up to:
** Kanoo app / Kanoo web / KZ site.
** Kanoo Order Delivery app.
** KanooPOS app login on another device.

+_Note:_+

* Pickup button is only enabled when the status of Pickup order is Ready. Otherwise, it will be grey out.
* The mamximum input at Note field is 500 characters including space.
* If an order is updated by two staffs at the same time, who goes after will get a message pop-up *_“This order has been processed by another staff.“_* and update the status to the latest status of that order.
* User can only request to refund for their orders when the status is Completed, which means refund statuses (Pending Refund, Refund Approved, Refund Rejected) only displayed on completed orders (both Order List and Order Detail screens) at All Orders tab.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/4b1d9163-05b0-4d7d-b915-3b2c4f49ab12/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/4b1d9163-05b0-4d7d-b915-3b2c4f49ab12/|smart-link]  

{color:#ff5630}*_Note: For the Pay Now orders, they will be displayed at All Orders tab all the time._*{color}

column3: [Android] Kanoo app - Display status for Order (Order List and Order Detail)
column4:
As a Kanoo user, I want to see the status for each order on Order screen, so that I can keep track my order processing.

+*AC:*+

* There are 5 statuses that can be displayed on my orders: *_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed_**.*
* There are 3 refunding statuses that can be displayed on my orders: *_Pending Refund / Refund Approved / Refund Rejected._* (this is available now on Kanoo app)
* After a new order is created, the status is New.
* The rest of statuses are auto-synced from KanooPOS app and Order Delivery app whenever my order status is updated.
* I want the status to display on four tabs of Orders screen (Pickup, Delivery, Unpaid and All Orders tabs) and Order Detail screen.
** For Pickup tab: displaying the pickup orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready*
** For Delivery tab: displaying the delivery orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping*
** For Unpaid tab: displaying the pickup orders which the status is *Unpaid*
** For All Orders tab: displaying Delivery/ Pickup orders which the status is *New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping, Completed, Cancelled* and Unpaid orders and refund statuses *Pending Refund, Refund Approved and Refund Rejected.*
* The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.

+_Note:_+

* User can only request to refund for their orders when the status is Completed, which mean:
** Refund button should be hidden for orders at Pickup and Delivery tabs, it’s only displayed on completed orders at All Orders tab.
** Refund statuses (Pending Refund, Refund Approved, Refund Rejected) only displayed on completed orders (both Order List and Order Detail screens).
** On Order Detail screen (pickup or delivery), the Pickup / Delivery button is fixed at bottom, user can slide the rest of screen to see more info.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/b6052c05-1d48-4d8d-b404-2839a8597ba9/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/b6052c05-1d48-4d8d-b404-2839a8597ba9/|smart-link]

column3: [iOS] Researching for using the same source code for 4 apps: Kard, HYT, GreenCom, KingdomPay
column4:
Our 4 apps are having the same features. They just have some differences in UI: logo, images, color
But we are having 4 separate code branches for them thus we need a lot of effort for code picking, coping to these apps and this also have risks if the developer misses something on the code picking process.

This ticket is for research to find a better way to manage the source code of our apps
1. Research if we can use the same source code (the same branch) for building 4 apps.
2. Find a "feature toggle" solution to handle the differences between these apps
3. Draft estimate for the change

Note for QC: Testing is not required for this ticket
column30:
h2. Reuse code base to build 4 apps

{quote}I was use this solution in my old company {quote}

Create multiple targets in ios app for single project:

h2. What is target ? 

{quote}_“A target specifies a product to build and contains the instructions for building the product from a set of files in a project or workspace. A target defines a single product; it organizes the inputs into the build system — the source files and instructions for processing those source files — required to build that product. Projects can contain one or more targets, each of which produces one product.”_{quote}

h2. Targets versus branching

* Using branches is not a bad approach by all means. However, there are some serious drawbacks when using them.
* Firstly, you may need to go back to your first app to solve bugs the users may have found. Once you’ve fixed those bugs, you will want to merge those fixes in your new branch just to see that you’ll have a bunch of conflicts.
* By the time you’ve successfully made the merge, you’ll notice that you’ve spend more time here than doing actual work on the new app.
* Fortunately there is a better way that does not require branching. Most IDE’s have some sort of target support (in Android they are called Flavors).
* Targets work more like configuration files. You use the same code for all your targets, but each target is configured differently, whether it’s a new app icon or a slight change in logic.
* The setup can be tricky but it’s far more powerful than using branches. Let me show you.

h2. Example

!image-20201221-110522.png|width=611,height=292!

!image-20201221-110538.png|width=611,height=292!

!image-20201221-110545.png|width=633,height=173!

!image-20201221-110627.png|width=261,height=299!

!image-20201221-110635.png|width=261,height=331!

!image-20201221-110641.png|width=700,height=276!

!image-20201221-110649.png|width=700,height=450!

h2. Refs

* [https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10311672/share-code-between-projects-in-xcode|https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10311672/share-code-between-projects-in-xcode]
* [https://riptutorial.com/ios/example/23225/handle-multiple-environment-using-multiple-target-and-macro|https://riptutorial.com/ios/example/23225/handle-multiple-environment-using-multiple-target-and-macro]
* [http://howtomakeiphoneapps.com/working-with-multiple-targets-in-xcode-code-reuse-part-one/|http://howtomakeiphoneapps.com/working-with-multiple-targets-in-xcode-code-reuse-part-one/]

h2. Manager urls

* [https://fluffy.es/multischeme/|https://fluffy.es/multischeme/]

h2. Manager color

* [https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33951234/xcode-change-color-theme-based-on-target|https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33951234/xcode-change-color-theme-based-on-target]

h2. Manager assets

* [http://matt.coneybeare.me/using-xcode-asset-catalogs-with-multiple-targets/|http://matt.coneybeare.me/using-xcode-asset-catalogs-with-multiple-targets/]

[https://github.com/SmallSharpToolsOpenSource/MultipleTargets|https://github.com/SmallSharpToolsOpenSource/MultipleTargets|smart-link] ;h1. Feature toggle solution

column3: ARM - Store - Categories - Add Products to Categories
column4:
As a merchant admin, I want to be able to view product categories configured by the tenants that I am associated with to group my products. 

+*AC:*+

* At Store page, I want to have a new tab named Category next to Product tab. 
* For Category tab:
** If the business is not a partner of any tenants, this page will show the empty table of categories with the text *_“No categories found.“_*
** If the business is a partner of one or multiple tenants, this page will show the table of categories taken from those tenants, this table will include columns below:
*** Name: displaying category name
*** Tags: displaying tags of the category
*** Number of Products: displaying the number of products of the merchant that belongs to each category.
*** Action: display the button named Edit Product List
** I can search category by category name and tags.
* I want to have the pagination for this tab if the number of categories is more than 10. The maximum number of categories displayed on a single page is 10.
* I can open a category and add my products to add into it. A category can contain multiple products.

column3: [Backend] Marketplace - Products Tab
column4:
+*AC:*+

On Marketplace screen, I want to have one more tab named Products.

*_Products_*

* On this tab, I want to see the list of all products which are active from all businesses in system.
* The list of products will be shown as grid view mode.
* Each product being shown here must belong to at least one konnect category of any konnect zones and the konnect zone must be active.
* I can filter product with category by the filter icon on Search field:
** On clicking the icon, show the list of product categories screen.
** I can select / deselect one or multiple categories to filter.
** I can search by category name. In case there’s not any categories of no results when searching, show the message *_“No Categories Found.“_*
** For each selected category, it will be highlighted.
** I can tap Clear button to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories will be unselected, I can select other categories and get back to Products tab.
** Filter icon should be bold and colored if I am using filter.
** Keep the filtering results screen when switching between tabs Nearby, Online and Products.
* By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (*All*).
* For each product, I want to see:
** Product image
** Product name:
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.
** Product price:
*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the price is too long.
** Business name:
*** Show maximumly in 1 lines, use ellipsis if the business name is too long.
* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.
* I can search product by product name and business name:
** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.
** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keyword.
** Keep the searching results screen when switching between Nearby, Online and Products.
* I can sort product list by:
** Latest: sorting product list by latest created date
** Price:
*** Low to High.
*** High to Low.
** Most discounted (based on discount percentage): sorting product list by most discount.
* By default, the list of products will be sorted by discount price (low to high), if multiple products has the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).
* For three sort buttons (Latest, Price and Most Discounted), there must always one button checked. If user tap another button, the checked button is auto-unchecked.
* If no products is available or no matched searching / filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No products found.“_*{color}.
* User can scroll down to hide Search field and Sorting price lines, but when they scroll up those lines should appear right away. (make it like Shopee app as the video attachment below).

column3: [Backend] Tenant Admin - Manage Product Categories
column4:
As a tenant admin, I want to be able to define the product categories for my marketplace platform starting from the list of default categories provided by the system.

+*AC:*+

On the left menu, I click an item named Product Categories to open Product Categories page.

On Product Categories page, I can see:

* *Import Category* button: On clicking, Import Category pop-up is opened and displays the list of categories created for System. On this list, each item will have a checkbox, I can search and select what category I want to import. There are two buttons:
** Import: Close the pop-up, the selected categories will be displayed as a table. Show the message as a toast *_“Imported successfully\!“_* 
** Cancel: Close the pop-up, the action is cancelled.
* The table of categories including the columns below:
** Name: displaying category name
** Tags: displaying tags of category
** Action:

||*Buttons*||*Action*||
|Remove|On clicking, Remove Category pop-up is opened:
* Message: *_“Are you sure to remove the category_* {color:#6554c0}*_\[name]_*{color}*_?“_*
* Buttons:
** Remove: Close the pop-up and remove the category from the reference.
** Cancel: Close the pop-up and the action is cancelled.
{color:#ff5630}*When a category is removed from the list of tenant, it will not impact to the list of system admin.*{color}|



* I can search category on the table by name and tags
* The pagination is displayed below the table.

+_Note:_+ 

When importing, the list of categories on pop-up is filtered by which categories have not existed yet from the list of tenant. (For ex: At first, tenant admin imported 10 categories from system from 1 to 10, if system admin adds a new category, the list on pop-up only displays categories which are added by system admin.

On the table of product categories:

* Name and Tags should be displayed maximum only one line.
* If Name and Tags are too long, there should have ellipsis, if admin hovers the mouse cursor on it, he can see the full Name and Tags.

In case if there’s not any categories or no results of searching, show the message *_“No Categories Found.“_*

column3: [Backend] Visipay - Card Listing
column4:
+*AC:*+

* Remove Kash Kard, Credit Card items from the left menu.
* I click a new menu items (above ) to open Cards page.
* On the page, I can see:
** The list of cards ({color:#ff5630}*including Kash Kard, Credit Card, Crypto (BTC/ETH/ZVC) Card*{color}) is displayed as a table including columns below:
*** No.
*** First Name
*** Last Name
*** Email Address
*** Card Number
**** Show *the last 4 digits* for Kash Kard and Credit Card
**** Show *the last 4 characters of address* for BTC, ETH or ZVC Card
*** Expiration Date: displaying format *mm/yy* (if available)
*** Status: displaying *Active* or *Inactive*
*** Card Type: displaying *Kash Kard*, *Credit Card*, *Crypto*
*** Account Type: 
**** Card Type is Kash Kard:
***** Consumer: displaying *Personal*
***** Merchant: displaying *Business*
**** Card Type is Credit Card: displaying the name of card issuer (*JCB/ Discover**/* *Visa/ American Express/ Diners Club/ Mastercard*)
**** Card Type is Crypto: displaying *Bitcoin / Etherum / Zevencoin*
*** Balance: displaying the balance of Kash Kard only, format *$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: $550.42, $6,500.00)
*** Tenant:
**** Display *Kard* / *GreenCom* / *KingdomPay* / … for consumer.
**** Display *Default* for business
** I can filter the list of cards by Card Type, Account Type, Tenant and Status.
** I can search the card by First Name, Last Name, Email Address and Card Number.
** I can export CSV file.
** I want to see the sorting icon on some columns:
*** First Name: sorting by alphabet
*** Last Name: sorting by alphabet
*** Balance: sorting by lowest or biggest

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/bca21d81-e675-41be-ae33-c022e9ba7ff8-e9f1/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/bca21d81-e675-41be-ae33-c022e9ba7ff8-e9f1/|smart-link]

* API get list cards (search, filter)
* API export csv for list cards
* API export csv for transactions of card;[~accountid:5caacdb1055f3f7a1824b0dc] We need the requirement for transactions in more detail, especially the transaction of Crypto cards because it is new.

We also need the AC and design update for viewing the point balance of Crypto cards;[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] Can not search card number of CC.Because it is encryt in DB.;We cannot search by a part of number but how about if user enter the full number?;[~accountid:5b43ade2a492e959f3f3248b] [~accountid:557058:27d8b1c9-b5a9-4bcc-a002-d9834fc57e78] [~accountid:5e69e1abae59460cfb01e9cd]

Sort icon will be displayed on Expiration Date and Balance columns.;[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] [~accountid:5caacdb1055f3f7a1824b0dc] Expiration Date was encryt in db.Can not sort this field;[~accountid:557058:cb86e9a8-02c3-4a77-8ab9-54ed7e4df95b] We will sort First Name, Last Name, Email and Balance. Please confirm if we can do that?

column3: ARM Master - Merchant Accounts - Seperate into 2 tabs
column4:
+*AC*+

* We will split the merchant accounts page into two tabs *Merchant Management* (Current) and *KYC Verification*. 
* KYC Verification Tab will display the table with the following columns:
** Business Name: displaying the business name from registration info.
** Account Type: *Individual* or *Corporate*
** Email: displaying the email of registration info.
** Phone Number: displaying the phone number of registration info.
** Country: displaying fully the country name of registration info.
** KYC Status (*Pending* / *Approved* / *Rejected*)
** Date of Request (KYC verification requested date)
** Action:
*** Verify button (when the KYC status is Pending): [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2907|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2907|smart-link] 
*** View Details button (when the KYC status is Approved or Rejected): 
**** Approved status: On clicking, admin can open the KYC info page with Approved status at top.
**** Rejected status: On clicking, admin can open the KYC info page with Reject status at top and the reject reason at bottom. Merchant can re-submit the KYC when the status is rejected (merchant receives the email with the re-submit link). After merchant re-submits KYC already, View Details button is replaced by Verify button again.
* On this tab:
** Admin can search by business name, email, phone number. If searching session has no results, show the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“No KYC Requests Found.“_*{color}
** Admin can filter by KYC status.
** Admin can export CSV file. The columns of file and data will be as same as this tab.

+_Note:_+

* On KYC Verification tab, there are only merchants who has submitted KYC form to be displayed.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/|smart-link]
column30:
[~accountid:5f4dbaf3333edb00432f009e] [~accountid:5ed4c949fbefc20c1d7e62bb] Please remove the function related to personal KYC because the scope of this is related to merchants. Thanks.;[https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/|smart-link] 

[~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] Please check comments and update the link.;[~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] Please provide the other mockup for this story.

I think we should open a new page when clicking Verify button, so that we can show more information that merchant submitted and it will be easy for admin to review.;[~accountid:5eeb358e96b9660abf6c15b5] [~accountid:5b39a251d38a522e77ff7642] AC updated

1.Reject button on the pop-up:

* If Reject Reason field is missing or filled by blank, this button is disable (grey out).
* If Reject Reason field is filled, this button is enabled.

!image-20210125-102715.png|width=1119,height=521!

2.On KYC Verification tab, there are only merchants who has submitted KYC form to be displayed.

3.Verify button is only displayed when the KYC status is pending.

4.When the KYC status is Rejected, the *Verify* button is replaced by *View Details* button. Admin can click that to open the KYC info page with the reject reason displayed below.

4.Merchant can re-submit the KYC when the status is rejected (merchant receives the email with the re-submit link). After merchant re-submits KYC already, *View Details* button is replaced again by *Verify* button.

CC: [~accountid:5b43ade2a492e959f3f3248b] [~accountid:557058:27d8b1c9-b5a9-4bcc-a002-d9834fc57e78] [~accountid:5e69e1abae59460cfb01e9cd] [~accountid:557058:3c9d0205-242e-4af3-be20-9293b7a3ba27] 

The UI will be updated soon.;[~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] [https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/screen/417fb4dc-c548-46ac-b637-680e00ffa360/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/screen/417fb4dc-c548-46ac-b637-680e00ffa360/|smart-link] 
Please check my comments and update mockup. Thanks.;[~accountid:5b39a251d38a522e77ff7642] [~accountid:5eeb358e96b9660abf6c15b5] View Details button should be also displayed when the KYC status is Approve. On clicking, admin can open the KYC info page with Approved status at top.

column3: KardPOS - Display transaction for AirPay
column4:
As a merchant staff, after the customer makes payment via AirPay, I want that transaction recorded on KardPOS app.

+*AC*+

*_Transaction List_*

Transaction Category: Card Purchase

User avatar: display the avatar of user who made payment via AirPay.

User’s full name: display the full name of user who made payment via AirPay.

Amount: {color:#36b37e}*+$x.xx*{color}

Transaction Date/Time: keep as the current format.

*_Transaction Detail_*

Transaction Category: Card Purchase

User avatar: display the avatar of user who made payment via AirPay.

User’s full name: display the full name of user who made payment via AirPay.

Amount: {color:#36b37e}*+$x.xx*{color}

Fee: *$x.xx*

Transaction Date: keep as the current format.

Transaction Time: keep as the current format.

Refund Transaction button: allow the staff to refund for customer (the refund flow will be as same as the current one).

+UI:+ 

!image-20210108-084611.png|width=276,height=557!

!image-20210108-084735.png|width=279,height=558!
column30:
Mobile est 1 point;[~accountid:5caacdb1055f3f7a1824b0dc]
The Transaction Category should be "Payment";[~accountid:5b43ade2a492e959f3f3248b] Currently we only use “Payment” on transaction of consumer app, so KardPOS will use the old name “Card Purchase”.

column3: [Backend] - Kanoo PWK Integration - isLandLuck
column4:
Make modification to PWK for specific Client call: isLandLuck

* Do not allow Guest Payment
* Do not allow Credit Card payment
* Hide and disable UI relates to Guest

User paying the Payment request must be identical to isLandLuck account.
For example: There's a payment request of user uer001@email.com. Only the Kanoo User with email uer001@email.com can pay this request.

column3: [Android] - KardPOS Tablet - Scan Product Barcode with External Device
column4:
As a merchant staff I want to be able to scan product’s barcode using the external device with the same method that we are using for Pay with QR function so that I don’t need to use the tablet’s camera with the current function because using camera will consumer the device battery much.

* Add new tab “Enter Code” to the current screen of scanning product like we have for Pay with QR method.
* A product will be added into the order if scanned product barcode is valid automatically so that they can continue with other products without doing anymore step. Otherwise, show the message “The product barcode is invalid.” and the popup will be closed automatically after 3 seconds or staff can click on Close button to close the error popup.

UI mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/c90832e9-36a1-4fa1-bdfb-f3fdb3a5ca4a-9c5b/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/c90832e9-36a1-4fa1-bdfb-f3fdb3a5ca4a-9c5b/|smart-link] 

*For Android, we will user the Tharo device for testing*
column23: Create Order - Camera.png;Create Order - Enter Code.png

column3: [Android] - Invite - Update for Finder Commission
column4:
As a consumer, I want to be able to invite both consumer and merchant to join the system, so that I can get invitation bonus.

+*AC:*+

I tap Invite icon on Home screen to open Invite screen.

On the screen, I want to have two tabs Invite Users and Invite Businesses

*_Invite Users_*

Above the title, I can see a logo representing for people.

I can see a text to show that how much I can get the bonus for inviting someone.

{color:#00b8d9}*(refer to the excel file for displaying)*{color}

*_Invite Businesses_*

Above the title, I can see a logo representing for business.

I can see a text to show that how much I can get the bonus for inviting someone to join ARM platform.

{color:#00b8d9}*_(refer to the excel file for displaying)_*{color}

Below each tab screen, I can see an Invite button at bottom. On tapping, the dialog will be opened which I can choose method to send inviation (mail, SMS or any other media apps).

+_Note:_+

User can invite an email with two types Consumer and Business at the same time.

User should be navigated back to Invite screen after sending invitation successfully.

XD: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/06077a05-a263-41a9-b726-b53bc8bbcd01-5354/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/06077a05-a263-41a9-b726-b53bc8bbcd01-5354/|smart-link]

column3: [Backend] Visipay - Commission Configuration - Update for Finder Commission
column4:
As a Visipay admin, I want to be able to configure the finder commission for inviting consumer and ARM merchant to the system.

+*AC:*+

* I click on Commission Configuration on left menu to open Commission Configuration page.
* On the page I can see two sections Consumer Invitation Bonus and Business Invitation Bonus.

!339fe4d7-f9f0-43a0-a815-7ce6c0d95d96.png|width=1920,height=1259!



*_Consumer Invitation Bonus_*

I want to have three fields:

* Bonus for Inviter field: 
** I can enter bonus amount for inviter.
** Bonus is not applied if the amount is $0.00
* Bonus for Invitee field: 
** I can enter bonus amount for invitee.
** Bonus is not applied if the amount is $0.00
* Condition (Minimum Purchase Amount of Invitee field): 
** I can enter minimum purchase amount of invitee so both inviter and invitee can get bonus. 
*** Note: this is applied for all payment flow by Kash Kard we have currently in system including buying product / gift card, pay with QR, scan to pay (AirPay & unpaid order), Pay With HYT.
** {color:#ff5630}*This is only applied for paying by kash kard.*{color}
** This condition amount is only applied for only one order and at any time. 
*** Example: the condition is $10.00, after registering, invitee can make order many times, the system will check which time the pay amount matches to the condition amount and offer points to either inviter or invitee.
** If the amount is $0.00, which means after the invitee signs up an account successfully, the bonus will be offered right away for inviter and invitee.

*_ARM Merchant Invitation Bonus_*

I want to have three fields:

* Bonus for Inviter field: I can enter bonus amount for inviter.
** I can enter bonus amount for inviter.
** Bonus is not applied if the amount is $0.00
* Bonus for Invitee field: I can enter bonus amount for invitee.
** I can enter bonus amount for inviter.
** Bonus is not applied if the amount is $0.00
* Condition (Purchase Subscription Plan checkbox): 
** I can check/uncheck so both inviter and invitee can get bonus.
** This condition will be checked by default. If this is unchecked, inviter and invitee can get bonus if invitee do not purchase ARM Subscription plan.

+_Note:_+

* Bonus will be offered to users as points. The points are taken from the default merchant of tenant.
* If the invitee bonus is configured, the inviter bonus is also required, which means that the admin can configure bonus for inviter only but both must be provided if the invitee has bonus. In case when the invitee has bonus and the inviter bonus is empty or $0.00, show the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“Bonus for Inviter is required.“_*{color}
* If the bonus amount is $0.00 or the condition is unchecked, we do not show Condition on Invite screen of mobile or web app.
* For the Condition (Minimum Purchase Amount of Invitee field): invitee has to make payment minimum the amount once time only, for example: the condition amount is $100.00, invitee has to pay minimum $100.00 so either invitee or invitee can receive the bonus.
* Record on My Rewards screen (Point tab of Wallet): 
** Description: “Invitation Bonus“.

!image-20201221-070640.png|width=323,height=701!

* Point reward type: InvitationBonus
* Send bonus for invitee and inviter when
** When consumer register successfully
** When a user buy product/giftcard by kashkard 
** When register ARM successfully
** When ARM merchant subscribe a plan

column3: [Android] KardPOS PAX - Received and Process Unpaid Order
column4:
As a merchant staff, I want to be able to process payment for an unpaid order after it’s sent from the tablet device.

+*AC:*+

* On PAX device, when the Order Detail screen is auto-opened and the Payment Method pop-up is auto-displayed, I will choose a method to process payment.
* The method list includes:
** Pay with Card: Customer will give the physical credit card to make payment.
** Pay with Cash: Customer will give cash to make payment.
** Pay with QR: Customer will present the QR code of Kash Kard or Credit Card on app to make payment.
* After payment successfully, I will be navigated back to Order Detail screen and the order status is updated to Completed.
column30: [~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] Please provide UI design for this story.

column3: [Android] - KardPOS Tablet - Send Unpaid Order to Connected Device (PAX)
column4:
+*AC:*+

* I have configured the connection between my KardPOS app on the tablet device to KardPOS on PAX device already. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2180|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2180|smart-link]).
* I can send orders to PAX device in 2 cases:

||*Cases*||*Actions*||
|I’m creating a casual order on KardPOS app of tablet device. When I click Create Order button:|* On PAX device, the Order Detail screen of the current order is auto-opened and Payment Method pop-up is auto-displayed as well.
* I can select a method to process payment on PAX.|
|I created an unpaid order already. On Order List or Order Detail screen (tablet), when I click Pay Order button:|* On PAX device, the Order Detail screen of the current order is auto-opened and Payment Method pop-up is auto-displayed as well.
* I can select a method to process payment on PAX.|

column3: [Android] - KardPOS - Connect PAX device
column4:
As a merchant staff, I want to be able to connect KardPOS app on mobile/tablet device to KardPOS app on PAX device, so that I can make unpaid order and help the customer to make payment more quickly and conveniently.

+*AC:*+

* I click a new item on the list menu on KardPOS named *Connect Device* to open Connect Device screen.
* On the screen, I can see:
** Text: *_“To connect a PAX device, you have to enter the serial number to the below field.“_*
** A field to enter.
** Save button: On clicking show the message pop-up *_“You have configured successfully.“_*
* After the connection is configured already, if I want to connect another PAX device, I can open this screen and edit the serial number.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/4245a048-635e-472f-b1d4-6463968b350c-1716/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/4245a048-635e-472f-b1d4-6463968b350c-1716/|smart-link]

column3: Kanoo - BE - Save Shopping Cart
column4:
As a customer I want to be able to save products to my shopping cart to order then.

+*Acceptance Criteria:*+

* Show the toast message “{color:#00b8d9}*_Product added to cart_*{color}“ every time adding product to cart successfully.
* On Home screen and marketplace screen, I can see a new icon next to Pay Bills icon named *Cart*, on tapping I can be navigated to Your Cart screen. 
** The number badge should be shown on Cart icon of Home screen and Marketplace screen. The number badge will be refreshed when the home screen is opened
** If only number is refreshing, user should not see the loading circle, it is a bad UX, just call the API to refresh and update the UI when it done
* I can select and add products from different merchants to my Cart.
* I can select a product multiple times to add to my Cart.
* Cart is saved on server and I can see it after that on all devices (Kanoo app, Kanoo Web and KZ site)
* I can open Product Detail screen (mobile) / pop-up (web) from the Cart screen (for product including or not including options).
* For each product on the cart, I want to see:
** Product name
** Product image
** Quantity field to edit
** Product price (Original price - Discount price)
** Options for a product (if available)
* Cart should be update when:
** I added a new product from a store detail / shopping screen to my cart.
** I update the number of product that I want to buy on Cart detail screen:
** I remove any products on cart detail screen
* I can see Checkout button for each merchant on Cart like the web app is doing.

+_Validation Rules:_+

* If there is no products in the cart, show the message at center of screen {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your Cart Is Empty.“_*{color}
* The cart on Kanoo app or web will be only synced to KZ site of the default konnect zone:
** Ex: User adds 3 items of store A and 2 items of store B, when login to KZ site default of A he/she will see 3 items of A. Similarly, he/she will see 2 items of B.
* For the product which has options, user can tap on that product (image or option) to edit options of that one.
* User can edit the number of a product they want to buy:
** By (+) or (-) buttons:
*** User can decrease the number to 0 to remove a product from the cart.
*** User can increase maximum to the current inventory number of a product.
** By enter manually. If they enter the number larger than the current inventory number of that product, show the toast message saying {color:#ff5630}*_“This product has_*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}{color:#ff5630}*_x_*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}{color:#ff5630}*_items left in stock.“_*{color}, then the number user enters will be auto-changed to *x*. (*x: the current inventory number of a product*).
* When user is at Product screen, the merchant admin disables any products, user adds that product to cart, show the toast message {color:#ff5630}*“*{color}{color:#ff5630}*_This product is not available currently._*{color}{color:#ff5630}*“*{color}
* If the cart on mobile app and web app has the same number (3 items): 
** *_User removes all 3 items on mobile app:_*
*** On web app, if they click Checkout button at Cart Detail page, show the notification message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}_._ After user close the pop-up, Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.
*** If they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}_._ After user close the pop-up, they should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.
** *_User removes or makes payment 1 of 3 items on mobile app_*
*** On web app, if they click Checkout button at Cart page, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, Cart page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.
*** On web app, if they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, they should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.
** *_User does payment for all 3 items on mobile app completely_*
*** On web app, if they click Checkout button, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been paid already._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.
*** On web app, if they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been paid already._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, they should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.
** *_User does payment for all 3 items on mobile app completely_*
*** On web app, if they update any item on web app (edit number, change options, …), show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been paid already._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.
*** On web app, if click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been paid already._*{color}_“_. After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.
* When user opens Cart screen (from Home screen / left menu) or tapping Checkout button on Shopping Cart screen , if there is any products being changed before they make payment:
** *_Case 1: For products which changed or affected by Product Image / Product Title / Option / Description / Inventory Number (out of stock or not enough in stock) or the category containing product deleted by merchant admin._*
*** Show the message pop-up: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}
*** After close the pop-up:
**** The products which have been changed should be removed.
**** Keep the products which have not been changed anything.
** *_Case 2:  For products which changed or affected by Price or Tax_*
*** Show the message pop-up: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}
*** Show the list of products normally.
*** Update the latest price and tax for products which are changed about price and tax.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/a5083f0d-a37e-4c2f-8cf0-7d797fe0ba90|https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/a5083f0d-a37e-4c2f-8cf0-7d797fe0ba90|smart-link]

column3: [Android] - Kanoo app - Marketplace - Shopping
column4:
As a Kanoo user, I want to have a Marketplace screen on the app so that I can explore the stores aroung my current position.

+*AC:*+

*_Shopping_*

* On this tab, I want to see the list of all products which are active from all businesses in system. 
* The list of products will be shown as grid view mode.
* Each product being shown here must belong to at least one konnect category of any konnect zones and the konnect zone must be active and set as default as well.
* I can filter product with category by the filter icon on Search field:
** On clicking the icon, show the list of product categories screen.
** I can select / deselect one or multiple categories to filter.
** For each selected category, it will be highlighted. 
** I can tap Clear button to clear all filter. On clicking, all selected categories will be unselected, I can select other categories and get back to Shopping tab.
** Filter icon should be bold and colored if I am using filter.
** Keep the filtering results screen when:
*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.
*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online and Shopping.
* By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (*All*).
* For each product, I want to see:
** Product name:
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.
** Product price:
*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)
*** Show maximumly in 1 lines, use ellipsis if the price is too long.
** Business name:
*** Show maximumly in 1 lines, use ellipsis if the business name is too long.
* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.
* I can search product by product name and business name, placeholder text: *_“Search…“_*
** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.
** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keyword.
** Keep the searching results screen when:
*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.
*** Switch between Nearby, Online and Shopping.
* I can sort product list by:
** Latest: sort product list by latest created date
** Price:
*** Low to High
*** High to Low.
** Most discounted (based on discount percentage): sort product list by most discount.
* By default, the list of products will be sorted by created date (Newest).
* If no products is available or no matched searching / filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No products found.“_*{color}.
* User can scroll down to hide Search field and Sorting price lines, but when they scroll up those lines should appear right away. (make it like Shopee app as the video attachment below). 

Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/393838ac-d44f-4d3d-b082-07092fb59c7d|https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/393838ac-d44f-4d3d-b082-07092fb59c7d|smart-link]

column3: [Android] - Kanoo app - Marketplace - Gift Cards
column4:
As a Kanoo user, I want to have a Marketplace screen on the app so that I can explore the stores around my current position.

+*AC:*+

*_Gift cards_*

* On this tab, I want to see the list of all gift cards which are approved and enabled in system.  
* The list will be sorted by: 
** Most discounted (percentage).
** Alphabet (if gift cards have the same discount percentage )
* For each Gift Card, I want to see:
** Gift card image
** Gift card name
** Gift card value (single or multiple): displaying in USD and points as well.
** Discount percentage (if available)
** Business name
* I can search gift card by gift card name or business name, placeholder text: *_“Search…“_*
** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.
** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keyword.
** Keep the searching results screen when:
*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.
*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online and Shopping.
* I can filter gift card by tapping Filter icon on Search field:
** On clicking the icon, show the list of business categories screen.
** I can select -deselect- only one category to filter.
** Show the name of the selected category. (the default value is *All Categories*).
** I can select the *All Categories* to clear filter.
** Filter icon should be bold and colored (Kanoo theme color) if I am using filter.
** Keep the filtering results screen when:
*** -Returning Gift Cards tab from any store details screen.-
*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Gift Cards and Shopping.
* If no gift cards is available or no matched searching results, display *_“No gift cards found“_*.
* I can click any gift cards to buy (Checkout flow will be kept as the current one).

Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/7d050279-d850-4c97-b76f-d54e427b90e9|https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/7d050279-d850-4c97-b76f-d54e427b90e9|smart-link]

column3: [Backend] - Consumer App - Display transaction of external payment
column4:
As a customer, I want to see the transaction on my consumer app after I make external payment with any e-commerce sites.

+*AC:*+

*_Transaction List screen_*

* Transaction Type: *_Payment_*
* Remitter: 
** Kash Kard/*xxxx
** Credit Card/*xxxx
** BTC Card/*xxxx
** ETH Card/*xxxx
** ZVC Card/*xxxx
* Beneficiary: Merchant Name/*xxxx
* Amount: display amount in USD, -if I make payment by crypto card, let’s also display amount in BTC/ETH/ZVC currency and exchange rate.-

*_Transaction Detail screen_*

* Transaction Type: *_Payment_*
* Amount: display amount in USD -if I make payment by crypto card, let’s also display amount in BTC/ETH/ZVC currency and exchange rate.-
* Transaction ID
* Description: Make payment externally by Kash Kard / Credit Card / BTC Card / ETH Card / ZVC Card.
* Status: Completed
* Transaction Date
* Remitter:
** Kash Kard/*xxxx
** Credit Card/*xxxx
** BTC Card/*xxxx
** ETH Card/*xxxx
** ZVC Card/*xxxx
* Beneficiary: Merchant Name/*xxxx

+_Note:_+ The UI design should be as same as the current one on mobile app.

column3: Kanoo - View Unpaid Order
column4:
+*AC:*+

* I tap Orders button to open Order List screen.
* On Order List screen, I can see one more tab named *Unpaid* next to Delivery tab. This tab will contain all unpaid orders created from KanooPOS tablet. 
* The unpaid orders are also contained by All Orders tabs.
* The list on Unpaid tab will be sorted by created date (latest).
* After being paid from KanooPOS ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2137|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2137|smart-link] ):
** The order will be moved to All Orders tab with Completed status.
** Refund button will be displayed on Order Detail screen of this order, user can request refund for this order.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/b6052c05-1d48-4d8d-b404-2839a8597ba9/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/b6052c05-1d48-4d8d-b404-2839a8597ba9/|smart-link]

I think it should be in All Orders tab.;[~accountid:5da045fbe881600dc8fd01a5] Please note that the there is a field called “isRefundable“ on the response of the APIs of order the determine if this order can be refunded or not;[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] Yes for an unpaid order (with refund status pending, rejected or approved) they are all displayed at All Orders tab.;[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] But unpaid order is only able to be refunded after it’s paid.

column3: KanooPOS - View, Pay and Cancel Unpaid Order
column4:
+*AC:*+

*_View unpaid orders_*

I tap Orders button to open Order List screen.

||*Unpaid tab*||*All Orders tab*||
|Only display all unpaid orders.|Display all unpaid orders as well as the orders which are paid already (Completed).|

*_Pay unpaid orders_*

* For each unpaid order from Order List screen, I can see two buttons Pay Order and Cancel. These two buttons are also displayed on Order Detail screen.
* Pay Order button: refer to the ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2699|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2699|smart-link] 

*_Cancel unpaid orders_*

* On tapping Cancel button, show the pop-up:
** Title: Cancel Order
** Message: *_“Are you sure to cancel this order?“_*
** Options:
*** Yes: Close the pop-up, show the toast message {color:#00b8d9}*_“Order cancelled.“_*{color}
*** No: Close the pop-up, nothing’s changed.
* After cancel successfully:
** Show Orders screen (All Orders tab) if cancelling from Orders screen.
** Show Order Detail screen if cancelling from Order Detail screen.
** The order on consumer app:
*** Update status to Cancelled.
*** Change from Unpaid to All Orders tab.

+_Note:_+

* When user A create unpaid order, there’s only user A who can make payment for his/her order, user A’s friend cannot do it by their QR Code of Cash Card.
* On this scope of release, the staff can only scan the QR code of Cash Card from Kanoo app, they cannot scan gift card.
* A Gift Cash Card can be used only if the merchant is associated with the government.
