column3: KanooPOS Tablet - Create Order
column4:
As the merchant staff, I want to be able to create an order for customer at store.

+*AC:*+

I tap Create Order button on the menu list to open Create Order screen. The button should be located at the first home screen after I login to KanooPOS.

On Create Order screen:

* At top, I can see three fields First Name, Last Name and Phone Number and an edit icon, on clicking the Customer Information Dialog is opened, it includes fields below:
** Phone Number (*required*): On this field I can select the country code (country flag and number code) before entering the phone number behind, the app will check the phone number and it will suggest the list of users matching to that phone number. In this case, First Name and Last Name fields will be auto-filled afterwards.
** First Name: auto-filled from the phone number.
** Last Name: auto-filled from the phone number.
* I can see the list of product categories of my merchant. 
** This list displays all product categories created by merchant admin:
*** When I select a specified category, show the list of products associated with that category.
*** When I select All, show all products by the display condition below.
** This list is sort by category name (alphabet).
** I can slide to see more.
* Below the list of product categories, I can see the list of products belonging to the current category. 
** {color:#6554c0}+*Display Condition*+{color}{color:#6554c0}+:+{color} Each product being displayed on the screen must be contained by at least one konnect category (Product type), and this konnect category must belong to at least one konnect zone which is being active.
** A product can be still displayed even if it’s not associated with any product categories:
** For each product, I can see product image, product name, price (original and discount price) and Add button. I can tap that to add product to the cart:
*** For a product which have no options: it will be added to Cart right away.
*** For a product which have options inside: Product Detail pop-up will be opened. I can select options and tap Add to List button to add it to Cart.
** The list of product will be sorted by the latest created date from top downwards.
* Below the list of products, I can see Scan Products button: I can tap that to open Scanning Product screen. When Scanning Product screen is opened, I can see Browse Products button, I can tap that to switch again the list of products screen again. In case scanning invalid barcode, show the message “Invalid barcode. Please try again.“
* I can search products by product name or barcode.
* At right side, I can see the cart zone containing products added:
** For each product of Cart, I can see: 
*** Product image, product name, product price (discounted), product options.
*** Quantity field: I can edit the number of products I want to buy by tapping + / - button or modifying the number.
*** (x) icon: I can tap to remove the product out of Cart.
** Above the Cart, I can see Clear button. On tapping, I can remove all products out of Cart. The confimation pop-up will be displayed *_“Are you sure to remove all items?“_* and two buttons:
*** OK: Close the pop-up and remove all items from cart.
*** Cancel: Close the pop-up and nothing’s changed.
** Below the Cart, I can see Sub Total, Tax and Total amounts and Create Order button. 
** On tapping Create Order button, Payment Method pop-up is opened:
*** Pay with QR: After selecting, the payment screen is opened (same as when tapping Pay button from the menu list):
**** The paid amount is auto-filled by the order amount. Payment Cards will be the same, too.
**** Discount field will be not displayed.
**** The function works on this screen will be as same as the old flow. (scan Cash Card / Gift Cash Card / Sand Dollar with gift card)
*** Pay Later: Save as an unpaid order.

+_Note:_+

* A guest (Non-Kanoo user) cannot make an unpaid order. Confirm button is only enabled if Phone number, First name and Last name are filled by a Kanoo user info.
* A product cannot be displayed on Create Order screen in cases below, if it’s added to cart before, when tapping Create Order button and when making payment, show the error message pop-up *_“Order failed\! There’s an error occurred with the business. Please contact Administrator for support.“_*_._ When closing this pop-up, all invalid products will be removed from the cart and from the list.
** Merchant account is deactivated / expired.
** Konnect zone is paused / expired.
** Konnect category is deleted / changed. (if it is the only category which contains product)
** The product is disabled or deleted on ARM site.
* If a product is changed something about *Product Image, Product Name, Price* (both original and discounted price), *Option*, *Tax*, when tapping Create Order button or when making payment, show the error message pop-up *_“Order failed\! Some products have been changed.“_*_._ When closing this pop-up, all changed products will be removed from the cart.
* A product can be displayed even if it’s out of stock or not, the staff can add to cart as usual, when tapping Create Order button or when tapping making payment, the pop-up will be shown and contain the list of products which are out of stock or not enough quantity. (if available). This should be as same as KardPOS app.
* A Gift Cash Card can be used only if the merchant is associated with the government. 

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3f442811-8f92-4b36-9c2a-8d5fe05bc2f3-6a17/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3f442811-8f92-4b36-9c2a-8d5fe05bc2f3-6a17/|smart-link]

column3: [Backend] - Kanoo web - Marketplace - Shopping tab
column4:
As a Kanoo user, I want to have a Shopping tab on Marketplace page, so that I can search and buy product more easily.

+*AC:*+

* On this tab, I want to see the list of all products which are active from all businesses in system. 
* Each product being shown here must belong to at least one konnect category of any konnect zones and the konnect zone must be active and default as well.
* I can filter product with category by the filter icon on Search field:
** On clicking the icon, show the list of product categories screen.
** I can select / deselect one or multiple categories to filter.
** For each selected category, it will be highlighted.
** I can select Clear button to clear filter.
** Filter icon should be bold and colored if I am using filter.
* By default, I can see the list of products from all categories (*All*).
* For each product, I want to see:
** Product name:
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the product name is too long.
** Product price:
*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)
*** Show maximumly in 1 lines, use smaller font size if the price is too long.
** Business name:
*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use ellipsis if the business name is too long.
** Add to Cart button: 
*** The behavior when click on this button should be the same with the button add to Card on Product category detail screen so I can add product to my cart with this button
* I can search product by product name and business name.
* I can sort product list by:
** Latest (created date of product)
** Price:
*** Low to High
*** High to Low
** Most discount (based on discount percentage): For example product A and B has discount percentage 5% and 10%, product B will be above product A.
* By default, the list of products will be sorted by Price (Low to high).
* If no products are available or no matched searching / filtering results, display *_“No products found.“_*.
* When I scroll down to see more products, the search box and the sort button should be hide and when I scroll up, they should be show again. Please refer to this behavior for this AC 
!demo_gif.gif|width=28.49462365591398%!

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/a5083f0d-a37e-4c2f-8cf0-7d797fe0ba90|https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/screen/a5083f0d-a37e-4c2f-8cf0-7d797fe0ba90|smart-link]

column3: [Android] - Kanoo app - Marketplace - Nearby
column4:
+*AC:*+

*_Nearby_*

* On this tab, I want to see the list of all konnect zones (store) near my position (within 10 miles). I can scroll down to view more and the list will be sorted by:
** Distance from my position (nearest)
** Alphabet (business name)
* Each konnect zone must be active and selected as Show On Marketplace to be shown on this tab.
* For each store, I want to see:
** Merchant logo image
** Business name
** Business category
** Store’s address
** The distance from my position to the store
** Discount percentage (if available)
** Rating stars
* I can tap on any stores to open Store Detail screen (Konnect Zone detail) .
* I can search store by business name or business category, placeholder text: *_“Search…“_*
** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.
** Show all results if searching by *blank characters* or clearing keyword.
** Keep the searching results screen when:
*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.
*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online and Shopping.
* I can filter stores by tapping Filter icon on Search field:
** On clicking the icon, show the list of business categories screen.
** I can select / deselect only one category to filter.
** Show the name of the selected category. (the default value is *All Categories*).
** I can select the *All Categories* to clear filter..
** Filter icon should be bold and colored (Kanoo theme color) if I am using filter.
** Keep the filtering results screen when:
*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.
*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online and Shopping.
* If no stores is available or no matched searching results, display *_“No stores found“_*.

Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/231ddd94-d72d-4de8-ad94-78cadfe7eef3-764e/|smart-link]

column3: BE - Consumer App - Update Notifications for Buying Products
column4:
+*AC:*+

||*Current Behavior*||*Update*||
|!image-20210208-023802.png|width=356,height=764!|Title: *Point Reward*
Content:
* For each item of any types of product, user can get a defined number of points, we should sum up all points as one notification: *_“You got <number> points for buying products.”_* (Ex: User buys 5 iPhones, each item he can get 10 pts, so the notification is “You got 50 points for buying products.“)
* For cashback points: *_“You got <number> cashback points after making payment $<amount>“_* (You got 10 cashback points after making payment $100.00“)
Image: Business Logo Image
Refer to this document: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|smart-link]|

+_Note:_+ This ticket will be applied for buying product flow from consumer app and KardPOS as well.

column3: Kanoo - ARM Admin - Set default merchant for Kanoo web app
column4:
As a Kanoo master admin, I want to setup a default merchant to display on Home page of Kanoo web app.

+*AC:*+

* I login to ARM by admin account.
* On the list of menu items, I can see a new one named Default Merchant.
* On clicking I can open the page Default Merchant.
* I can see two drop-down list fields:
** Business: show the business name
*** The default value is “Select a business”. 
*** Only show the list of businesses which are being active.
*** When I select any merchants, Konnect zones list below will be shown correspondingly.
** Konnect zone: show the konnect zone name
*** The default value is “Select a konnect zone”.
***  *Nov 30, 2020:* Only show the list of konnect zones which are being active and set as default KZ of each merchant.
* I can see Save button to save a new konnect zone of any merchants as a default merchant.
* After setting default merchant succcesfully, show a message pop-up: *_“The default merchant was set up successfully.“_*

+Note:+

* If the master admin deactivates a merchant account and sets up default merchant with that account failed, let’s show the message *_“The merchant has been deactivated currently.“_*
* -If the merchant admin pauses a konnect zone and the master admin sets up default merchant with that konnect zone failed, let’s show the message- *-_“The konnect zone has been deactivated currently.“_-*
* If the konnect zone of any merchant is not selected as default, paused or expired and the master admin sets up default merchant with that konnect zone failed, let’s show message *_“The konnect zone is invalid.“_*
* If the merchant account is deleted and the master admin sets up default merchant with that merchant failed, let’s show message *_“The merchant has been deleted.“_*

column3: KardPOS - Order List - Support filter and search orders
column4:
As a staff at store, I want to be able to filter the list of orders which has been created at the terminal with the same location with me, so that I can find it and make payment quickly.

+*AC:*+

* I click Orders button to open Order List screen.
* On the screen:
** I can filter the order list by options below:
*** Location: displaying the list of locations which have been registered terminals by a drop-down list. I can select one location to filter the list.
*** Order Date: displaying Today by default, user can select a date range to filter the list. 
*** Status: *(This filter option is hidden for Completed tab)*
**** All (default): displaying all orders with all statuses
**** New
**** Preparing
**** Ready
**** Shipping
**** Unpaid
*** Type:
**** All (default): displaying both Delivery and Pickup orders
**** Delivery
**** Pickup
*** When filter is being used:
**** The icon should be highlighted.
**** The filter should not sync each other tabs.
*** I can clear all the filter.
** I can search orders by Order Number, Customer Name.
*** This function is only worked on each tab seperately, which means user can only search orders with New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping on Processing tab only, and it is similar on Completed tab.
*** When using search: 
**** Search results should be auto-cleared after clearing the keywords, show all orders as before.
**** The results should be kept when user switches between 2 tabs. It will be gone if user open the other screen.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/1815368c-09ea-4b02-9cd2-8a27972c9050-4d46/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/1815368c-09ea-4b02-9cd2-8a27972c9050-4d46/|smart-link]

column3: Update Email/Notification Reminder for Pending Transaction of Loading KK from Bank Account
column4:
* New title: Reminder to settle your pending transaction
* New content
** A transaction of loading $100.00 to your Kash Kard is pending for your confirmation. Please open this transaction on the app to see the instruction.
* The reminder for card load will be sent after 24 hours, only send once
* The reminder for card withdraw will be sent after 4 hours, only send once

column3: Web Apps - Pay for a Merchant with Airpay  Method
column4:
As a customer, I want to be able to pay any merchants by AirPay Method on my app.

+*AC:*+ *From Store detail page* {color:#ff5630}*(applied for the ARM merchant only, not InComm merchant)*{color}

* I want to have Pay button show on this page.
* On tapping Pay button, Enter Amount pop-up is opened (refer to AC1).
* After entering amount and tap Continue button, show the Confirm & Pay pop-up, which should follow the current UI of buying product flow (refer to AC1):
** If I have verified KYC, the default card is Kash Kard, I can change to Credit Card.
** If I haven’t verified KYC yet:
*** If I added the credit card, show Credit Card as the default card.
*** If I do not add any cards yet, show Select Payment Method, on tapping I can add a new card to pay.
* After tapping Confirm Payment button, show Payment Complete page. Tapping Close button will navigate me to the Transaction History screen (from top menu).

+_Note:_+

In this payment case, coupon Buy X get Y cannot be shown if user wants to redeem coupon, they only can use percentage coupon or voucher.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3768f003-8056-4a23-919d-9e1bc4baa802-623b/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3768f003-8056-4a23-919d-9e1bc4baa802-623b/|smart-link]

column3: [Backend] - Consumer App - Checkout Order - Display Cashback Points
column4:
We need to show points rewarded for the order in the checkout process to customer if the merchant has offer for cashback reward in points.

Screens applied:

* Buying products with $
* Buying gift cards with $

Note:

* The amount that will be used to calculate the point reward is the final amount user pay (exclude cause2fund amount).
** For example: Sub-total: 10; Tax: 1; Gift card: -2; Coupon: -3; Point used: -4; Cause2Fund.
** => Amount = 10+1-2-3-4 = 2. the point reward will be calculate base on $2

column3: [Backend] - KardPOS - Order Detail - Show QR code of Unpaid order
column4:
As a merchant admin, I want to show QR code of *unpaid* order for customer to scan and make payment for this type of order.

+*AC:*+

On Order Detail screen of *unpaid* order, I can see a QR code below Pay Order and Cancel button.

Below QR code, there’s a code by text including 12 characters (alphabet and numeric). The customer can scan or type the code to make payment for the order.

This QR code will never be expired.

User will open mobile app and scan the QR code to make payment.

+_Note:_+

If I and another staff are handling an unpaid order nearly at the same time:

* At Order List screen (Processing tab), tapping on an unpaid order which was paid already will navigate to Completed tab with the message pop-up *_“This order has been completed already.“_*
* -At Order Detail screen, when user scans QR code, show the message pop-up on consumer app- *-_“This order has been paid already.“_-*-_._- -On KardPOS, tapping Back button will navigate to Order List screen (Completed tab).-

*User can scan unpaid order if AirPay setting on ARM site is enabled or not.*

column3: [Backend] - Point Reward for Payment
column4:
As a customer, I expect to see the points rewarded to my wallet for my payment and order purchasing to a merchant if that merchant has cashback rules with points.

* I can see record history for cashback points in My Reward section of Points under Wallet.
** Icon: reuse the point reward icon.
** Message displayed: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback”_*{color}
* I can see my points balance to be increased after I make and pay for an order successfully.
** Unpaid orders created by merchant staff on KardPOS will not have cashback points until they are paid.
* I receive a push notification for my point reward of this with the below content.
** {color:#00b8d9}You receive XXX points from \[Merchant Business Name] after purchasing $X.XX{color}

Cashback rules are applied for the payment types below by Kash Kard and Credit Card as well:

* Purchase order.
* Purchase gift card.
* Pay with QR at store.
* Make payment via AirPay with the QR code of merchant at store.
* Make payment for an unpaid order at store.
* Pay with HYT / Kard.

The amount that will be used to calculate the point reward is the final amount user pay (exclude cause2fund amount).
For example: Sub-total: 10; Tax: 1; Gift card: -2; Coupon: -3; Point used: -4; Cause2Fund: 5
=> Amount = 10+1-2-3-4 = 2. the point reward will be calculate base on $2

* Add new screen to show Payment QR Code.

+_Note:_+

The QR code from KardPOS must be as same as the QR code from ARM Merchant site.

column3: Consumer app - Scan QR code of unpaid order to pay
column4:
As a merchant, I want to have an option to have QR code of *unpaid* order in order customers to scan to pay.

This is the flow.

* The staff creates *unpaid* order on KardPOS tablet.
* Staff opens that *unpaid* order detail screen and show QR code of that order to customer.
* Customer selects Kash Kard or Credit Card from their wallet and select Scan to Pay to scan QR code of that *unpaid* order to pay for it. 
* After scanning, show Confirm & Pay screen, which should follow the current UI of buying product flow:
** The default payment method is Kash Kard or Credit Card, I cannot change it.
** I can see Sub Total, You Pay amounts displayed correctly.
** I can redeem coupon, gift card or points for this payment.
** Cause2Fund option also displayed here.
** I can tap Confirm Payment button displayed at the bottom of this screen to continue payment.
*** Show Order Completed screen on KardPOS.
*** Show Payment Complete screen on consumer app.
*** The order status changed from Unpaid to Completed. (moved to Completed tab).
column30:
[~accountid:5caacdb1055f3f7a1824b0dc] Please work with designer team to provide mockup for this and also update ACs if needed.;[~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] Please provide UI design for this ticket.

In this case, we go with this flow: Scan to Pay => Scan screen => Confirm & Pay screen => Complete.

column3: [Backend] - Mobile Apps - Pay for a Merchant with Airpay  Method
column4:
As a customer, I want to be able to pay any merchants by AirPay Method on my app.

+*AC1:*+ *From Kash Kard or Credit Card detail screen (*{color:#ff5630}*only applied for ARM merchants only, not InComm merchants*{color}*)*

||*Merchant*||*Unpaid Order*||
|* On the card detail screen (Kash Kard or Credit Card), I can see a new payment option named *_Scan to Pay_*.
* When I tap *_Scan to Pay_*, Scan QR Code screen is opened. I will scan QR code, {color:#ff5630} *which is the AirPay code of merchant* {color}({color:#ff5630}*define in* {color}[https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1811|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1811|smart-link]) or {color:#ff5630}*from KardPOS* {color}([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1815|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1815|smart-link]){color:#ff5630} {color}.
* After scanning QR code, Enter Amount screen is opened, I can see:
** Merchant name is displayed at the top of this screen and center-aligned
** A field to enter an amount.
** Continue button: on tapping it’ll show Confirm & Pay screen. This button should be disabled if the amount field is equals to $0.00
* Confirm & Pay screen should follow the current UI of buying product flow:
** I can see Sub Total, You Pay, Discount, Cashback amounts displayed.
** I can redeem coupon, gift card or point for the current payment.
** Cause2Fund option also displayed here.
** I can tap Confirm Payment button displayed at the bottom of this screen to continue payment.
** The default payment method is Kash Kard or Credit Card. I can change if I want.
* After tapping Confirm Payment button, show Payment Complete screen. Tapping Close button will navigate me to the Transaction History screen (from left menu).|* On the card detail screen (Kash Kard or Credit Card), I can see a new payment option named *_Scan to Pay_*.
* When I tap *_Scan to Pay_*, Scan QR Code screen is opened. 
* The staff will show me the QR code of unpaid order from KardPOS to scan.{color:#ff5630} {color}({color:#ff5630} {color}[https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1867|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1867|smart-link]{color:#ff5630}*).*{color}
* After scanning QR code, the Confirm & Pay screen is opened.
* Confirm & Pay screen should follow the current UI of buying product flow:
** I can see Sub Total, Tax, You Pay, Discount, Cashback amounts displayed.
** I can redeem coupon, gift card or point for this payment.
** Cause2Fund option also displayed here.
** I can tap Confirm Payment button displayed at the bottom of this screen to continue payment.
** The default payment method is Kash Kard or Credit Card. I cannot change if I want.
* After tapping Confirm Payment button:
** -Show Order Complete screen on KardPOS.-
** Show Payment Complete screen on consumer app. Tapping Close button will navigate me to the Transaction History screen (from left menu).
** The order status changed from Unpaid to Completed. (moved to Completed tab).|

+*AC2:*+ *From Store detail screen* {color:#ff5630}*(applied for the ARM merchant only, not InComm merchant)*{color}

* On tapping Pay button, Enter Amount screen is opened (refer to AC1).
* After entering amount and tap Continue button, show the Confirm & Pay screen, which should follow the current UI of buying product flow (refer to AC1):
** If I have verified KYC, the default card is Kash Kard, I can change to Credit Card.
** If I haven’t verified KYC yet:
*** If I added the credit card, show Credit Card as the default card.
*** If I do not add any cards yet, show Select Payment Method, on tapping I can add a new card to pay.
* After tapping Confirm Payment button, show Payment Complete screen. Tapping Close button will navigate me to the Transaction History screen (from left menu).

+_Note:_+

In this payment case, coupon Buy X get Y cannot be shown if user wants to redeem coupon, they only can use percentage coupon or voucher.

column3: ARM Merchant - Print Payable QR Code
column4:
As a merchant admin, I would like to provide a code to customers, so the customers can scan to do payment to me via Airpay method at anywhere and anytime.

+*AC:*+

* I login to ARM by my merchant account.
* I open Account page, and switch to Payment tab.
* On Payment Method page, I can see a new tab named *_AirPay_* right next to Point tab.
* On clicking *_AirPay_* tab, I can open the screen which contains my payment QR code. On this screen, I can see:
** My business logo image.
** QR code.
** Character code.
** Instruction text: {color:#00b8d9}_“_{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Please open the mobile app and scan the QR code to process payment._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}_“_{color}
** Print QR button: I can print QR code in a large size.
** AirPay Settings: I can see three options *_Enable_*_,_ *_SMS Notification_* and *_Email Notification_*. I can check/uncheck one or two options at the same time.
*** *_Enable:_*
**** If this option is checked, customers are able to do payment via AirPay.
**** If this option is unchecked, customer are not able to do payment via AirPay. At that time, if my QR code is scanned, show the error message {color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_AirPay feature is currently inactive._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}
*** *_SMS Notification:_* If this option is checked, I can get a SMS message every time any customer makes payment. This message will be sent directly to my phone number during the registration. 
**** Message content: {color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Your account has received a payment_* {color}{color:#00b8d9}*$<payment amount>*{color}{color:#00b8d9} *_via AirPay_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*.* {color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx_*{color}*“.*
*** *_Email Notification:_* If this option is checked, I can get an email every time any customer makes payment. This email will be sent to my email address during the registration.
**** Email subject: *AirPay Notification*
**** Email template and content: refer to the template file attached below.
*** By default, three options are all checked.
* Save button: After ticking any options of notification above, I can click on this button to save the settings
** If the settings saved successfully, show the message {color:#00b8d9}_“Notification settings have been saved successfully.“_{color}.
** If the settings saved unsuccessfully, show the message {color:#00b8d9}_“Notification settings have been saved unsuccessfully.“_{color}.
* After any payment via AirPay being done successfully, the transaction is recorded on Transactions page with transaction category Card Purchase (ARM) and Payment (consumer app).

column3: Consumer App - Get Remitter and Beneficiary data for Membership Payment transaction
column4:
As a consumer app, I want to view more details of Membership Payment transaction in the app.

+*AC:*+

*_Transaction List_*

* For HYT:
** Remitter: *\[Card Type]*/*xxxx (Ex: Kash Kard/*1234). Note that I can purchase membership package by Kash Kard or crypto card (BTC, ETH or ZVC)
** Beneficiary: Reserve Account
** Amount: displaying in dollars and crypto amount (if available)
** Exchange Rate: displaying as this format 1 BTC = $40,000  / 1 ETH = $1,000 / 1 ZVC = $2,000
* For Kard/GreenCom/KingdomPay:
** Remitter: Credit Card/*xxxx (Ex: Credit Card/*1234)
** Beneficiary: *\[Business Name]*/*xxxx (Ex: Lotteria/*2244)

column3: Configure Cashback Rules
column4:
As a merchant admin, I want to be able to configure Cashback Rules for my store on ARM.

+*AC:*+

* Access new tab Cashback Rules after Promotions tab of Campaigns screen. 
* Cashback rules are applied for the payment types below by Kash Kard and Credit Card as well:
** Purchase order.
** Purchase gift card.
** Pay with QR at store.
** Make payment via AirPay with the QR code of merchant at store.
** Make payment for an unpaid order at store.
* Cashback Type
** *_Instant Discount_*
*** Customers will pay for the amount after the discount.
*** By default, the amount field is 0%.
*** I can edit the amount right on the field and click Save button to save the change.
*** This is the percentage to be the same as the existing discount configuration “VisiKard Network Commission percent”.
** *_Point Reward:_* Customers pay for the full amount and get points rewarded to their point balance to redeem for later order or exchange to reward Mastercard.
*** _Pay At Least:_
**** User need to pay at least an certain amount to get cashback point to wallet. This amount should be the final amount which user has to pay for any payment types.
**** The amounts of each row must be different from each other and the system will select one range matching to pay amount to apply the cashback rule. If two rows have the same amount, show the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“This cashback rule is existing.“_*{color}
**** I can add more rows if I want, after adding the list of rows will be sorted from the smallest to largest.
**** By default, the amount of each line shown as View mode (the fields will be grey out).
*** _Cashback Amount:_ This is the number of points for Point Reward. The number must be larger than 0, if not showing the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Amount must be larger than 0.“_*{color}
*** _Edit button:_ On clicking, the page should be changed to Edit mode, Edit button is replaced by Save and Cancel buttons. After editting: 
**** Save: on clicking, the new change is applied and the list of rules will be sorted again.
***** Success message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was saved successfully.“_*{color}
***** Failed message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was saved unsuccessfully.“_*{color}
**** Cancel: on clicking, the page should be changed to View mode only.
*** _Delete button:_ On clicking, show a confirmation pop-up (the UI will be as same as the current UI of ARM pop-up):
**** Title: *Delete Cashback Rule*
**** Message: *_Are you sure to delete this cashback rule?_*
**** Buttons:
***** Yes: Close the pop-up, the row is gone. 
****** Success message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was deleted successfully.“_*{color}
****** Failed message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cashback Rule was deleted unsuccessfully.“_*{color}
***** No: Close the pop-up only.
* Remove “VisiKard Network Commission percent” from the Account tab because the discount configuration is moved to Cashback Rules.



Design: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/9f730305-09b8-4808-9e9a-238f2c18e019-ca20/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/9f730305-09b8-4808-9e9a-238f2c18e019-ca20/|smart-link]

column3: [Android] - Verification Code and Reset Wallet PIN
column4:
As a system admin, I want to send a verication code to customer if they want to reset their wallet PIN on consumer app.

+*AC:*+

* User taps Forgot Wallet PIN on Settings screen to open Enter OTP Code screen.
* On Enter OTP Code screen, user can see:
** Title: *Enter OTP Code.*
** Intrusction text: *_“An OTP code has been sent to your email. Please enter the code here to proceed to reset your wallet PIN."_*
** A field to enter the code.
** *“Send Again”* text below the field allows user to get a new code and countdown time (duration: *60s*). While the time is being counted down, the Send Again text must be disabled.
** *Continue* button: open Enter PIN screen, this button is disabled when the code field is empty or filled by blank.
* On Enter PIN screen:
** Fields: 
*** New PIN and Verify New PIN: only allow numeric characters, max length: 4 characters.
** Confirm button: This button is disabled if New PIN or Verify New PIN field is empty or filled by blank.
** OTP code will be verified at this step.
*** If the OTP code is correct: 
**** If Verify New PIN does not match to the New PIN, show the message pop-up *_“Verify new PIN does not match.“_*, and then the verify new PIN field should be deleted for user to enter the code again.
**** If matching, show the message pop-up
***** Title: *Wallet PIN Updated\!*
***** Message: *_“You can now use your new wallet PIN.“_*
***** OK button: navigate user back to Settings screen.
*** If the OTP code is incorrect, show the message pop-up *“**_OTP is incorrect. Attempted x/5.“_*_._ User will have maximum 5 attempts, if he/she fails at the last time (5th) show the message pop-up *_“You will be logged out due to entering OTP incorrectly too many times.“_*, tapping OK on the pop-up will kick user out of the app. If user attempts to login again, show the message pop-up *_“Your account has been locked. Please contact Administrator for support.“_*
*** If the OTP expires, show the message pop-up *_“OTP code has expired.“_*
* An OTP code will expire within 5 minutes right after user receives the email. (Ex: if user receives at 05:00PM, the OTP code will expired at 05:05PM).

+*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/552163a4-b695-4600-add4-c78819afd934/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/552163a4-b695-4600-add4-c78819afd934/|smart-link]

column3: Web App - Verification Code and Reset Wallet PIN
column4:
As a consumer, I want to be able to reset my wallet PIN in case I forgot my wallet PIN.

+*AC:*+

* User taps Forgot Wallet PIN on the drop-down menu to open Enter OTP Code pop-up.
* On Enter OTP Code pop-up, user can see:
** Title: *Enter OTP Code*
** Intrusction text: *_“An OTP code has been sent to your email. Please enter the code here to proceed to reset your wallet PIN."_*
** A field to enter the code.
** *“Send Again”* text below the field allows user to get a new code and countdown time (duration: *60s*). While the time is being counted down, the Send Again text must be disabled.
** *Continue* button: open Enter PIN screen, this button is disabled when the code field is empty or filled by blank.
* On Enter PIN page:
** Fields: 
*** New PIN and Verify New PIN: only allow numeric characters, max length: 4 characters.
** Confirm button: This button is disabled if New PIN or Verify New PIN field is empty or filled by blank.
** OTP code will be verified at this step.
*** If the OTP code is correct: 
**** If Verify New PIN does not match to the New PIN, show the message pop-up *_“Verify new PIN does not match.“_*, and then the verify new PIN field should be deleted for user to enter the code again.
**** If matching, show the message pop-up
***** Title: *Wallet PIN Updated\!*
***** Message: *_“You can now use your new wallet PIN.“_*
***** OK button: navigate user back to Settings page.
*** If the OTP code is incorrect, show the message pop-up *“**_OTP is incorrect. Attempted x/5.“_*_._ User will have maximum 5 attempts, if he/she fails at the last time (6th) show the message pop-up *_“You will be logged out due to entering OTP incorrectly too many times.“_*, tapping OK on the pop-up will kick user out of the web. If user attempts to login again, show the message pop-up *_“Your account has been locked. Please contact Administrator for support.“_*
*** If the OTP expires, show the message pop-up *_“OTP code has expired.“_*
* An OTP code will expire within 5 minutes right after user receives the email. (Ex: if user receives at 05:00PM, the OTP code will expired at 05:05PM).

+*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/c1151034-34c0-4629-9a3b-ee577a3d0fe9-9446/screen/688b909f-53b6-419c-ba5a-d73a98abefbd/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/c1151034-34c0-4629-9a3b-ee577a3d0fe9-9446/screen/688b909f-53b6-419c-ba5a-d73a98abefbd/|smart-link]

column3: Web App - Combine 2 transaction pages on the Top menu and Wallet
column4:
As a customer, I want to view my transaction history at only one place from the top menu. 

+*AC:*+ 

* The transaction list should include all transactions of all statuses: *Completed*, *Pending* and *Rejected*. The list contains all transaction categories defined in the excel file.
* Each transaction will have below columns (data) in the table.
** -_Transaction ID_-
** _Transaction Type_
** _Amount_
** _Fee_
*** Card Load:
**** Load money to Kash Kard via cash at Merchant Name
**** Load money to Kash Kard from Credit Card
**** Load money to Kash Kard from Bank Account (Plaid and Wire Transfer)
*** Transfer Money: only show fee for sender, not receiver
*** Withdraw (cash and bank account)
** _Remitter_
** _Beneficiary_
** _Status_
* I can click on the transaction ID from the table to open Transaction Details pop-up.  ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1862|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1862|smart-link] )
* Sort: by created date
* Filter:
** By category
** By status: *All* (default value) / *Rejected* / *Pending* / *Completed*.
** Date range: Keep as the current behavior.
* I can export CSV file based on the filter set. The CSV file must contain below information:
** Transaction ID
** Category
** Status
** Beneficiary
** Remitter
** Amount
** Fee
** Store
** Name
** Project
** Transaction Date
* Pagination (if available): display 10 transactions per page.
* See the format for each transaction in the UI but refer to the excel file for the value of each transaction type.
* When no transactions recorded (with a new account), show the message {color:#00b8d9}_“No transactions found“_{color}_._ This message should be used even when filter has no results.

+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/118ef041-4563-44b4-9750-4df0645a61e3-44dd/?mv=product&mv2=accc&product=Creative+Cloud+Desktop&product-version=5.3.1.470|https://xd.adobe.com/view/118ef041-4563-44b4-9750-4df0645a61e3-44dd/?mv=product&mv2=accc&product=Creative+Cloud+Desktop&product-version=5.3.1.470]

column3: Transaction Category of Direct Funding
column4:
* The system needs to record correct transactions for directing with different cards (cash card, credit card, points and gift card) with *Cause2Fund* category.
* One transaction is recorded for one card.
* Make sure that the report of Cause2Fund feature does not have any impact because it uses this category.
* *Transaction for Direct Funding*
** {color:#6554c0}*Transaction List screen*{color}
*** *Category:* Cause2Fund
*** *Project:* Project Name
*** *Amount*: displaying the total amount (card, gift card and points) which user has donated.
** {color:#6554c0}*Transaction Detail screen*{color}
*** Title: Transaction Type (Cause2Fund)
*** Amount: *-* *<money amount>* (Ex: - $5,000.00)
*** Transaction ID: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- Display an icon next to that allows user to add this transaction ID to clipboard.
*** Description:{color:#ff5630} {color}*_“Donate to a project“_*
*** Status: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- *Completed*
*** Transaction Date: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- Format (Oct 06 at 06:49 PM)
*** Remitter: 
**** If using Kash Kard to donate: show Kash Kard/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of KK)
**** If using Credit Card to donate: show Credit Card/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of CC)
**** If using gift cards and points only: Remitter field will not be displayed.
*** Beneficiary: Merchant Name/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of KK)
*** Donate Method: displaying all the methods which has been used to donated.
*** Gift Card Name: *Gift Card Name* 
*** Gift Card Amount: diplaying the amount of gift card which has been used.
*** Point Amount: diplaying the amount of points which has been used.
*** Point Exchange Rate
*** Project: *Project Name*
* These updates are applied for all Transactions of all applications.
** Consumer app
** Visipay
** ARM
** Tenant/New Admin

+_Note:_+

Some fields above can be gone if it has no data or it’s not needed, it includes *Remitter*, *Gift Card*, *Gift Card Amount*, *Point Amount*, *Point Exchange Rate*.

column3: Consumer App - Change the rule of rounding number for money in the system
column4:
+*AC:*+

* The new rule of rounding a number:
** If the third decimal number (after comma) is less than 5: keep the second decimal number.
*** Example: 3.474 ~ 3.47; 3.621 ~ 3.62
** If the third decimal number (after comma) is equal to or larger than 5: increase the second decimal number a unit.
*** Example: 3.475 ~ 3.48; 3.678 ~ 3.68
* We will update the way of rounding number for buying product flow:
** Firstly, the *Product Price (discounted)* will be rounded.
** The *Tax* amount will be rounded based on the product price (rounded above)
** *Coupon/Gift Card/Cause2Fund/Point/* amount will be rounded based on the product price (including Tax and rounded above).
** *Total amount (You Pay)* will be the sum of all amounts rounded (Product Price, Tax , Coupon/Gift Card/Point/Cause2Fund).

Ex: A product costs $25.99, after discount the price is $24.9504 ~ *$24.95*

The tax is 12%, so the tax amount will be 24.95*0.12=2.994 ~ *$2.99*

Coupon is 8%, so the coupon amount will be (24.95+2.99)*0.08=2.2352 ~ *$2.24*

Cause2Fund is 6%, so the Cause2Fund amount will be (24.95+2.99)*0.06=1.6764 ~ *$1.68*

The Total amount will be 24.95+2.99-2.24-1.68 = *$24.02*


Here is the full formula for calculating product prices:

[^Formula for calculating product prices (75645180-f950-4244-8f59-358c3009764e).xlsx]
column23: Formula for calculating product prices.xlsx;Formula for calculating product prices (75645180-f950-4244-8f59-358c3009764e).xlsx

column3: Consumer App - Transactions for point redemption activities
column4:
As a consumer, I want to view the transaction history for all activities that I redeem my points in wallet.

* I can view all transactions related points below:
** Buy product with redeeming point. (at Store Detail)
** Buy gift card with redeem point. (at Store Detail)
** Buy product by point. (at Point tab - Reward Options)
** Buy gift card by point. (at Point tab - Reward Options)
** Exchange point to money for Prepaid Mastercard (at Point tab)
* Format for each point transaction on the list:
** Type: *_Point Redemption_*
** Store: *_Merchant Name_* (where I buy product / gift card)
** Amount:  display amount in USD with the redeemed points below USD amount
** Exchange Rate (Ex: 100 points = $1)

column3: Wallet - Cards tab
column4:
I can see all my cards and gift cards in my wallet 

Reuse all messages of the current flow on App

*Cards*

* I can see all my cards following order : Kanoo Cash Card → Gifted Cash Card → Credit Card → SD Card
* Click “Add New Card” → pop-up to select
** Add The Sand Dollar Card : I wont see this option if  I already have a SD card
** Add Credit Card
* Add SD Card → click move to add page ( reference UI) and reuse all message of the current flow on App
* Add Credit Card → click move to add page ( reference UI) and reuse all message of the current flow on App
* Each card displays information like the current ones on App

{color:#ff5630}Kanoo Cash Card{color}: click move to card details, I would see

* UI: reference UI of XD and Kard
* QR code expiration time like the current on App
* *Click “Load”* → pop-up list all Credit Card and SD Card and Cash in-store
** If I choose a card
*** Choose a Card → move to Enter Amount screen
*** Click “Load” → reuse all messages of the current flow on App
*** Successful pop-up → click OK → back to card list
** If I choose cash in-store → pop-up show QR code
** Validation:
*** If enter amount = 0 → red text “Load amount must be greater than 0.”
*** If load by credit card fail → pop-up with content “We could not verify your payment details, try a different card or contact customer service.”
*** If the credit card is expired → pop-up with content “The credit card has expired.”
*** If I reach my KYC limitation → pop-up with content “You cannot load more than $\[number] in a month.”
*** If load amount < load fee → pop-up with content “The load amount must be greater than \{number} for paying the transaction fee.”
*** If the loading amount is blank, red text “Please enter the money”.
*** If the loading amount > card’s balance → pop-up with content “Your card doesn't have enough money to complete the process. Please choose another card.”
*** If loading unsuccessfully for any reason, a pop-up with content “The process cannot be completed. Please try again later.”

!image-20201013-074607.png|width=50%!

* *Click “Refund”* → pop-up ( reference UI) → reuse all messages of the current flow on App
** Close the pop-up → refrefresh page → update my balance
* *Click “Send”* → pop-up “Send Money To” → reuse all messages of the current flow on App
** List all connected users sorted by alphabet name
** Click on a user → move to pop-up Enter money
** Close the pop-up → refresh page → update my balance
** Click back to view the list of connected users
** Validation:
*** If sending amount is blank, red text “Please fill out all required fields\!”.
*** If sending amount =0, red text “Money must be greater than 0.”.
*** If the sending amount > card’s balance → pop-up with content “Your card doesn't have enough money to complete the process. Please choose another card.”
* *Click “Widthdraw”* → enter withdraw amount → pop -up shows QR code
** If enter amount = 0 → red text “Load amount must be greater than 0.”
** If the amount is blank, red text “Please enter the money”.
** If withdraw amount > card balance, pop-up with content “Your cash card balance is not enough to process withdraw.”

{color:#ff5630}Credit Card{color}: click move to card details, I would see

* QR code

{color:#ff5630}Gift Cash card:{color}  click move to card details, I would see

* Definition: Kanoo would like to expose APIs endpoints that allow the External system can invoke to create Coupons, Gift Cards, Cash Card. Especially, the cash card will come with certain limitations such as restricting withdrawal, limiting the spending to only specific merchants. The user can, therefore, have more than one cash card in their wallet. Only Kanoo master admin can perform this function.
* QR code
* List of Acceptable Merchants
* This new cash card can only be used to ( only o Kanoo web):
** Buy products
** Pay with card => show QR code to POS

{color:#ff5630}The SD Card{color}

* Definition: Sand Dollar is a digital version of the Bahamian dollar. As a Kanoo’s user, I can create a Sand Dollar card in my wallet, this SD card is synched with the physical SD card. It is managed by Kanoo platform.
* QR code

* *Click “Load”* → pop-up list all Credit Card and Cash Card
** Choose a Card → move to Enter Amount screen
** Click “Load” → reuse all messages of the current flow on App
** Validation like Cash card
* *Click “Send”* → pop-up “Send Money To” → reuse all messages of the current flow on App
** List all connected users who already have a SD, sorted by alphabet name
** Click on a user → move to pop-up Enter money
** *Nov 11, 2020*: note for friend:
*** Maximum length: 200 characters including emoji, I can type more than 200, but when I move to the next step → red text appear below the note area “The note’s content has exceeded 200 characters.”
*** If message content only contains white space → consider as no message
*** If message content starts with white space → remove white spaces
** Close the pop-up → refresh page → update my balance
** Click back to view the list of connected users
** Validation like Cash card
* *Withdraw*: → enter withdraw amount → pop -up shows QR code
** Validation like Cash card

column3: BE - Login - Forgot password - Forgot email
column4:
API for ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1526|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1526|smart-link] 

APIs:

* Update the logic for kicking out users in the login API.
** Users will be kicked out when they log in on the same platform

| |(then) KZ|(then) Mobile|(then) Web app|
|KZ|*Kick out*|N|N|
|Mobile|N|*Kick out*|N|
|Web app|N|N|*Kick out*|

* API update password for the users when they recover password
column30:
[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843]  I’ve checked that If the user is already login with a mobile app, then they log in on the KZ site, they *kick* out the mobile app. Do we keep this logic?;We need to change that [~accountid:5b39a251d38a522e77ff7642] . User should not be kicked out in this case
Cc: [~accountid:5ea291d7a77bf50c1ec77c19];[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] 

Are you sure that we will implement to let KZ web and web app will NOT kick out each other when logging in?

AC: 

{quote}5. If the user is already login with web app, then they log in on the KZ site, they will be NOT kicked out the web app they logged in before.

6. If the user is already login with KZ site, then they log in on the Web app, they will be NOT kicked out the KZ site they logged in before.{quote}

Please confirm.

I remember that you said it should BE kicked out when we planning.;| |(then) KZ|(then) Mobile|(then) Web app|
|KZ|*Kick out*|N|N|
|Mobile|N|*Kick out*|N|
|Web app|N|N|*Kick out*|;[~accountid:5b39a251d38a522e77ff7642] I confirm your table. We should not kick out KZ when user login to the Web, it’s bad UX.

I update the AC with your table;Verified and passed on Demo.

column3: Send money - P2P
column4:
I can send money to my friends by:

*Case 1*: Card details → Send → pop-up list all connected users based on which card I chose → enter amount → enter PIN

*Case 2*: Search user → User details →  Send → pop-up list cards to select (Kanoo Cash card or SD card) → enter amount → enter PIN

*Case 3*: Connections → select a user → User details →  Send → pop-up list cards to select (Kanoo Cash card or SD card) → enter amount → enter PIN

* If sending amount is blank, red text “Please fill out all required fields\!”.
* If sending amount =0, red text “Money must be greater than 0.”.
* The sending amount will be based on the sender’s daily/ monthly limitation. Use the current notification, messages of the flow P2P
* *Nov 2, 2020:* -If the internet is turn off, a pop-up with content “Please check your internet connection and try again.”→ ok → turn off the pop-up-
* If the receiver doesn't have an SD card, a pop-up with content “The beneficiary doesn’t have a Sand Dollar Card. Please choose another card to try again.” → ok → back to Select a Card screen.

Reuse all messages of the current flow on App

Record transactions on App and Visipay as the current process on App

column3: [BE] - Connections
column4:
I can view list of my friends and merchants in Connections form Home page

* Reference UI
* List all my connections groups with order: All → the other groups sorted by alphabet group name

*Create a new group*: Click on “Add new group”

* Pop-up require group name
* Add successfully → no notification → the list is refreshed with the new group

*Group details*: click on a group

* If the group is empty
!image-20201015-074856.png|width=450,height=203!

* If the group is not empty: show list of member -sorted by alphabet member name-
* Avatar 
** Group empty → system by default
** Group contains 1 to 3 members → shows maximum 3 small avatar
** Group contains >3 members → shows maximum 2 small avatar and number of the members of the group
* Group “All”: contains all connected users and merchants which are not in a specific group or group All is selected when add a member.
* Click “Edit Group”
** I can update the group’s name
** I can add members → pop-up list all merchants and users in the system, sorted by alphabet name. I can add merchants and users in the same group
** I can remove members by click on the remove icon → pop-up confirm → remove successfully, that members will be disappeared and I still in the group’s details.
** Merchants and users who have not been added to the current group can be able to be selected.
** A merchant or an user can be added to multiple groups
** No limit for adding members in a group
* Click “Remove This Group” → pop-up confirm 
** Remove successfully → the list is refreshed → the group disappear
* Click on a member
** If that member is a merchant → move to store details page
** If that member is a user → pop-up appear show user active information → I can choose to chat or send money

column3: Update account information
column4:
I can update some of my information by click on my avt on the top right corner 

*Account* → image below

!image-20201014-044834.png|width=100%!

* Allow to update date of birth and gender
* Click Save:
** If any required field is blank → red text “This field is required.”
** If email’s format is invalid → red text -“Invalid email address format.”- “Please input a valid email address.”
** If date of birth is in future → red text “Your date of birth is set to a future date, please correct it.”
* Reuse all messages on App
* *Nov 23, 2020:* 
** On Kanoo App: Update Account and update Password are 2 features
** In UI/UX: Update Account and update Password are 1 feature
* => There are 2 button Save for each feature. “Save Information” for Account Information and “Save Password” for Password.
column30: Verified and passed on Demo.

column3: Category Details, Product Details
column4:
Customer choose a category to see list of products

Reuse UI and flow of KZ merchant site with below differences:

*List of products*

* Click “<-” back to the home page
* List all products, default 7 products on a row. No paging, scrolling to see more. the list is sorted by alphabet product name and the latest creation date.
* Load one time for all products when accessing the page. Add a filter with below options. Apply one filter at a time
** Date: Oldest to Newest
** Date: Newest to Oldest
** Price: Low to High ( get the original price)
** Price: High to Low
* Each product shows information:
** Image
** Name
** Original price - Discounted price
** Button Add to Cart
* Click on a product 
** If the product contains options → move to the product details page
** If the product does not contain any options → a notification “The item has been added to the cart successfully.” then add it to the cart.

*Product Details*

Customer can see:

* Image: click to open full size on a new page
* Name
* Description: default show 4 rows, allow scrolling
* Options ( size, type, color, note,…)
* Original price - Discounted price
* Button Add to Cart → click to validate
** If the current cart does not contain this item, it will add more. Otherwise, it will increase the quantity.
** Appear a notification “The item has been added to the cart successfully.”
*** If adding to cart unsuccessfully, pop up with content “A system error occurred while trying to add items to your cart. Please try again or contact customer service.”

*Note*:

* The cart on web and app will be synched:
** If on App’s cart have 4 items, then after login to the web, the web’s cart will have 4 items.
** The latest cart will be used regardless of environments.
** Customers can choose items on App and process payment on Web and vice versa.
column30:
Verified and passed on Demo. 

[~accountid:5ea291d7a77bf50c1ec77c19] please update the ticket’s description as we discussed. 

#1: message about adding product to cart will be the same as Kz site. 

#2: the cart on web and app will not be synched.

column3: [BE] - Store details
column4:
I can buy products from a specific store. 

Reuse UI and flow of KZ merchant site with below differences:

* Store detail but show active konnect zone only.
* Don’t show anything related to the tenant but use merchant’s details.
* Campaign section will show information (include Campaign description). Kanoo’s User can add these campaigns to their Wallet.
* Show all active promotions. Hide Like, Comment, Share features.

* Customers will see
** Business information
*** Business name
*** Business address: the registered address
*** Ratings: remove “View Ratings”
*** *Nov 26, 2020*: -Distance from the Business location to customer location. Format <decimal number> miles away.-
*** Click View More to see list of Branches. Default show 5 branches. Scale to fit if the branches <=5. Allow scrolling
*** *Nov 26, 2020*: -Directions: click to pop-up a map, customers can zoom in and out, the store is marked.-
*** % off
*** Hours open
*** Business category and sub-category
*** Phone: format +1242012345
** Campaign:
*** List all active campaigns of the KZ. Default show 6 campaigns sorted by the latest creation date. Allow swiping to see more.
*** Image
*** Name
*** Value
*** Expiration date: format “Offer Until: mm/dd/yyyy”
*** Button “Add to Wallet” → click then change to “Already in Wallet”.
** Categories: list all active categories in KZ, sorted by alphabet, including Gift card category.
** Promotions: show all active promotions ( image, video), sorted by the latest creation date. No actions like, comment, shares.
** Footer links: home, Disclaimers, T&C, Privacy Policy, Contact Us → click to open a new page with corresponding links.
** Copyright 2020 - <domain name> - All Rights Reserved

column3: Search
column4:
I would like to search any users or store

*Users*

{color:#ff5630}Search{color}

* List all active users in the system, allow scrolling and sorted by alphabet name → enter to search
* Reference UI of Kard
* Each user shows avt and full name
* Search with blank or white spaces will show all results
* For unmatched result

!image-20201014-030621.png|width=83.33333333333334%!

{color:#ff5630}Details{color}

* Click on a user’s area ->click back to return to the search list
** If the user has not been set connection with me → reference UI
*** Click Connect → pop-up show list of my connection group → I can skip this step → this user will be added to group All → change UI 
*** If I select a group for the user → the user will be added to the selected group and group All
*** I can see if the user is online or not and the status is “Untraded”
** If the user has been set connection with me → reference UI
*** I can see if the user is online or not and the status is “Traded”
*** I can see what is the last time the user is active and the registered location
**** Format “Last update” <number> “seconds ago” or “minutes ago” or “months ago” or “years ago”
*** Click “Chat”
**** Move to chat page and start a new conversation if I have not chatted
**** Move to chat page and continue the conversation if I have chatted
*** Click “Send” → continue the flow send money to friend
*** Click “Disconnect” → user will be removed from all groups and the status is “Untraded” → I can set connect again

*Business*

{color:#ff5630}Search{color}

* List all active stores in the system, allow scrolling and sorted by the nearest distance from the user’s position → enter a business name to search
* Reference UI
* Search with blank or white spaces will show all results
* When I click “Change location” → pop-up shows map for updating → the store list will be refreshed after updating successfully.
* Reuse the above sentence for unmatched results.
* Click on a store → move to the store’s details

column3: User checkout
column4:
Following UI and flow of KZ merchant site

* “Confirm Purchase” screen
** On the left area of the page, user will see his/ her cash card
*** Click “Select a card for payment” → pop-up shows list of payment card
*** !image-20201014-042947.png|width=81.39562529719447%!

** On the right area of the page, user will see below info ( All delivery options):
*** Total: total amount of the order. Format $<decimal number>
*** Tax (VAT). Format $<decimal number>
*** Gift card: click to open a pop up Select Gift Card
**** List all Gift card of the store bought by the user. Sorted by the latest creation date. Scrolling to see more
**** No select gift card by default
**** Each gift card show image, name, value
**** Click OK to select
*** Coupon: click to open a pop-up Select Coupon
**** List all Coupons of the store added by the user. Sorted by the latest creation date. Scrolling to see more
**** No select Coupon  by default
**** Each Coupon  show image, name, value
**** Click OK to select
*** You Pay: the final amount of the order = Your total + Tax - gift card value - coupon value
*** Orders with option Pay now will be considered as Pick up orders
**** User can select a gift card and coupon
** Click button “Pay”:
*** If the cash card is not enough money, a pop-up with content “Your balance is not enough. To complete the process, increase your balance then try again.” → click ok to turn off the pop-up, stay at the current page
*** For any reason that the process can not be completed, a pop-up with content “A system error occurred while trying to place your order. Please try again or contact customer service.” → click ok to turn off the pop-up, stay at the current page
** Orders with option Pay now will be considered as Pick up orders
** If the payment is successful → move user to successful screen → Click button “Great” → return to the home page.

!image-20201013-111402.png|width=33.333333333333336%!



* If the payment is unsuccessful, pop-up with content “A system error occurred while trying to place your order. Please try again or contact customer service.” → close the pop-up and stay at the current page
* Placing an order successfully on web will automatically create that order on App and POS with synched status
* Transactions will be recorded on App, Web, ARM and Visipay like the current process
column30: Verified and passed on Demo. Tickets 3056, 3057, 3108 were moved to the Kanoo board. It will be tested when completed.

column3: [BE] - Shopping cart
column4:
Following the UI of Shopping Cart on KZ merchant site 

*  Delivery Method → click to open a pop-up Delivery Method → 3 options: Delivery, Pickup, Pay now
** {color:#ff5630}If selects Delivery or Pickup{color} → pop up appears with the below information
*** Full name field - required field:
**** For users: Full Name. Get User info by default. Allow editing
*** Email field- required field:
**** For users: Email. Get User info. Allow editing
*** Phone field- required field:
**** For users: Enter Your Phone Number. Get User info by default. Allow editing Ex: +1242567821. Follow ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2126|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2126|smart-link]
*** Enter Your Address - required field: no limit length ( only if choose delivery method)
*** Delivery Date/ Pickup Date - required field: add Date time picker to choose. Format “Day mm/dd/yyyy”. The current date is selected by default. Ex: Wednesday 09/30/2020
*** Delivery Time/ Pickup Time - required field:: a dropdown list shows the time that the customer will receive his/ her order. Format hh:mm. The next period is chosen by default.
*** Pickup Address - required field: list all branches of the store and sorted by alphabet. Can only select one. The first one in the list will be chosen by default
**** Address: must-have
**** Phone: optional. Format +1242156789
*** Button Confirm → click to turn off the pop-up → entered data will be saved for all cases ( refresh the page, change the delivery method,..) until the confirm button is clicked again
**** If a required field is left blank, a red text below “This field is required.”
**** If the email is invalid, a red text below the field “Invalid email address format.”
** {color:#ff5630}If selects Pay now{color}
*** For logged in user → save as delivery option
** Click Delivery Method again
*** Select the previous option → open the pop up to edit → click button confirm to save
*** Select another option → the customer must enter all information
* When User click on “Proceed to Checkout” button. It is disabled by default if the customer has not selected a delivery method or the cart is empty:
** If quantity input is greater than the available amount → display the max in stock
** If I click icon “+” → it will stop at the maximum in stock
** If I input 0 → display 1
** I cannot click icon “-” if the quantity is 1
** If the product(s) is out of stock, a notification with content “This item is out of stock.”
** The “Confirm Purchase” page will appear if user has logged in 
** If the cart is empty → show content “There are no items in your cart”

column3: Orders
column4:
I can view all my orders on Orders

List of orders 

* List all Pickup orders on Tab Pickup, sorted by the latest Created date
* List all Delivery orders on Tab Delivery, sorted by the latest Created date
* *Nov 19, 2020*: List all Pickup, Delivery orders with all status - sorted by the lasted Created Date
* Status will be synched with app when I refresh the page
* *Nov 13,2020*: Statuses of an order: -Scan to Pickup-,Pickup, Delivery, Completed, Pending Refund, Refund Rejected, Refund Approved 
* Click on Scan to Pickup/ Scan to Confirm Delivery → pop-up QR code → after scan QR code, nothing will be changed unless I refresh the page

!image-20201013-105021.png|width=41.66666666666667%!

Order details

* Click “View Details” of an order → move to the order details page 
* Click Pickup/ Delivery → open pop-up contains QR code
* Click back to back to the list of orders

*Nov 20, 2020*: Refund flow

The refunded amount will be refunded for the default Cash card

* Status Flow: 
** Scan to Pickup/Scan to Delivery -> Completed
** Scan to Pickup/Scan to Delivery/ Completed/ Refund Rejected -> Pending Refund
** Pending Refund -> Refund Approved/ Refund Rejected

*Create a refund request*

# Conditions to use:
## Orders purchased by Kanoo App and Card purchase
## Orders whose statuses are: Completed, Refund Rejected, Pending Refund, Scan to Pickup, Scan to Delivery
# The order’s details:
## On the right top corner: the order’s current status
## Show the rejected/ approve reason. 
## A button “ Request Refund”: 
### Enable for all statuses except “Refund Approved ” → click to move to a new screen ( Request Details) where the customers can note the reason, images.
### Hide for “Refund Approved ”.
# The Request Refund screen
## Reason: limit 500 characters (requires). Allow to type more than 500 characters
## Click the button “ Upload images” to upload 3 images (one image each time) maximum whose size is 5MB each image ( optional)
### If the customer uploads the fourth image, pop up with content “You can upload 3 images maximum.”.
### If the uploaded image’s size > 5MB, pop up with content “The image is too big. Please try another.”
### Can remove images.
### Can click to see the image with full size
### *Nov 26, 2020:* If upload unsupported file → show pop-up “This file type is not supported. Please choose a different file.”
## Click the button “Refund”:
### If the Reason field is blank, pop up notify the customer with content “Please enter your reason.”.
### *Nov 23, 2020*: 
#### Note for blank case: reason only contains white space → pop up notify the customer with content “Please enter your reason.”.
#### Request content over 500 characters → red text below request area “The content has exceeded 500 characters.”
### If send successfully, pop up with content “Your request was sent successfully.” → Click Close to turn off the pop up → return to the Your orders screen → update the list. The order will have the status “Pending Refund”.
### If send unsuccessfully, pop up with content “Your request was sent unsuccessfully. Please try again.” → Click Close to turn off the pop up → stays at the current screen with entered values.
## Click the icon “ ← “ to return to the Your orders details screen and clear all entered values.

column3: [BE] - Transactions
column4:
I can view all my transactions related to my cards 

Differences between Kanoo and Kard are highlighted in {color:#36b37e}Green{color}

* I can view transactions in a date range
** If I filter date range which “From date” > “To date” → red text below “From Date must not be greater than To Date.”
** If I filter date range > 3 months, red text below “Invalid date range, the maximum date range is 3 months.”
* List 20 latest transactions then paging
* {color:#36b37e}I can select a card in card dropdown list. {color}
** {color:#36b37e}Default value “All cards”{color}
** {color:#36b37e}Each card information <Card name>/<last 4 digits>{color}
** {color:#36b37e}Card Name: Kanoo Cash Card, Gifted Cash Card, Credit Card, The Sand Dollar Card{color}
* Click button Filter to show the matched results

column3: Messages
column4:
I can view all my conversations or start to chat with a user or merchant in Messages

*Conversations list:* I would like to see my conversations list on the left area

* The user can:
** Search conversations by user’s name or Merchant’s name who recently have a conversation. The default “Search by user”. Search blank returns all conversations.
** See button “Create new conversation” at the first of the list → click to open pop-up “Select friends“ screen
** List of conversation:
*** Avatar: default by system avatar
*** Name of conversation:
**** <User’s full name> if the conversation is a peer to peer or <owner’s full name, member names> and display “….” if reach time’s value.
**** Date time;
***** Display the latest sending or the latest receiving or group’s created date
***** Format: “hh:mm AM/ PM” for today or “mm/dd/yyyy“, Yesterday,…
****** Ex: If I chat today (Monday - Oct 5, 2020), tomorrow I will see “Yesterday”, the next day will be “Monday” and after 7 days I will see “10/05/2020”
**** Read icon: The read (double-check) icon ( at Message screen) will appear immediately after anyone in the group has read the message

*Create a new Group chat - Message screen:* I can see and create a new group by selecting users in Message

* The user can:
** Search conversations by user’s name or Merchant’s name who recently have a conversation. The default “Search by user”. Search blank returns all conversations.
** See button “Create new conversation” at the first of the list → click to open a pop-up “Select friends“ screen
*** Search all users by user’s name (except Merchants). Default “Search by user”. Search blank returns all user. The list is sorted by user’s name and alphabet.
*** Button “Chat“ on the top right corner is disable by default. Only enable when selecting users → Click the button → start a new conversation on the right area
**** Select an user → the button is enable
**** Select more than one user → the button is enable with label “Create Group (<number of selected users>)“
**** Unselecting all users, the button is disable
*** The system allows creating many groups with the same members and the same name
*** The new conversation will appear immediately on top of the conversations list of all members.

*Create a new Group chat - Chat screen:* I can see and create a new group by selecting users in Chat screen

* The user can:
** Search all users by user’s name (except Merchants) and not in the group yet. Default “Search by user”. Search blank returns all user. The list is sorted by user’s name and alphabet.
** Button “Create Group“ on the top right corner is disable by default. Only enable when selecting users → Click the button → start a new conversation on the right area
*** Select an user → the button is enable
*** Select more than one user → the button is enable with label “Create Group (<number of selected users>)“
** The new conversation will appear immediately on top of the conversations list of all members.

 *Note for creating a new group includes merchant*:

* If I want to chat with a merchant, I have to set connect with that merchant.
* In a group chat, I can add many users but only one merchant
* To create a group chat with a merchant → I have to chat with that merchant first → add other users → system create 2 conversations
** Me and merchant
** Me, merchant and others

*Send and receive messages:* in my chat screen, I would like to send and receive text, emoji, image, video, audio

{color:#ff5630}Sending{color}

* Group chat default name <owner’s name, members names…>
* Sending- display formatting:
** Date: shows “Today” or “Mon dd, yyyy””
** Time: shows “hh:mm AM/PM“ Ex: 11:52 AM, 2:06 PM. The next “time information” will not appear if the period from the first sending message to the last sending message is less than or equal to 5 minutes.
** Items: Recent emoji, emoji, stickers, image, video, audio
* If the network is turned off, the message can not be sent and show notification “Network is not enabled.”
* If sending fail for other reasons, the message can not be sent and no notification.
* The conversation will be moved to the top list
* *Nov 2, 2020:*
** A number of characters in each sending period are unlimited.
** Video from gallery: limitation is 50MB. The file is over limitation, I will receive message “Video file exceeds 50MB limit. Please choose another video.”
** Video from camera: limitation is 50MB and <= 20s. Cannot record more than 20s. The file is over limitation, I will receive message “Video file exceeds 50MB limit. Please choose another video.”
** Image: limitation 50MB
*** Type: can only receive PNG, JPG, JPEG, *GIF (Jan 27, 2021)*
*** The file is over limitation, I will receive message “Image file exceeds 50MB limit. Please choose another image.”
*** Upload an unsupported file, I will receive message -“The file format is not supported. Please select a media file.”-”This file type is not supported. Please choose a different file.”
** Audio: limitation 50MB. Can only send if the time recoding >= 2s. The file is over limitation (>50MB), I will receive message “Audio file exceeds 50MB limit. Please choose another audio.”

{color:#ff5630}Receiving{color}

* Receiving- display formating:
** Date: shows “Today” or “Yesterday” or “Mon dd, yyyy””
** Time: shows “<sender’s name>, hh:mm AM/PM“
** Items: Recent emoji, emoji, stickers, image, video, audio
** When the sender is typing, show “<sender’s name> is typing…>
** *Nov 2, 2020:*
*** Video from gallery: limitation is 50MB.
*** Video from camera: limitation is 50MB and <= 20s. Cannot record more than 20s
*** Image: limitation 50MB
**** Type: can only receive PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF
*** Audio: limitation 50MB.
* Notification:
** Push message: <sender’s name> send you <item type>. Use the current format of Chat
** The latest message will appear at Message screen with the number of new message and time receiving ( format “hh:mm AM/ PM” for today or “mm/dd/yyyy“)
** The latest message will be highlighted and appear at Message. The message will not be highlighted after being read.
** The conversation will be moved to the top list

*Group Details:* I would like to edit group chat information, add, remove members and leave group

{color:#ff5630}Group details:{color}

* Steps: at Chat screen → click icon Info → Chat details → displays below info

||*Field Name*||*Display*||*Action*||*Note*||
|Group Name|Default combine all members when create group, name separate by comma, display “…” for character exceeding limit.|click on icon|every member can edit group name|
|Group Avatar|Default system group avatar
-Oct 9, 2020: Owner avatar and the first member in the list sorted by alphabet name-|click on avatar|every member can change group avatar. Limit 5MB|
|Group owner name|who created the group
Format “Owned by <owner’s name>”| | |
|Button Add member|as in UI design| |every member in group can add member|
|Button Leave group|as in UI design| |every member in group can leave group|
|List of group members|<number of members> IN THIS GROUP
Sorted by added time: oldest to newest
List all member name ( include the owner)| |Only Group owner will see an option on the right to remove member|

* If group name is updated as blank, pop-up Error with content “Group name can not empty” → click OK to enter name
* If group name is blank then click icon “X”, return the old group name.
* Allow choosing an image from the local gallery or take a picture.
* If the uploaded image’s size > 5MB, pop up with content -“The image is too big. Please try another.”- “Image file exceeds 5MB limit. Please choose another image.” (*Jan 27, 2021)*

{color:#ff5630}Peer to peer details:{color} If I am chatting with only one person ( user or merchant), I can see conversion details with below information

* User’s avatar
* Icon Add member: flow as {color:#ff5630}Add Member{color}

{color:#ff5630}Add Member: {color}click on icon Add member → move to Add member screen

* The user can:
** Search users by user’s name (except Merchants) who have not had a connection with the user. Default “Search by user”. Search blank returns all users.
** See list of user who have not chatted with the user yet. The list is sorted by user’s name and alphabet. List all users ( except Merchants) by default.
** Button “Add“ on the top right corner is disable by default. Only enable when selecting users → Click the button → back to Chat Detail with updated member list
*** Select an user → the button is enable
*** Select more than one user → the button is enable with label “Add (<number of selected users>)“
*** Click “ <-” to return Chat screen
* Group chat will appear in Message of the added user with added time ( format “hh:mm AM/ PM” for today or “m/dd/yyyy“)
* The new member will not see previous messages.

{color:#ff5630}Remove Member ( for only owner of the group): {color}click on icon on the specific member → pop-up with content “Remove <member’s name> from this group“

* Click Cancel → close pop-up
* Click Remove:
** That member is disappeared immediately from Chat details
** Chat group will not appear in Message of that member
** If the person is in Chat screen at the same time he/ she is being removed, he/she will get a pop-up with content “You have been removed from this group.” → click OK → back to Message screen → the conversation is disappeared → update list conversations
** If the audience is in Message screen at the same time he/ she is being removed, he/ she can still access the conversation, but when sending a message, will get a notification “User not member of channel.” → the list of conversation will be updated after accessing Message screen again from the Home screen.
** Keep the same group’s name and avatar

{color:#ff5630}Leave group: {color}click on icon Leave Group → pop-up with content “Are you sure you want to leave this group?”

* Click Cancel → close pop-up
* Click Leave Group:
** If admin leave group, the new Group owner will be updated -.- The earliest added time. Ex: A was the owner, B was added on 3:47PM, C was added on 3:48PM. When A left → B is the owner
** Chat group will not appear in Message of that member
** If all members leave group, the group will be deleted. The group still be on the conversations list of the final member.
** Keep the same group’s name and avatar

*Note*:

* All sent messages, stickers/emoji (select from the defined list), (Image, Audio, Video) have to be encrypted.
* All received messages, stickers/emoji, (Image, Audio, Video) have to be decrypted then displayed.
* Chat Service Architecture: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/36175887/Chat+Service+Architecture|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/36175887/Chat+Service+Architecture|smart-link]
* Untraded audiences can still send and receive messages as long as they have not left or removed.
