column3: API - Send email to customer after creating order successfully mobile/web app
column4:
As a customer, after creating a new order on mobile/web app, I want the system to send me an email about confirming my order created successfully.

+*AC:*+

* I can create a new order on mobile / web app.
* After making payment for my order, I can check my mailbox and receive a new email.
* Email Structure:
** Subject: Order Confirmation \[Order ID]
** Content:

_“Dear \[Customer Name],_

_We are delighted to inform that your order \[Order ID] at \[Business Name] has been received._ 

_You can check your order detail as information below:”_ 

* I want to see my order detail displayed as a table below. 
* Below the order detail table, I want to see the message _“Click_ +_here_+ _to check your order detail at HYT/Kard/GreenCom/GreenLife.“_ attach the hyperlink to “here“ word. On clicking, I can be directed to Orders page of the web app of corresponding tenant. I can be required to login if I haven’t login before.

_“Sincerely,_

_HYT/Kard/GreenCom/GreenLife.”_

* Display the merchant’s logo image and contact information (business name, email address, phone number) at the bottom so that I can contact if I have any problems with the current order.

*_Note: The email template is used correponding to the template of tenant web app that I am using._*

column3: API - Buy Product Flow - Redeem Points -  Update UI of Order Detail screen.
column4:
As a customer, after buying product with points, I want to see my order detail with one more row displaying Point which I has redeemed.

*+AC:+*
I open Order Detail after buying product.
On Order Detail screen, I can see one more row named *Point Redemption* with the amount.
The *Point Redemption* row is under Gift Card row.

+Validation rules:+
* The *Point Redemption* row always shown no matter if I redeem points while buying product or not.
* The amount of Point Redemption must be displayed as same as when I buy product.

column3: ARM Merchant - Store - Add Keywords
column4:
As a merchant admin I want to be able to add keywords for my store so that my store can be found on marketplace if the search text is matched with my keywords.

* I can access Account from the left menu.
* I can enter (add, delete) the keyword list to save keywords for my store to be found by customers on the consumer apps.
* Add the helptext below the field: _“You can enter multiple keywords and press Enter after each keyword.“_

column3: BE - ARM - Monthly Subscription - Change Email Content of Expiration Remind
column4:
As a merchant admin, I want to receive an email from system every time my ARM account is about to expire.

+*AC:*+

* My account is about to expire in \[n] day. (n can be configurable).
* The system will auto send an email to me.
* The template of email should follow the current style of email sent from ARM.

!image-20200911-044805.png|width=618,height=350!



* Change currency from B$ to $.
* Email content is similar to the current one:

!image-20200911-033933.png|width=372,height=229!

Subject: _\[Kard ARM] Your Merchant Account is about to expire_

* _Dear \[Merchant Name],_
* _We would like to inform that your subscription package \[package name] is about to expire on \[date] (x day(s) left). The system will auto-charge a monthly subscription fee from your kash kard then so that you can continue using Kard ARM services. Please maintain your kash kard balance ready for the fee, otherwise, your merchant account will get deactivated._
** _Current kash kard balance: $x.xx_ 
** _Monthly subscription fee: $yy.yy_ (This fee about depends on the subscription package which the merchant registered.).
* _Arm Corporate Office_
_4480H South Cobb_
_Drive #321Smyrna, GA 30080_
* _All Arm emails will be sent from our_ [_support@kardsys.com_|mailto:support@kardsys.com] _domains to your registered email address. We will never contact you from any other addresses._
column30: Verified and passed on Demo environment.

column3: Android - Search - Separate Businesses and People
column4:
As a customer I want to be able to have 2 separate tabs for searching businesses and people like Kanoo app.

* Business tab
** Search active merchants associated with the current tenant and these merchants don’t need to have a konnect zone like the business rule of marketplace by Business Name, Business Category.
** Search a business category from the list of category to select ONE to filter the merchants.
** I can set my current location to search businesses near to me (same as the current function).
** Selecting a business to open the store detail page as the current function.
* People tab
** Search other customers of the current tenant and can select a person to see the detail as the current function.

column3: Order Process App - Initialization for first Flutter project
column4:
Initialize flutter project that must be able to:

* Have a suitable structure with project requirement
* Have a good structure for Networking, Model serialization, etc
* Support multiple environments
* Easy to clone to other tenants
* Support multiple languages
* Support themes

column3: API - Receive Notification for Status Update of Order
column4:
As a customer, I want receive the notification every time my order status is updated so that I can track my order more conveniently.

+*AC:*+

* After creating an order on my app, I go to Orders screen.
* I click my order to view Order Detail screen.
* On Order Detail screen, I can see a new line named Status, it’s left-aligned on the screen.
* Below the Status line, I can see my order status (New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed), it’s also left-aligned on the screen.
* I also want my order status also displayed on Orders screen.
* Every time my order status is updated by the staff, I can receive the notification by 2 ways:
** Push notification: “Your order \[Order Number] at \[Business Name] has been updated to \[status].“. When I tap on that one, it’ll open Order Detail screen correspondingly. This only applied for mobile platform:
** Email:
*** I want to see the message _“Your order \[Order Number] at \[Business Name] has been updated to \[status].“_ with my order detail displayed below this message.
*** I can see my order detail displayed as a table, below this table I want to see the message _“Click_ {color:#00b8d9}+*_here_*+{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}_to view your order at \[tenant].“_, attach the hyperlink to “here“ word. On clicking, I can be directed to Order Detail page of the web app. I can be required to login if I haven’t login before.
*** _“Sincerely,_
*** _\[tenant]  team.”_

column3: KardPOS App - Receive Notification for New Orders
column4:
As a staff who is using KardPOS app, I want receive the notification every time any order status is updated.

+*AC:*+

* After creating an order on my app, I go to Orders menu and tap it.
* I click any order to view Order Detail screen.
* On Order Detail screen, I can see a new line named Status, 
* Below the Status line, I can see my order status (*_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed_*)
* I also want my order status also displayed on Orders screen. (*_Pickup / Delivery tab_*)
* Every time my order status is updated by the staff, I can receive the notification which says: _“The order \[Order Number] at \[Business Name] has been updated to \[status].“._ When I tap on that one, it’s open the Order Detail screen corresponding to that order. This will be applied for both mobile and tablet platforms.

column3: Order Process App - Order Detail and Update Order Status
column4:
As a staff of the store, I want to have a screen named “Order Detail“ for each order on Order Process app, so that I can check with customer which items they bought and perform deliver order as exact as possible.

+*AC:*+

* On Order Detail screen, I can tap on any orders to open Order Detail screen.
* On Order Detail screen:
** Title: Order Detail
** I can see customer name, phone number and call icon. On clicking Call icon, it’ll open the dialog of system which allows me to choose an external app to call customer (Phone default app, Skype, Zalo, etc…).
** I can see order number, order status, payment status, order type, address:
*** Order Status: All / New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed. I can update status on this screen. (use bottom sheet style here)
*** Payment status: Paid / Unpaid.
*** Order Type: Delivery / Pickup
*** Delivery/Pickup Address: show exactly the address which customer has inputted while buying product on app or the address where the other staff created the order at the store.
** Below the address, show the map with the defined address above. (only for Delivery orders).
** I can see the list of items of the order below:
*** Quantity, Items, Unit Price and Total Price for each item
*** Tax, Coupon, Gift Cards.
*** Total amount
** A button shown at the bottom of this screen depending on how the staff open this one:
*** If the staff starts with Scan Order button at Home screen, after scanning QR code of the customer’s order, the button shown at the bottom named “Confirm“. On tapping this button, show success screen to inform the order completed. (refer to the ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-858|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-858|smart-link])
*** If the staff starts with Orders button at Home screen, firstly they open Order List screen, on tapping any orders it’ll open Order Detail screen, the button shown at the bottom named “Scan Order“. On tapping this button, it’ll show the scan screen (camera), the order will be completed immediately after being scanned.

+Validation rules:+

* Customer’s avatar must be synced up with the one on consumer apps.
** Customer changes avatar, it’ll changed, too.
** Customer does not upload avatar, show the default one (two-first characters)
* The customer name should be fully displayed on this screen.
* Phone number must match to the one on consumer apps.
* Update status:
** When order status is New. I can only update to Preparing.
** When order status is Preparing. I can only update to Ready.
** When order status is Ready. There’s 2 options of status for me to update:
*** I can update to Completed. (for Pickup orders) by scanning QR code.
*** I can update to Shipping (only for Delivery orders).
** When the status is Shipping (only for Delivery orders). I can update to Completed by scanning QR code.
** Finally, when order status is Completed. I cannot update any status anymore.
* Payment Status:
** Paid: for the orders created by customers on their apps or created by the staff directly at store.
** Unpaid: not available in the sprint of S2036
* The list of order items: all information must match to the one on consumer app or KardPOS app.
* Scan Order button:
** This button is enabled when the order type is pick-up and order status is Ready.
** Or this button is enabled when the order type is delivery and order status is Shipping.

column3: Order Process App - Order List
column4:
As a staff of the store, I want to view all the orders created from consumer apps, so that I can review and deliver the orders to customers.

+*AC:*+

* After login to Order Process App, I can see a button named “Orders”.
* On “Orders” button, I can see the number displayed on the icon, which shows new orders created from consumer apps or KardPOS app. This number represents for the number of processing orders, and it is displayed all the time. If there is any order status turning Completed, this number goes down correspondingly. The maximum number is 100, if there are more than 100 processing orders, show “99+”.
* When tapping Orders button, the new screen (“Order List”) opened.
* On Order List screen:
** I can see all the orders having been created by customers on their apps or by other staffs on KardPOS app.
** I can search orders by Customer Name, Phone Number. Search field is fixed at the top of screen, I can slide from orders list.
** I want to see the filter icon at the top-right of screen so that I can filter the list of orders. On clicking Filter icon, show the bottom sheet filter:
*** Status (All / New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed). The default value is All.
*** Type (All / Pickup / Delivery). The default value is All.
*** Date range: this range should last for a latest week from the current date. (Ex: 09/15/2020 - 09/21/2020).
*** Cancel button: close the filter.
*** Clear Filter button: clear all filter set and return the original status.
*** Filter icon should be highlighted when I’m using filter. If not applying filter or clearing filter, the color icon returns normal.
** For each order shown on the list:
*** I can see the customer name, phone number, order number, order status, delivery/pickup address, delivery/pickup time (both date and time here).
*** I can tap any orders to view Order Detail list. (refer ticket KP-721)

+Validation rules:+

* The list of orders is sorted by created date from the top downwards.
* Search orders:
** Customer Name: I can search with first name / last name / the phrase contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.
** Phone Number: I can search with full phone number or the string of number contained in the phone number.
** If no orders found, I want to see the message “No orders found.“. This message shown directly on the screen and center-aligned.
* Date: Follow this format MM/DD/YYYY (Ex: 04/21/2020 - 09/21/2020). 
* For each order shown on the list:
** All the information displayed on the order must match to the one on consumer apps / KardPOS app.
** Customer’s name and phone number must match to the order info when customer makes the order. There info would be fixed for each order.
** If the customer name is long, use ellipsis, make sure the name only shown in a line.
** {color:#ff5630}*_If the order created by user with Pay Now option chosen and the order created from KardPOS by order creation feature, they’ll not be shown on the list._*{color}

column3: Web Apps - Delivery Options - Delivery Address - Get User's Address as Default Value
column4:
As a customer I want to see my address in Delivery Address by default when I select Delivery for Shipping method when purchasing an order on web and mobile apps.

* I don’t expect to enter delivery addressing always as the current flow. The delivery address should be populated from my default address:
** Case 1: If user has verified KYC, the delivery address should be the KYC address. This address should be kept even if user changes another payment method.
** Case 2: If user has not verified KYC, the delivery address will be empty, user has to input manually that one.
* I can change it if that is not the address that I want to receive the order.

column3: Web Apps - Buy Product Flow - Payment with coupons
column4:
As a customer, I want to be able to buy product with using coupon to make payment.

+*Acceptance Criteria:*+

* User can add products to the cart.
* On Cart page, user clicks Proceed to Checkout. 
* On Confirm Purchase page, user can see an option Coupon below Gift Cards.
* On clicking Coupons option, the pop-up shown up:
** Title: Select Coupon
** Show the list of coupons which user has added to wallet.
** User can select or unselect any coupons on the list.
* The total amount which user has to pay finally must be correctly calculated.
* After payment:
** The order is saved on Orders page. (user can also see coupon amount which was used).
** The transaction named Coupon Redemption should be recorded on Transactions page, ARM site (Merchant Admin / Master Admin), Visipay site, Visikard Admin site.

+Validation rule:+

* The list of coupons shown on the pop-up only belongs to the certain store which user has added before, which means user cannot see the coupon from the store A if they buy product from the store B.
* If the coupon amount makes the final total amount which user has to payment is $0, Point option is disabled. (Ex: User buys a product with the total amount $3.00, he uses a coupon $3.50, so the final total amount he has to pay is $0.00, he cannot select point at that time).
* The coupon buy X get X only shown if user buys products corresponding to its content. (Ex: The coupon is Buy 2A to get 1B, this only shown if user buys enough 2A. Otherwise, it’ll be not shown). 
* User can only use one coupon at the same time while doing payment. 
* User cannot see the coupons which was used in Wallet page (Coupon tab). The coupon is shown again on Store Detail page and they can add to wallet and use again if they want.

Please design the UI when clicking on Coupon. Please refer the current UI on the mobile app

Also, add a radio button on the right panel the same as GK is working

# After using the coupon “Buy X get Y” to payment, how to check “Product Y” in the app? For now, we do not record any transactions for this action.
## This coupon is applied for the order that customer uses and it is not applied for an later order. Please check with Na on this to understand how it works and also keep in mind that this is not scope of this story. If this coupon does not work for the current payment flow, please create a bug and assign to me to review.
# The sort order when clicking on Coupon. I assume that we will use the created date for sorting.
## I don’t think sorting by date is a good for showing the coupons that the current customer has because we need to show the coupons that can be applied for the current order only and that list should not be long as they are coupons that the current customer has for the current merchant only.
# The user can able to unselect the GK in the list when he wants to unchoose. I think we need to apply this behavior for Coupon as well.
## Agree. We need to a way for customer to unselect a coupon. column3: [Android] - Save selected Location on Marketplace
column4:
!CB32CEF9-F9B5-4EFC-88BF-DD6F61A8ABDB.jpg|width=1152,height=2048!

AC:
The location on the image above (Marketplace and Search Business screen) should be:

# If the user granted the location permission: the current location of the user.
## Need to store this location to use later in case we don’t have location permission next time
# If the user did not grant the location permission, meaning we cannot get the current location of the user:
## If the location was detected before or the location is selected by the user manually before: use the saved location
## If we never detect the location and the user never select the location: Display “Unknown“

column3: Web Apps - Konnection - Add user/merchant to group
column4:
+*AC:*+

When connecting a friend (web app consumer) or a business (merchant), the list of connection groups will be shown and user can choose any connection group to store that friend or merchant. The list of connection group includes items: Co-workers, Family, Friends, Favorites and a Create New Group button. 

When user click at Create New Group button, the Create New Group pop-up shown up, there’s a field user can enter group name and two buttons Save and close (x)

||*Button*||*Action*||
|Save|Create a new group successfully, redirect user to the list of group connections.
A new group is added to the list above Create New Group button.|
|Close (x)|Close the pop-up.|

*_Validation rule:_*

* User can create multi groups while adding a new connection.
* User can add a new connection to multi groups that they want.
* If user do not choose any group to store a new connection, that connection will be added to the default group named All Kards.

UI Design: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/95fb18c2-d35e-431a-a779-8dac14be92fa-c0a8/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/95fb18c2-d35e-431a-a779-8dac14be92fa-c0a8/]

# Language setting menu is required for this form too.
column23: image-20200916-103636.png;KYB US.png;KYB US – Step 2.png;KYB US – Step 2 Onboarding.png
column30:
[~accountid:557058:3c9d0205-242e-4af3-be20-9293b7a3ba27]  I will link this ticket to the following one because we need to set rework the UI anyway.  [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/secure/RapidBoard.jspa?rapidView=49&projectKey=KP&view=planning&selectedIssue=KP-447|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/secure/RapidBoard.jspa?rapidView=49&projectKey=KP&view=planning&selectedIssue=KP-447];[~accountid:557058:3c9d0205-242e-4af3-be20-9293b7a3ba27]  Should be not High I think;[~accountid:5ed479f02bea5a0c2f1433fa] - just make it Medium.;[~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] - After discussing this with [~accountid:5ed479f02bea5a0c2f1433fa] , we realize there will be some changes requested by customer, meaning we may use KYC verification instead of KYB verification as current so that when this should be implemented? I can’t test KYC one too now. Please make a decision on this. Thanks;[~accountid:5ed479f02bea5a0c2f1433fa] Is there any solution to turn on Spanish version for KYC form?;[~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] [~accountid:5ed479f02bea5a0c2f1433fa] Currently, a Merchant users don’t need to pass KYC anymore and that column has been removed in the Arm 

!image-20200916-103636.png|width=1869,height=804!

so I think we need to move it out of sprint 2036

Please confirm.;[~accountid:557058:27d8b1c9-b5a9-4bcc-a002-d9834fc57e78] How was that relevant to this ticket? Nguyen already implemented and the merchants just do not need to do KYB.  ;[~accountid:5ed479f02bea5a0c2f1433fa] [~accountid:557058:27d8b1c9-b5a9-4bcc-a002-d9834fc57e78] We will use this form for next release by adding KYB form for merchnat only but don’t create primetrust account for them, so don’t remove the code. Keep it and test later.; [~accountid:5ed479f02bea5a0c2f1433fa] Okey, I mean when creating new merchant, user will not receive the KYC email anymore and Master Admin cannot resend the KYC email to merchant user because it has been remove on the “Merchant Account” tab as above screenshot. So there is no way to access the KYC form for merchant, so QC cannot verify this ticket in this sprint.

[~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] I’ve got it, so how’s about a status of this ticket? After devs complete their coding, will ticket be changed to Done? or move to next sprint?;[~accountid:557058:27d8b1c9-b5a9-4bcc-a002-d9834fc57e78] Yes I will keep this story for the release that we implement KYC for merchants. So QC don’t need to verify this story in S2036.;I reserve 1 point for this ticket to check it after the other KYC tickets completed;I'm implementing the KYC form for both the individual and corporate using Angular in sprint S2103.

Ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2765|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2765|smart-link] 

After checking the current localization, I will localize the language for the form during implementing the KYC form. So please add 1 more point to the estimation.

Total point for this ticket is 2pts

[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843]

column3: ARM Master - Merchant Accounts - Upgrade Subscription with Free of Charge
column4:
As an ARM master admin I want to be able to upgrade subscription plan for any merchant for free of charge in order to provide them the trial period of exploring the system before they pay for monthly subscription fee.

* Change column “Complimentary Platinum Mode” to “Complimentary Mode”.
* Add new button “Free Upgrade” button under the current subscription plan in Current Plan column.
** This button is enable for merchants that are active and verified for KYC only.
** When I click on this button, I can select one of the subscription plans except FREE (ECONOMY plan) on the popup.
*** The popup needs to have a note “You want to upgrade subscription plan for this merchant with free of charge for first month.“ for ARM master about this action.
*** The popup needs to show Business Name of the selected merchant as well.
*** The popup does not show the current subscription plan of the selected merchant.
** If I select “Confirm” button on the popup, the system proceeds to upgrade the selected merchant to the selected subscription plan with 1 free month and close the popup.
*** A transaction of “Subscription Fee” must be recorded with zero amount to track this activity.
*** New subscription plan of the selected merchant must be updated on Merchant Accounts screen.
*** Expire date of this merchant will be 1 month from the current day.
** If I select “Cancel” button, the system cancels the current action and close the popup and no change is applied.
column30:
[~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] I will reserve this for s2033;[~accountid:5ed479f02bea5a0c2f1433fa] Thanks. This is important, so please try best to have this.;{quote}Add new button “Free Upgrade” button under the current subscription plan in Current Plan column.{quote}

This button just display in the case of the current Merchant plan is not Gold level, right?

{quote}The popup does not show the current subscription plan of the selected merchant.{quote}

And lower level of current Merchant plan should also not be show, right? 
Ex: The plan of current Merchant is Silver so the popup only show the Gold plan;[~accountid:5eeb358e96b9660abf6c15b5] Just let ARM master admin to change to any subscription plan that is not ECONOMY (Free) and do not need to validate the lower to upgrade to higher. We already have a free trial of 1, 2, 3 month for the current subscription plan, so let freely let ARM master admin to change this.;Hi c [~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] Just want to confirm below items:

1. This button is enabled for merchants that are active and verified for KYC only.
--> There is a new change from KYC verified is that the merchant does not need to pass KYC. So do we need to apply this rule?

2. When I click on this button, I can select one of the subscription plans except FREE (ECONOMY plan) on the popup.
--> Currently, we have 4 subscription plans: Economy, Bronze, Silver, Gold. The "Free Upgrade" button will be only shown for 2 subscription plans: Bronze and Silver, correct?

3. I think we need to show the success message when upgrading the subscription plan successfully, correct? If yes, please define the message. 

4. I do not understand clearly about your answer to Thuy. I mean when I click on the Free Upgrade button:

* When my current subscription plan is Bronze, the popup will be shown: Silver & Gold
* When my current subscription plan is Silver, the popup will be shown: Gold
Is it correct?

5. The month in "Complimentary Platinum Mode" is always shown "1M 2M 3M" and not highlighted the selected trial month when I choose free for 1 month, 2 months or 3 months.

!screenshot-1.png|width=200,height=183!

 
--> My expectation is when choosing any freely trial month, the corresponding item should be highlighted. It should also apply when using the free update button. 

6. After exploring the system with 1 free monthly, do we need to disable the item "1M 2M 3M"?;[~accountid:5b43ade2a492e959f3f3248b] 

# Correct. I updated AC.
# Show 3 Bronze, Silver, Gold and exclude the current plan as the ACs describe.
# Message: Merchant \[business name] has been offered 1 month for \[Subscription Plan] successfully.
# Bronze: show Silver and Gold. Silver: show Bronze and Gold. Gold: show Bronze and Silver.
# Complimentary Platinum Mode → this is used to offer 1/2/3 months for the current subscription plan. It is different from the feature that we want to add.
# No. See my explanation for #5.;[~accountid:5ed479f0c3b5390c24a5905d] please revive the comments above for any changes may have;Verified.

column3: API - VisiKard Admin - Gift Card Catalog
column4:
As VisiKard Admin I want to see the list of gift cards issued by both ARM merchant and Incomm merchants to sell in the platform.

* The approving GK by ARM master admin is kept as the normal.
* I can see the list of gift cards with below columns when accessing Gift Card Catalog menu on VisiKard Admin Portal.
** Name
** Image
** Value
** Merchant
** Discount of Merchant
** VK Split
** Marketing Partner
** Customer Discount
** Status (Active / Inactive)
* The values of Discount of Merchant (Original Commission), VK Split, Marketing Partner and Customer Discount is shown based on the configuration on ARM Master Admin for each merchant. I cannot edit any of these columns.
* Total of VK Split, Marketing Partner and Customer Discount must be always 100%.
* I can search gift cards by name and merchant business name.

column3: Visipay - davinci MasterCard List
column4:
As VisiKay admin I want to be able to view the list of mastercard that the system requested davinci to create on Visipay.

* Access new item “daVinci MasterCards” on the left menu.
* I can see the list of MasterCard with below columns.
** Card Number → show last 4 digits of card number
** First Name
** Last Name
** Card Expiry
** Card Status
** Balance & Transactions
** Action
* I can sort the list by clicking on the header of columns: Card Number, First Name, Last Name, Card Expiry, Card Status.
* I can search mastercards by first name, last name and last 4 digits of card number.
* Balance & Transactions: I can select click on “View Detail“ button to view the card balance and the list of transactions stored in davinci mastercard.
** I can filter the transactions list by date range. I have to select maximum 31 days on this filter or I will receive a message “You cannot select more than 31 days” when I click on the Filter button
** Because the API do not support paging, so we will fetch all transactions for the selected filter, then split it into pages on client-side.
** I can export the list of transactions to CSV file by selecting Export CSV button.
* I can export the list of mastercards to CSV file by selecting Export CSV button.
* I can disable/remove a mastercard by selecting a Disable/Remove button on Action column.

column3: [Android] - Promotions - Update UI and Functions
column4:
As an app customer, I want to see the promotion campaigns created by the merchants on ARM site.

+*_Acceptance Criteria:_*+

After login to the app, user can find and see promotions by two ways:

* On Home screen, the promotion posts will be displayed below the categories of default merchant.
* On Store Detail screen, the promotion posts will be displayed below the categories of merchant.
* A promotion post will have info below:
** Merchant logo.
** Merchant name
** The create or modified date/time (followed the rule as table below)
** Caption
**  Promotion image / video

||*Created/Modified Time*||*Display*||
|Today|1 minute ago, 2 minutes ago…
1 hour ago, 2 hours ago…|
|After 24 or 48 hours since the created/modified time.|Yesterday, 2 days ago…|
|After 7 days since the created/modified time|1 week ago, 2 weeks ago…|
|After 30 days since the created/modified time|1 month ago, 2 months ago…|

* On tapping the image/video or caption of a promotion post , it will open the promotion post detail.
* On tapping merchant name or merchant logo, it will open the store detail screen of that merchant.
* User can like, comment, -share- on the promotion post.
** -On tapping the number of likes, it will open the pop-up with title as “People Who Liked“ which contains all the users liked (the number of users on the pop-up who liked the post must match the number of likes). This pop-up will show 5 people as default, sorted by liked time from the top downwards, if the number is more than, there will have See More text, on tapping it, user can scroll to see more people liked this post. User can also open Person Kard screen when tapping any person on the list.- 
**  User can unlike the post.
** -User can delete his/her own comment on the post. For this function, on each comment will have the More button (three dots icon), on tapping user can see Delete button, on tapping Delete button, it will show a pop-up message “Are you sure you want to delete this comment?“ with two buttons Yes and No. On tapping Yes, it will close the pop-up and user’s comment is deleted, on tapping No, it will close the pop-up, user’s comment is still there.- 
** -On tapping Share icon, the app will open the default sharing function of system for each mobile platform.- 
** User can see the other customers who have commented on the current post. user can also open Person Kard screen when tapping any person on the list of comments. 

+_Validation rules:_+

* The promotion posts can be shown no matter if user connects to that merchant who created that promotion or not.
* The promotion posts are only shown on the tenant app which is a partner of the merchant creating that post. (Ex: The promotion post of Hyt store can only be shown on Hyt app, if it’s associated with Hyt tenant partner on ARM Master Admin site). 
* The promotion posts cannot be shown on the app if it’s paused or deleted by merchant admin on ARM site.
* The promotion posts are shown depending on the age and gender of user. (it’s configured when merchant admin creates that promotion campaign on ARM site), also depending on user’s current location.
* The promotion posts should be sorted by the created / modified latest time from the top downwards. (both Home screen and Store Details screen).
* User can comment -/ share- many times on a promotion post. 
* The number of likes / comments -/ shares-  should be updated correctly.
* The comments of a promotion post should be sorted by the added date/time, the latest one to oldest one from the top downwards.
* On the list of promotion posts, the caption should be displayed maximum 3 lines. On Promotion Details screen, that should be displayed fully.

XD: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/e9b3e349-ca0d-4450-b517-00c30a3431c7-bce0/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/e9b3e349-ca0d-4450-b517-00c30a3431c7-bce0/]

column3: Web Apps - Refund feature for Kash Kard
column4:
As a customer, I want to have the refund same as mobile app, so that I can refund money to my kash kard for payment transaction.

+*_Acceptance Criteria:_*+

* On Kash Kard detail page, user can see a new button named Refund. On clicking that button, it will open the Refund In-Store pop-up, there’s a QR code on that pop-up, this QR code is used for refunding.
* The staff B at store will use KardPOS to help customers to refund. They logins to POS app, open Transactions screen, on this screen they will find the payment transaction which the customer had done before and tap it open Transaction Detail screen, on which contains Refund Transaction button.
* On tapping Refund Transaction button, it will open the camera (scanning screen), the staff will scan the QR code on the web app which user is openning above. After scanning, POS app shows Refund Transaction screen, which allows the staff enter amount that user wants to refund, then tap Continue to show the refund confirmation screen, on this screen, user can check how much had he/she done payment and how much he/she wants to refund.
* After checking confirmation, the staff will tap Confirm button to finish Refund process:

# -Refund successful pop-up will be shown.- *On web, user need to close the refund popup manually. We will enhance this later by implement notification system on web*
#  The refund amount will be transfer to user kash kard from merchant’s kash kard, the balance on PrimeTrust must be updated as well.
# Record transaction on KardPOS app / web apps / ARM site (merchant and admin) / Visipay site.

+_Validation rules:_+

* User can only refund to Kash Kard, that means Refund button only shown on Kash Kard detail page, not on any other card detail.
* User can only refund with the QR code from Refund button. If using any other ones, the POS app will show the error message pop-up and says “This code is invalid.“
* The staff can only help customers to refund for payment transaction which had been performed directly at store. If customers perform doing payment internally on web app such as buying products or gift cards of merchant, they cannot refund for such these transactions.
* The refund amount must be equal to or less than payment amount.
* Each payment transaction can only refunded one-time only, if a transaction is refunded already, Refund Transaction button will be hidden.
* KYC limitation will be applied for refund transaction. If the refund amount makes customer kash kard exceeds over hold limit ($15,000.00), the refund transaction cannot be done and the error message pop-up will show on POS app and says “Your customer cannot hold more than $15,000.00“.

column3: API - Visipay - Point Configuration
column4:
As VisiKard Admin I want to be able to manage point reward on the Admin site instead of the current ARM site.

* I can open the left menu “Point Management” to access the page to configure point reward with below
* This shows the list of activities that the system or merchants reward points to customers.
** Display the list of point categories that the system supports:
*** System reward:
**** Sign up
**** Get KYC verified
**** Trade with a friend (first time only)
**** First successful money loading to KK from any credit card/crypto card/bank account. (*_this activity is only applied for the first-time loading of a certain card_*, if user has credit card and bank account, they can only get reward for loading from credit card for the first time).
**** Invite a friend and that friend registers account with the platform successfully
*** Merchant reward:
**** Buy Gift Card
**** Buy Product
**** Trade with Merchant (first time only)
**** Rate Merchant
** The list have these columns:
*** Name
*** Description
*** Values (Points): User will earn this amount of point when doing this activity
*** Rewarded by: System/Merchant
*** Status
*** Actions
**** Edit:
***** Description
***** Value (rewarded points)
***** Validation rule:
****** Description and Value fields are required. If they are empty (no input or input space character), show the red error message “Description is required.“ / “Value is required.“ under each field.
****** Value field only accepts integers (ex: 1, 2, 3, …, 20, 30), if inputting decimal/negative value show the red error message “Value is invalid.“ next to the field name.
**** Disable: Display a confirm popup before disable: “Are you sure to disable this reward activity?“ (Disable, Cancel buttons)
**** Enable: Display a confirm popup before enable: “Are you sure to enable this reward activity?“ (Enable, Cancel buttons)
** If an activity is disabled, consumer cannot see it on *_“How to earn point”_* screen in the app, which means they cannot earn points from it as well. 
** If the admin edits any activities (description, value), the content in the app must be changed (on *_“How to earn point”_* screen) corresponding to edited information.
** *Remove this feature from ARM Master.*

column3: API - Consumer Apps - Buy Product Flow - Redeem Points
column4:
As a customer, I would like to be able to redeem points when purchasing products while the current process allows me to pay with kash kard, gift cards and coupons.

* I select a product from anywhere in a consumer app.
* At the Purchase Confirmation screen:
*# Apply the priority on subtracting the amount the user has to pay: coupon => gift card => points.
*# If the amount subtracted when the user selects the coupon / gift card is $0.00, the point selection will be disabled, user cannot select point.
*# If user chooses points first, then chooses coupon / gift card, the subtracted amount will be recalculated based on the priority of rule #1 above. If the final total amount is $0.00 (after choosing gift card / coupon card), rule #2 is applied.
** Example:
*** The total amount that the user has to pay is $ 20.00, they first choose $15.00 of points, then choose $6.00 of coupon. The value of the coupon will be subtracted as the highest priority (20.00 - 6.00 = $14.00), so the points the user previously selected is reset up to maximum $14.00.
*** The total amount the user has to pay is $20.00, they first choose $15.00 of points, then choose $20.00 of coupon. The value of the coupon will be subtracted as the highest priority (20.00 - 20.00 = $ 0.00), so the points previously selected by the user are reset to $0.00, which also means that point selection will be automatically disabled at that time.
* At the checkout step of buying product, I can select number of points that I want to use to pay for the order of buying product.
** Maximum value of "seekBar" must be
*** If my balance is in USD, so total amount I pay: Exchange rate * total amount to be paid.
**** For example, my balance is 1200, the exchange rate is 100 points = $ 1, the total I pay is $ 3.12 => maximum I can choose = 100 * 3.12 = 312 point = 3.12 dollars.
*** If the balance of feature II with the USD small more or by total money, I must be paid: Maximum points, I can choose will be the points I use:
**** Example: my balance is 1200, the exchange rate is 100 points = $ 1, the total I pay is $ 15 => I can choose a maximum of $ 1200 = $ 12
** The increment step of “seekBar” should be $1 (100 pts)
** Whenever I select points, I can see the exchanged amount that I can pay for the current order based on the used points.
* If the transaction is failed because I don’t have enough points that I selected for any reason. Display the error message “You don’t have enough points“.
* Seperate the value of points with a comma  (like money). Ex: 1,500 points / 10,000 points
* After buying the order successfully:
** My point account is updated by reducing the points used for the order.
** I see one reward transaction in Reward Redemption section under Points tab of wallet.
** Update one more row in Order Detail: Point with
** I can take orders through delivery or pickup (at exactly the store which I have purchased).
** Disable the point selection if user point balance is 0 or the final amount that user need to pay is 0

*Do not update current steps. We'll have another ticket to enhance the current flow to reduce the steps for it later.*

column3: Backend - Invite Friend - Update commission model
column4:
As a Tenant I want to offer a commission to my existing customers when new users who are invited by them to make the first purchase in order to attract more customers to join the platform and make payment.

* I want to be able to configure the commission amount when accessing left menu “Commission Configuration on Visipay.
** Add new menu “Commission Configuration” into the left menu of Visipay under Fee Configuration.
** Add new field “Invitation Bonus” in order to configure the bonus amount in USD.
*** Invitation Commission
**** Bonus for Inviter
**** Bonus for Invitee
**** Bonus must be positive number with the format $0.00
* Update the logic of current invitation commission.
** Current: customer gets commission as soon as invitee registers new account with the system.
** New: customer gets commission when invitee makes the first purchase.
*** Buy products
*** Buy gift cards
*** Pay at store with QR code (use KardPOS)
** The transaction of sending commission is the same as the current flow.
*** Transfer commission amount from the default merchant of the current tenant to customer’s KK if the commission amount is greater than 0.
*** Transfer commission amount from the default merchant of the current tenant to invitee’s KK if the commission amount is greater than 0.
* UI design: Git - KardSys\\VisiPay\\05-Export\\Sprint 2036\\KP-420 Commission Config

column3: API - Point Reward System - Rewarded Activities
column4:

**** Sign Up
**** Get KYC Verified
**** Trade with a friend (first time only)

**** First successful money loading to KK from any credit card/crypto card/bank account.
**** Invite a friend and that friend registers account with the platform successfully.
** Rewarded by Merchant

**** Buy product
**** Buy gift card
**** Trade with business (first time only)
**** Rate business

** One reward transaction is recorded to My Rewards screen.
** Points Balance is increased with points configured in VK Admin for above activities.

column3: API - Consumer Apps - Buy Gift Card - Redeem Points
column4:
As a customer I want to be able to redeem my points when buying a GC while the current flow allows me to pay by kash kard.

* I select a GC from any place in the consumer app
** Marketplace > Online tab
** Store detail > Buy gift card
** Store detail > Gift card konnect category
* At the checkout step of buying a GC, I can select number of points that I want to use to pay for the order of buying a gift card.
** Maximum Value of the “seekBar“ should be
*** If my point balance in USD is greater than the total amount that I have to pay: exchange rate * total pay amount.
**** For example: my point balance is 1200, exchange rate is 100 pts = $1, total amount that I have to pay is $3.12 => max point I can select = 100*3.12 = 312 pts = $3.12
*** If my point balance in USD is smaller than or equal to the total amount that I have to pay: max point I can select will be my available point:
**** For example: my point balance is 1200, exchange rate is 100 pts = $1, total amount that I have to pay is $15.00 => max point I can select = 1200 pts = $12
** -The increment step of “seekBar” should be $1 (100 pts)-
** Whenever I select points, I can see the exchanged amount that I can pay for the current order based on the used points.
* If the transaction is failed because I don’t have enough points that I selected for any reason. Display the error message “You don’t have enough points“.
* After buying an order of a gift card successfully (These things should be worked already, please re-check)
** My point account is updated by reducing the points used for the order.
** I see one reward transaction in Reward Redemption section under Points tab of wallet.
** I can see the gift card bought in my wallet (Gift Card tab) if I buy it for my wallet or in my friend’s wallet if I select to gift to friend.
** I can redeem the gift card at exactly the store which I bought.
* Disable the point selection if user point balance is 0

UI: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/22000490-cc77-4eb8-963e-cc0bbfb86326-7753/screen/ca557291-774b-4dfe-bf45-04d5af2dae87|https://xd.adobe.com/view/22000490-cc77-4eb8-963e-cc0bbfb86326-7753/screen/ca557291-774b-4dfe-bf45-04d5af2dae87]

column3: ARM - Allow Merchant to buy points from KK
column4:
As a merchant I want to be able to manage my point account on ARM so that I can reward points the customers through the defined rewarded activities with my merchant.

* I can view current balance of my point account on ARM.
** Point balance is showed on new tab Points into Account → Payment tab under Payment method section.
** Use comma to separate the value of point if it’s too large. (Ex: 1,500 / 100,000…), this should be applied for all places displaying point in ARM merchant.
* I can view exchange rate below Exchange Amount field.  (The exchange rate is configured by ARM Master Admin).

*_Format: Exchange Rate: $x = y point(s) (Ex: $1 = 10 points)_*

*  I can purchase points using Kash Kard from my wallet through below steps.
*# I enter the amount in USD to buy points and I can see the points with entered amount right after I enter amount.
*# I select a card from my wallet to pay for this request but I expect to see Kash Kard only for this scope.
*# I confirm to purchase.
*## I expect to see the error message “Please input amount.“ if I do not enter amount and click Buy button.
*## If amount equals to 0, Buy button should be grey out.
*## I expect to see the error message “Your Kash Kard does not have enough money for this transaction.” if my KK’s balance is not enough.
*## If my KK has enough money, I expect to see new transaction with type “Point Purchase” under my transactions and my point account is increased. Show the message above Buy button: “You have bought \[number] points successfully.“
*### I can filter my transactions of buying points with category “Point Purchase” on Transactions screen.
*## Money flow is as below.
*### Transfer merchant’s KK to System KK and trigger to update PrimeTrust accounts for this transaction too.
*### Add points to merchant account after charging money from their KK successfully.
* If my point account’s balance is not enough for an reward activity, let skip the reward transaction to customer and don’t record anything for this case.

column3: API - Visipay - Point Account Management
column4:
*Description:*

As a VisiKard Admin I want to manage all point accounts of the platform

* Here are the point accounts managed in the platform.
** Each merchant has their own point account.
** Each customer has their own point account.

*AC:*

* Add new tab Points to Reserve Accounts page to display:
** Total points with amount of Merchant Point Accounts.
** Total points with amount of Consumer Point Accounts.
** Total points of system= Merchant’s points + Consumer’s points
** Exchanged Amount of Total Points = Total points of system/Exchange rate.
*** For example: total points is 1000, exchange rate is 100pts = $1 => Exchanged Amount = 1000/100 = $10
* Exchange rate: 100 pts = $1.
** This value should be stored on DB
** Currently we dont have UI function to modify it
** Use comma to separate the value of point if it’s too large. (Ex: 1,500 / 100,000…)

column3: Import Businesses and Offers from Entertainment
column4:
As the system admin, I want to be able to import all businesses and their locations and their offers of each location from Entertainment into the platform.

* This importing process is scheduled to sync offers from Entertainment to the platform every day at a specific time. Let investigate the best solution to sync data from Entertainment to the platform.
* Businesses and their locations should not be synced up every day because this information is not updated regularly. Let have another scheduled job to sync up businesses and locations.
* Insert subcategories from Entertainment into the list of business categories if they don’t exist.
* Insert main categories from Entertainment into the list of category groups.

column3: Backend - Security - SQL Injection - Part 1
column4:
* Review the report of SQL injection errors provided by Sonarqube server.
** [http://icci.tpssoft.com.vn:9008/project/issues?id=Visikard-Kard-KashKard&open=AXNq6vwyVySa8tJAsfI8&resolved=false&sonarsourceSecurity=sql-injection&types=SECURITY_HOTSPOT|http://icci.tpssoft.com.vn:9008/project/issues?id=Visikard-Kard-KashKard&open=AXNq6vwyVySa8tJAsfI8&resolved=false&sonarsourceSecurity=sql-injection&types=SECURITY_HOTSPOT] (Login by using TPS domain account - Contact devops guys if you cannot access to this report)
* Fix the errors from the above report with the below priority.
** Critical issues that break the functions from data input from normal users who don’t know the deep knowledge to try to test security.
** Remaining
* Note down the list of impacted features when fixing the draw SQL query to solve this issue. Impact functions must be tested by the developers who work on this task.

column3: iOS Apps - Marketplace - Online tab
column4:
As a customer I want to be able to see the list of merchants who are selling gift cards near to me and view the list of gift cards to purchase.

* *Update Menu*
** Change Local Marketplace to Marketplace.
** Remove Gift Cards from the left menu (for mobile apps).
* *Set My Location*
** Whenever I access Marketplace page, I expect to receive the request from the app to access my device’s location if my current location is not configured.
** I can change my location whenever I want in order to filter the merchants near to me on Nearby tab.
** I expect to be able to view Online tab if I don’t setup my location.
* *Nearby tab*
** Incomm merchants are added into ARM by VisiKard admin and linked to Incomm gift cards so that these merchants can be showed in this review like in-store merchants. 
** This is the list of merchants who have the default active konnect zone. Currently a merchant can have only ONE active KZ but in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-76|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-76|smart-link] the system will allow merchant to have multiple active KZs and must configure the default one.
** Marketplace list of businesses should be built from these sources and shown in Geo Proximity from closest to farthest.
*** ARM Business List
*** Incomm Business List → I suggest we call VisiKard businesses because these business can sell coupons from another company not Incomm in the future. 
** The default active KZ of each merchant can participate with different locations and different locations will be show from near to far on this view.
*** For example: KFC has 3 locations L1, L2, L3 from near to far. Lotteria has 2 locations L4, L5.
*** Distance order from these locations to the current location: L1, L4, L2, L3, L5.
*** I expect to see as below
**** KFC at L1
**** Lottera at L4
**** KFC at L2
**** KFC at L3
**** Lotteria at L5 
** I can search businesses by entering Name, Business Category into search text-box. As typing is done in the search bar, the marketplace list should update dynamically.
** I can scroll down to load more businesses based on their konnect zone’s locations to be showed from near to far.
** I can select the filter icon to select the list of business categories to filter businesses and All option is selected by default.
** Each business must have below information.
*** Logo
*** Business Name
*** Address (Business Location)
*** Business Category
*** Distance from current member location 
** When I select a merchant on this list, I can see store detail of this merchant.
** The current UI of Local Marketplace should be kept as it is nearly the same as Nearby tab.
* *Online tab*
** This is the list of active gift cards under active konnect zones including the gift cards from ARM merchants and Incomm merchants.
** Gift cards are sorted with below criteria.
*** Discount % descending
*** Brand (gift card of the same brand must be showed continuously) → merchant who sell gift card
** I can search gift card on this tab by entering Name, Brand into search text-box. As typing is done in the search bar, the marketplace list should update dynamically.
** I can select the filter icon to select the list of business categories to filter gift cards on the selected business category and All option is selected by default.
** When I select a gift card to buy, I will go through the flow of buying gift card defined in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-147|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-147|smart-link]

column3: Web Apps - Update Store Detail for Merchant
column4:
As a merchant I want to be able to setup a basic KZ for customers to review my store with minimum data.

* Minimum data
** ARM Coupons
** ARM Gift Cards
** Incomm Gift Cards
* I can setup only one Konnect Category for my KZ at basic level instead of 4 as current requirement.
* Basic KZ should have below information.
** Address
** Phone Number
** Distance from current member location
** Business categories – show multiple if available
** Pay Button
** See sample

column3: Visikard Admin - Gift Card Report - Revenue report
column4:
As a VisiKard Admin, I want to have a report of all gift cards purchased by customer when accessing VisiKard Admin portal.

* I want to access Gift Card Report menu to open the report page.
* I can see 2 tabs on this page.
** Gift Card Listing
** Gift Card Revenue Report
* Gift Card Listing
** Search and filter criteria.
*** Filter by gift card type: “In-Store” or “Incomm”.
*** Filter by Order Date in date range.
** When I fill in all the above information, I can view the list of gift cards as a table.
*** Gift Card Number
*** Image
*** Customer → First Name + Last Name of customer who purchased gift card.
*** Order Date → the date when the gift card has been purchased.
*** Brand → This is business name of merchant who issue the gift card.
*** Price → the price that customer purchase for the gift card.
*** Amount → value of gift card that can be redeemed.
** I can export the list of gift cards to CSV.
* Gift Card Revenue Report
** Filter criteria
*** Month and Year
**** Default value is the current month of the current year.
**** I can select “All” option from Month drop-down list to view the report for a selected year.
**** Values of year must not be greater than the current year.
*** Gift Card Type: In-store, Incomm, All
**** All is default value
** Review Chart
*** Month and Year are selected
**** Chart
***** Display total amount of gift cards that are sold in the system for each day of the selected month. 
***** Skip the date that don’t have any transaction
**** The detail listing for each date
***** Number of Transactions
***** Revenue (total gift card amount - total discount)
***** Commission
**** Have a summary at the end of the detail listing.
*** Only Year is selected
**** The same as above report but it show for each month instead of each day.
*** I can export this report to PDF.
column23: Gift Card Listing.png;Gift Card Revenue Report (1bdee4bf-05d8-4ac9-b8f8-0385223db9c6).png;image-20200720-080403.png;image-20200720-080718.png;image-20200720-105801.png

column3: Web Apps - Marketplace - Online tab
column4:
As a customer I want to be able to see the list of merchants who are selling gift cards near to me and view the list of gift cards to purchase.

* *Update Menu*
** Change Local Marketplace to Marketplace.
** Remove Gift Cards from the left menu (for mobile apps).
* *Set My Location*
** Whenever I access Marketplace page, I expect to receive the request from the app to access my device’s location if my current location is not configured.
** I can change my location whenever I want in order to filter the merchants near to me on Nearby tab.
** I expect to be able to view Online tab if I don’t setup my location.
* *Nearby tab*
** This is the list of merchants who have gift cards to sell in the platform.
** Marketplace list of businesses should be built from these sources and shown in Geo Proximity from closest to farthest.
*** ARM Business List
*** Incomm Business List
** Each gift card can be sold at different locations and the nearest location will be showed under the business on this view. 
** I can search businesses by entering Name, Business Category into search text-box. As typing is done in the search bar, the marketplace list should update dynamically.
** Incomm merchants are added into ARM by VisiKard admin and linked to Incomm gift cards so that these merchants can be showed in this review like in-store merchants. 
** I can select the filter icon to select the list of business categories to filter businesses and All option is selected by default.
** Each business must have below information.
*** Logo
*** Business Name
*** Address (Business Location)
*** Business Category
*** Distance from current member location 
** When I select a merchant on this list, I can see store detail of this merchant.
* *Online tab*
** This is the list of active gift cards that are sold in the platform.
** Gift cards are sorted with below criteria.
*** Discount % descending
*** Brand (gift card of the same brand must be showed continuously)
** I can search gift card on this tab by entering Name, Brand into search text-box. As typing is done in the search bar, the marketplace list should update dynamically.
** I can select the filter icon to select the list of konnect categories of gift cards with All option is selected by default.
*** Sample categories should be: 
**** All
**** Food
**** Shop
**** Entertainment
**** Play
**** Live
**** Travel
**** Services
** When I select a gift card to buy, I will go through the flow of buying gift card defined in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-151|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-151|smart-link]

column4:

column3: ARM Merchant - Add/Edit Konnect Category for Gift Cards - Show Incomm Gift Cards
column4:
As VisiKard Admin I want to be able to setup Konnect Zone for VisiKard merchants to associate with Incomm Gift Cards.

* I access a VisiKard merchant.
* I can setup a Konnect Zone like normal merchant.
* I can add a Konnect Category of Gift Cards
** If the current merchant belongs to VisiKard, I can see the list of Incomm Gift Cards when selecting Fetch Assets button to associate with the current merchant.
*** I can search Incomm gift cards by Brand in order to filter the list of gift card to fetch to select the current merchant.
** Otherwise - it will works as current flow to show gift cards created by the current merchant only.

column3: ARM - Merchant Accounts - Approve for Visikard Merchant
column4:
As a VisiKard Admin I want to be able to register merchants for Incomm Gift Cards in the platform and can approve these merchants after registration without through KYC process.

* I register new merchant as normal process with any subscription type that is not free.
* I log in as ARM Master Admin and select Merchant Accounts.
* I can select new merchant and indicate that this is owned by VisiKard so that this merchant does not go through KYC process.
** Add new button “Set as VK Merchant” on Action column.
** Select on this button I will see a confirmation message “Please confirm that VisiKard owns \[Business Name]”.
* I can approve a VisiKard merchant although it does get KYC verified because this merchant is using the VisiKard prime Trust account for KK payment.
column30:
[~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349]We have some questions need to clarify:

# I assume the VK merchant will have features as normal merchant (merchant passed KYC): Dashboard, messages, audience, campaigns, konnect zone, konnect category, transactions, business locations, store, kards, account, invitation code, report, fund and invitation offer
# For the VK merchant, we just create a Gift card category for that gets all GCs from the Incomm’s brand
# We will not conduct to get KYC verified for the VK merchant in our testing
# Select on this button I will see a confirmation message “Please confirm that VisiKard owns \[Business Name]”. with Ok and Cancel button, correct?;[~accountid:557058:27d8b1c9-b5a9-4bcc-a002-d9834fc57e78] 

# Correct
# VK merchant can have other Konnect Categories like normal merchant but for Gift Card category, they can see the list of Incomm gift cards only when fetching defined in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-180|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-180|smart-link] 
# VK merchant will be linked to the current Visikard PrimeTrust account automatically as soon as it is marked as VK merchant and it passes KYC automatically then.
# I would say to have the standard buttons for confirmation dialog. OK and Cancel are standard buttons for this case.

column3: Backend - Security - SQL Injection
column4:
* Review the report of SQL injection errors provided by Sonarqube server.
** [http://icci.tpssoft.com.vn:9008/project/issues?id=Visikard-Kard-KashKard&open=AXNq6vwyVySa8tJAsfI8&resolved=false&sonarsourceSecurity=sql-injection&types=SECURITY_HOTSPOT|http://icci.tpssoft.com.vn:9008/project/issues?id=Visikard-Kard-KashKard&open=AXNq6vwyVySa8tJAsfI8&resolved=false&sonarsourceSecurity=sql-injection&types=SECURITY_HOTSPOT] (Login by using TPS domain account - Contact devops guys if you cannot access to this report)
* Fix the errors from the above report with the below priority.
** Critical issues that break the functions from data input from normal users who don’t know the deep knowledge to try to test security.
** Remaining
* Note down the list of impacted features when fixing the draw SQL query to solve this issue. Impact functions must be tested by the developers who work on this task.

column3: Web App - Search Screen
column4:
As a customer, I want to have a feature on web app allowing to search other customers as well as businesses (merchants).

+*Acceptance Criteria:*+

* People item is removed from the top navigation bar.
* A new icon (magnifying glass) is added on the top navigation bar, next to Cart icon. When user click at Search icon, it shows the Search page.
* On Search page:
** The page title: Search
** The page is devided into 2 tabs (People and Business). If user want to search people, choose People tab, choose Business tab to search merchant.
** There is a field which user can enter keyword to search on each tab.
** The placeholder text: “Enter people name / business name” and a search icon before (magnifying glass)
** User can only search people or merchants being associated with the same tenant of web app which they are using. If user search some customer or merchant belonging to the other tenant, show the error message “There are no results that match your search.”
** For each tab, user can see:

||*Tab*||*Action*||
|People|Show the list of customers currently using the same web app.|
|Business|Show the list of merchants being associated with the same tenant partner.|



* If search session do not display any result, show the error message “There are no results that match your search.”.
* After searching, the result will be displayed:
** Customer: show the name, avatar. User can open the user detail pop-up by clicking on that.
** Merchant: show the business name, business logo image, location, rating stars, distance and discount percentage. User can open the store detail page by clicking on that.

User can change the location to search merchants from the other location.

* If user do not allow or block location on web app, the page shows all merchants.
* If user set the current location (for example: Ho Chi Minh City), the page shows below business (merchants) being in HCM City.
* If user change the location (for example: New York, US), the page shows business (merchants) being in New York, US.

+_UI design:_+
XD: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/370571bd-252f-451a-9451-fbc8ec6492f7-6256/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/370571bd-252f-451a-9451-fbc8ec6492f7-6256/]

This view must be responsive for both mobile and desktop view.

column3: [Android] - Display Konnect Category of Konnect Zones
column4:
As a merchant admin I want customers on the consumer app can see the list of configured konnect zones when selecting category of Konnect Zones. Customer can also view the details of a konnect zone from the list of connect zones too.

* Customers select a merchant to view store detail.
* Select KZs category then will see the list of KZs configured for this category.
** I can only see the list of konnect zones belonging to merchants which are associated with the tenant partner of mobile or web app. (Ex: Kard users can see the konnect zones of merchants belonging to Kard.).
** If any KZ is removed, deactivated or expired, that one should be gone from the list.
* Select a KZ of the list will open KZ detail page.
* From a KZ detail page, I can select other categories like categories showed on store detail screen.

column3: Mobile Apps - Localization - Update Resource Files for Messages/Alerts
column4:
and As a Visikard editor staff I expect new version of resource files will be synced up to the web apps through below events.

* Daily at a time through background job → consider to reuse the current background job of HYT to sync up all resource files from POEditor for all projects.
* Select another language from the top menu.
* Any event of starting the app to trigger the sync?

I also expect that there is no issue happening with the web apps if the system cannot get the resource files from POEditor for any reason and the current local resource files will be used.

column3: Web Apps - US is the default country if the current location is not available
column4:
As a customer I expect that US is selected in the country of all functions if the system cannot get my location due to any reason.

* Functions with country selection
** KYC Submission Form
** Add Credit Card
* This change must be applied for all web apps
** Kard
** GreenCom
** KingdomPay
** Greenline
* The app cannot get the current location due to an reason and here are some reasons.
** Customer does not allow the app to access the device’s location.
** Fake location is configured by some way.

column3: Mobile Apps - Localization - Update and Upload Resource Files to POEditor
column4:
As I Visikard editor staff I want to be able to edit text of all UI content as well as messages/alerts of any screens of the apps on POEditor.

* All UI text, messages and alerts must be stored in resource files.
* Resource files are imported to POEditor in order me to edit any text in any language that we want to support.
* English language is created by default.
* Resources must be updated at run-time when users open the app.

column3: iOS Apps - Marketplace - Nearby tab
column4:
As a customer I want to be able to see the list of merchants who are selling gift cards near to me and view the list of gift cards to purchase.

* *Update Menu*
** Change Local Marketplace to Marketplace.
** Remove Gift Cards from the left menu (for mobile apps).
* *Set My Location*
** Whenever I access Marketplace page, I expect to receive the request from the app to access my device’s location if my current location is not configured.
** I can change my location whenever I want in order to filter the merchants near to me on Nearby tab.
** I expect to be able to view Online tab if I don’t setup my location.
* *Nearby tab*
** Incomm merchants are added into ARM by VisiKard admin and linked to Incomm gift cards so that these merchants can be showed in this review like in-store merchants. 
** This is the list of merchants who have the default active konnect zone. Currently a merchant can have only ONE active KZ but in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-76|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-76|smart-link] the system will allow merchant to have multiple active KZs and must configure the default one.
** Marketplace list of businesses should be built from these sources and shown in Geo Proximity from closest to farthest.
*** ARM Business List
*** Incomm Business List → I suggest we call VisiKard businesses because these business can sell coupons from another company not Incomm in the future. 
** The default active KZ of each merchant can participate with different locations and different locations will be show from near to far on this view.
*** For example: KFC has 3 locations L1, L2, L3 from near to far. Lotteria has 2 locations L4, L5.
*** Distance order from these locations to the current location: L1, L4, L2, L3, L5.
*** I expect to see as below
**** KFC at L1
**** Lottera at L4
**** KFC at L2
**** KFC at L3
**** Lotteria at L5 
** I can search businesses by entering Name, Business Category into search text-box. As typing is done in the search bar, the marketplace list should update dynamically.
** I can scroll down to load more businesses based on their konnect zone’s locations to be showed from near to far.
** I can select the filter icon to select the list of business categories to filter businesses and All option is selected by default.
** Each business must have below information.
*** Logo
*** Business Name
*** Address (Business Location)
*** Business Category
*** Distance from current member location 
** When I select a merchant on this list, I can see store detail of this merchant.
** The current UI of Local Marketplace should be kept as it is nearly the same as Nearby tab.
* *Online tab*
** This is the list of active gift cards under active konnect zones including the gift cards from ARM merchants and Incomm merchants.
** Gift cards are sorted with below criteria.
*** Discount % descending
*** Brand (gift card of the same brand must be showed continuously) → merchant who sell gift card
** I can search gift card on this tab by entering Name, Brand into search text-box. As typing is done in the search bar, the marketplace list should update dynamically.
** I can select the filter icon to select the list of business categories to filter gift cards on the selected business category and All option is selected by default.
** When I select a gift card to buy, I will go through the flow of buying gift card defined in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-147|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-147|smart-link] 

UI: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/d6b7740c-b8fd-4690-791f-10aa1a1d8a64-a086/screen/e921f0cb-df8c-4533-8946-6745d19b77d5|https://xd.adobe.com/view/d6b7740c-b8fd-4690-791f-10aa1a1d8a64-a086/screen/e921f0cb-df8c-4533-8946-6745d19b77d5]
column23: Marketplace - Allow.png;Marketplace Nearby.png;Marketplace Nearby – Filter.png;Marketplace Online.png;Menu.png
column30:
[~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] Let make a design for store detail to demonstrate a Incomm merchant that we manage in the platform as it has only one category for gift card for now instead of having some categories like other in-store merchants. It has minimum information for store information and one category of gift cards.;Hello [~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] ,

Kindly update the mockup to describe:

# Set My Location: I expect to be able to view Online tab if I don’t setup my location. → If user chooses “No”, then the device will only show “Online”.
# Nearby tab:
## I can search businesses by entering Name, Business Category into search text-box.  → Adding the keyword to the search.
# Online tab:
## I can search gift card on this tab by entering Name, Brand into search text-box. → Adding the keyword to the search.;[~accountid:5c6e1d28f2f4366be3ccaeff] I just edited the UIs.
I don’t think show only Online Store is a good idea for people that refuse to Allow Location.
They should be direct to Online tab only, and if they want to view Nearby, they will be asked again for the Allow. This will prevent misclick that make User hard to find a way to Allow location.;Hello C [~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] ,

I concur with [~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] feedback regarding permission for the location of a mobile device.  

Do you agree with his thought, too?;[~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] need to have UI for selecting filter icon next to search box.;[~accountid:5c6e1d28f2f4366be3ccaeff] [~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] Agree with your suggestion about asking customers to allow the access to their location whenever they select Nearby view. If they refuse, we will show Online tab.;[~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] [~accountid:5c6e1d28f2f4366be3ccaeff] Let update the message of popup to ask permission to access the device’s location.;[~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] I already attached Screen which ask user to Allow the App to collect this device location.;[~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] Still miss the UI of selecting filter icon.;[~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] I already add the Filter dropdown with click on Filter icon, it’s in the first Attachment picture.;[~accountid:5c6e1d28f2f4366be3ccaeff] [~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] team has asked about the search form between near by tab and online tab. Should we add it below the tab name?;Hello [~accountid:557058:a2d26b97-07cd-4a63-951d-795f3b39eac1] , and [~accountid:5da94264ba2c320c2c315fb6] ,

I concur with the team’s feedback regarding the Search bar. Actually, at HYT App, that search bar is placed below the Map.

Thank you.;[~accountid:5c6e1d28f2f4366be3ccaeff] I have some questions on this item:

# “Whenever I access Marketplace page, I expect to receive the request from the app to access my device’s location if my current location is not configured.“ Do you mean we will ask for the “Location access permission“ if we don’t have this?
# “I expect to be able to view Online tab if I don’t setup my location.“ I think the Online tab should be able to view regardless of whether users setup their location or not.
# Do we need hide the Nearby tab if we can’t get user’s location because of permission lacking?
# Where can we define the “konnect categories of gift cards“? Is that the Konnect Category on ARM portal? If yes, I don’t understand how can we use it to filter the gift cards
# We don’t have Brand for in-store gift cards, so what we will display on this field for them?;Hello [~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] ,

Here are my responses:

# Yes, we need to ask for location accessibility permission since there are features associated with that permission.
# Your observation is correct. However, that is one of the expectations used in the “Set My Location”.
# No, we don’t.  We will inquire user for location permission whenever they want to access to “Nearby” tab.
#  C [~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] , kindly advises us on the question
# We can use the Business Name for ARM-Merchant as in-store brand.;[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] Gift cards of a merchant are visible to customers when they are added into an active konnect zone through konnect categories that they configure for their merchant. A merchant can add their gift cards into one or more konnect categories and add these categories into an active KZ so that these gift cards are seen by customers.;[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] Please review new mockup [https://xd.adobe.com/view/d6b7740c-b8fd-4690-791f-10aa1a1d8a64-a086/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/d6b7740c-b8fd-4690-791f-10aa1a1d8a64-a086/] and let me know if you need anything else.;[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] I am working with the designer team to arrange buttons on Store Detail screen and will inform you as soon as it is done but it should not impact to the estimation.;[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] and [~accountid:5ed479f02bea5a0c2f1433fa] Merchants in the nearby view will be the ones who have active konnect zones in the system, so I will update AC to reflect this change after I clarify this with customer yesterday.;[~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] I have some questions:

# We should keep the behavior of request user location access permission as the current:
## We are asking for this permission right after user open the app home screen
## If user reject this request, we cannot open the permission request popup any more because that is a system popup. On this case, we are displace a text “No store found.“ on this screen and the map is empty, but user can still set their location manually by clicking on Set My Location button.
# We have the filter for Business Category already so do we need the feature that allow user search Business Category?
# I assume that the search action will be perform when user click on OK/search button on the keyboard
# *“I can scroll down to load more businesses based on their konnect zone’s locations to be showed from near to far.”* You can load more item by scrolling down the maximum distance from the location of any item on this list to the user location is *10 miles.* Just want to make sure that we are in the same page on that.
# On online tab, if we have gift cards that have the same discount, the same brand, then we should sort them by another field. I suggest “Created date” for that;[~accountid:557058:13dd41e5-7d7a-45c5-8059-243206cbb843] See my response for your questions.

# Agree
# I think searching with category is convenient for customers, so let add it if there is any issue about technical or it has much effort to do.
# Correct as this is the current behavior of the app. For the web, the search function should be triggered when user presses Enter. I think VisiKard wants to trigger the searching after customers enter some characters but this behavior can impact the performance even it is better. Please consider the second option.
# Correct.
# Order by Created Date from newest to oldest please.;Resolved in build 1.0.6.5_Staging

column3: [Android] - MasterCard -  Change UI of Change PIN screen

Separate into two screens:

* Enter New PIN

** Button: \[Continue].
* Confirm New PIN
** Show 4 numeric boxes to enter Confirm New PIN.
** Button: \[Change].
