column3: Web Apps - Konnection
column4:
As a customer, I want to connect other customer users or merchants and add each customer or merchant which I had connected to each connection group.

+*AC:*+

On Home page, user can see a Connections button. When I click at that one, it shows Your Connections page.

* On Your Connections page:
** The page title: Your Connections
** The default connection group: All Kard (All GreenCom), Co-workers, Family, Friends, Favorites.
** If user has not connected any user / merchant, the default image of group is used as same as All Kard group (Kard loading).
** When user click at any connection group, it shows the page of that connection group, they can see all connections I had chosen and added to this group.
* On the page of connection group:
** The group name displayed at the top.
** The list of connections are shown below (avatar/merchant logo and customer name or business name).
** In a group, user detail pop-up (containing chat and send icons) is opened on clicking at user’s avatar. Store detail page is opened on clicking at merchant’s logo image.
** There are buttons “Edit group” and “Remove this group”.
*** When I click at Edit Group button:
**** Remove icon appears on each connection, if user click that icon, that connection will be removed.
**** Edit icon appears next to group name, if user click that icon, Edit Group Name pop-up is displayed, user can enter a new name and click Done button to save.
**** There are two buttons: Done and Add Member.
***** Add Member: user click that to open the list of connections pop-up, on this pop-up, user can see the connections which they had added but not existing in the group, each line of list will have a checkbox, which allows user to add multiple connections to the current group, below the list is OK button, on clicking that the pop-up will be closed, user can see the new connection(s) added at the bottom of the list.
***** Done: user click that to return View mode.
*** When I click at “Remove this group” text, a confirmation pop-up shown up and says “Are you sure you want to remove this group?“ and two buttons Remove, Cancel and a close button at the corner (x).

||*Button*||*Action*||
|Remove|Remove the group, redirect to Your Connections page.
User cannot see that group on Your Connection page any more.|
|Cancel|Close the confirmation pop-up, no action performed.|
|Close button (x)|Close the confirmation pop-up.|

*_Validation rules:_* 

* Edit group: 
** If the connections are removed from a group, they can be stored in the other groups (at least in the default group All Kard). 
** The name of default group (All Kard) is not allowed to edit, user can only edit the name of other groups. 
* Remove group: The default group (All Kard) is not allowed to remove, user can only remove the other groups except that one.

There’s a button “Add new group” so that user can actively add a new group to Your Connections page. When I click at Add New Group button, Add New Group pop-up. User can enter new group name then save by clicking Save button. A new group is added next to Add new group button (on the left side).

column3: VisiPay Admin - Credit Cards
column4:
As a VisiPay Admin, I want to view all Credit Card information at “Credit Cards” feature by click on “Card Number”, then I can:

* Filter by category.
* Date range: From date / To date.

As a result, I can view all the transactions associated with that credit card number.

column3: Consumer - Verification Credit Card
column4:
As a user, I need to verify my Credit Card by inputting the verification code (4 digits) OR the amount (temporary charge) which are sent to me by my issuance credit card:

* Verification Code (4 digits):

!Verification Code.png|width=1280,height=625!



* Amount (temporary charge):

!Amount.png|width=1280,height=625!

* Once input the correct verification code or amount, the success message is shown as below.  The result: my credit card is added to my wallet and ready to use.

!Success verification.png|width=1893,height=189!



Note:

* *Development (Dev/Staging/Sandbox/Demo) environment:* in the development environment,  the verification code or amount can be obtained through the following endpoint:

GET /v2/credit-card-resources/:id/sandbox

\{   "data": \{     "type: "credit-card-resources",     "id": "CREDIT_CARD_RESOURCE_ID",

{noformat}"attributes": {       "descriptor": "VERIFICATION_CODE"     }   } } {noformat}

In addition, for +User Acceptance testing convenience (QC/PO/Customer)+, that verification code or amount are needed to be received *easiest*, without running API by Postman. For instance, the verification code is 1111, and the amount is 1.00 as always in the development environment.  If else, *kindly suggest (contact point: PO)*.



* *PRODUCTION environment:* In production, the customer would check their billing statement to get this code.  This is a sample billing statement which is sent by the issuance credit card has included the verification code (3482) and amount (temporary charge of $1.06):

!image-20200715-064550.png|width=288,height=454!

column3: Visikard Admin - Gift Card Report - Gift Card Listing
column4:
As a VisiKard Admin, I want to have a report of all gift cards purchased by customer when accessing VisiKard Admin portal.

* I want to access Gift Card Report menu to open the report page.
* I can see 2 tabs on this page.
** Gift Card Listing
** Gift Card Revenue Report
* Gift Card Listing
** Search and filter criteria.
*** Filter by gift card type: “In-Store” or “Incomm”.
*** Filter by Order Date in date range.
** When I fill in all the above information, I can view the list of gift cards as a table.
*** Gift Card Number
*** Image
*** Customer → First Name + Last Name of customer who purchased gift card.
*** Order Date → the date when the gift card has been purchased.
*** Brand → This is business name of merchant who issue the gift card.
*** Price → the price that customer purchase for the gift card.
*** Amount → value of gift card that can be redeemed.
** I can export the list of gift cards to CSV.
* Gift Card Revenue Report
** Filter criteria
*** Month and Year
**** Default value is the current month of the current year.
**** I can select “All” option from Month drop-down list to view the report for a selected year.
**** Values of year must not be greater than the current year.
*** Gift Card Type: In-store, Incomm, All
**** All is default value
** Review Chart
*** Month and Year are selected
**** Chart
***** Display total amount of gift cards that are sold in the system for each day of the selected month. 
**** The detail listing for each date
***** Number of Transactions
***** Revenue (total gift card amount - total discount)
***** Commission
**** Have a summary at the end of the detail listing.
*** Only Year is selected
**** The same as above report but it show for each month instead of each day.
*** I can export this report to PDF.

column4:

* I enter my email address the pre-login screen.
* My tenant will be “System”.
* If my email is registered as VisiKard admin only, I will see “System” for tenant on the next screen of entering password without requiring to select a tenant.
* If my email is registered as multiple tenant including System and other tenants, I can see System in the top of tenant list for me to select the one that I want to sign in.

column3: API - Update Flow of Buying A Gift Card
column4:
As I customer I want to be able to make order to purchase a gift card with a better UI and less steps than the current flow.

# Select a gift card
## I can enter amount to buy for a  gift card it has min-max value.
## Otherwise I must buy with the fixed value.
## I can see term and condition of the current gift card on this screen.
# I can select the option to add into my wallet or send to friend.
# I can select a card from my wallet to pay for ordering the current gift card.
## I am notified that “You need to get KYC verified” if I select kash kard to pay for the current order.
# I expect to be asked for confirmation for the current order with the message “Confirm to purchase gift card \[Name] for $\[Amount]?”.
# -If I confirm, the order will be processed. Otherwise, I am pending a the current step.-
# -After the order of buying a gift card is processed successfully.-  (We have another story to handle this requirement)
## -If the order is failed, I expected to receive an error for the failing reason.-
## -If the order is success, I can see the detail of gift card on a new screen.-
### -Card Image-
### -Value-
### -Barcode-
#### -For in-store gift card, let show barcode of the current flow in order customers to scan this to the merchant at store.-
#### -For Incomm gift card, let show barcode or QR code if having.-
### -GC number-
### -PIN: this is empty for in-store gift card and might be empty for some Incomm stores-

column3: ARM Merchant - Kard - Business Kard - Update with new template
column4:
As I merchant I want to be able to edit business kard with new templates that I see in registration flow.

* I can reset logo to the default logo. Default logo is created using the first letters of Business Name.
* I can reset kard image to the default one so that it does not break any places that are required to have Kard Image to show. Let generate a default kard image although it is not showed on new template of business kard without Kard Image.
* QR Code on business kard will show contact information of the merchant on the mobile/web app when it is scanned from the consumer web/apps.
* UI: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3c41dd4a-4aaf-4408-a718-ba2c3ced4483-6912/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3c41dd4a-4aaf-4408-a718-ba2c3ced4483-6912/]

column3: ARM Merchant - Manage Bank Account List
column4:
As a merchant admin I want to be able to manage view and manage my bank accounts to withdraw money from my kash kard.

* I access the list of bank account from navigation Account → Payment Method → Bank Account tab.
* I can see the list of columns of the bank account list as below.
** Bank Name
** Bank Account Number
** Bank Routing Number
** Account Holder Type
** Account Type
** Status (Active, Inactive)
* I want to see all bank accounts to be showed without paging or searching because the list should not be long.
* I want to be able to delete (permanently) a bank account if it does not have any transaction.
* I want to be able to disable a bank account from the list so that it will be not showed on withdraw screen but there is no impact to the transaction history related to a disable bank account. Disable bank account will have Inactive status.
* I will disable the existing one and add new one if my bank account is changed, so there is no need to have EDIT function.

column3: Visipay - Fail-over for E-commerce Credit Card Payment
column4:
As a Visipay admin I want to be able to configure credit card payment channel to support multiple MIDs to handle below features.

* Setup payment gateways and payment channels - this feature is available already.
** Setup different payment gateways for different MID accounts → one payment gateway is configured with with MID account.
** Setup different payment channels for one tenant with different payment gateways of [Authorize.net|http://Authorize.net]/QuickCard by identifying the priority.
* Handle fail-over of multiple payment gateways for credit card process. 
** Whenever there is any issue with the first channel that causes the transaction failed, the system must send credit card transaction to the next channel based on the priority automatically instead of stopping the transaction and inform the customer about the error.

column3: ARM Merchant - Konnect Category of Konnect Zones
column4:
As a merchant I want to be able to add new Konnect Category “Konnect Zones” to setup a list of active konnect zones of my business or other businesses under the current community platform (tenant).

+*AC:*+

* Access Konnect Category from the left menu and create a new konnect zone
* Select new item “Konnect Zones“ in the list of Link Assets
* I want to have two list named Selected Konnect Zones and All Konnect Zones. For the all konnect zones list, I can see the list of other active konnect zones of my business and default konnect zone of other businesses under my platform (HYT/Kard/GreenCom/KingdomPay), for each one I can see the konnect zone name as well as the business name.
* On each list, I can search konnect zone by business name or konnect zone name. Placeholder text: “*_Search konnect zone_*“. I can add one by one or all konnect zones from the all konnect zones list to the selected list.
* I select SAVE button to create new category.
* I will not be able to add the current default KZ of this merchant to this KZ category
* If someone has updated the any KZ to be default, let check to see if this KZ is associated with any KZ category in this merchant and remove it
* If someone has deleted the KZ which is associate with any KZ category. We should remove it in the KZ category too. 
* If master admin remove the merchant from tenant, all KZ of this merchant will be removed from the KZ category.

!Konnect Zones - 333.jpg|width=1920,height=1080!

column3: HYT - Add rewarded coin into the existing ZVC card
column4:
As an HYT user,  I will earn 1000 ZVC (Internal ZVC Digital Wallet Card) immediately as a reward after I bought the HYT GoldZ package:
1) Scenario 1: I don't have any ZVC Digital card in my wallet, then the system will create a new ZVC card and fund 1000 ZVC to it.
2) Scenario 2: I already have one or several ZVC Digital cards in my wallet:
    + Scenario 2.1: only a ZVC Card: then the system will fund to that ZVC card 1000 ZVC.
    + Scenarios 2.2: Multiple ZVC Cards: then the system will fund the first ZVC Card 1000 ZVC.

column3: Payment procedure for Zeven coin
column4:
As a logged-in user:
1) Choose an HYT Product "Silver/Gold/Metal/Hytapper" to proceed checkout procedure with Zeven coin.
2) Select the Zeven coin tab, at "User ZVC in my HYT Wallet | Available" to choose the Zeven coin card (Internal Crypto card):
    a. API to get invoice information for Zeven coin.
    b. Integrate with crypto server.
    c. Update and store invoice information.
3) There is a transaction that has been processing has recorded at the Transactions tab.

column3: ARM Merchant - Localization - Select Language
column4:
As a merchant user I want to be able to select a language from the list of languages (English and Spanish) supported by the platform to use ARM site with the selected language.

* I can select my language at any page of ARM.
* The current page is reloaded with the selected language after selecting a language.
* The selected language is also saved for my merchant to view other pages after that.
* If don’t select any language for my account, I expect the app will loaded with the language based on my browser’s setting of language.
* Support US and Spain in this scope.


Update for existing users using languages that are not US or Spanish: the default language is US when coming back to system.

column3: ARM Merchant - Localization - Edit Resource Files at runtime with https://poeditor.com
column4:
As a Visikard staff I want to be able to edit resources (static content, messages, alerts) of all screens of any language.

* I will be invited to join [https://poeditor.com|https://poeditor.com/] as a contributer.
* I can select a language to see and update any string.
* I will release my update from [https://poeditor.com|https://poeditor.com/] to ARM merchants through below ways.
** Daily background job - please recheck to see if we can reuse the same daily job used for HYT web.
** Click on a button on ARM Master to get new resources.
* I expect that the system will not have any issue if it cannot get resource files from the editor and continue using the local resource files and I can edit those resource files manually without using a editor tool if I must stop using POeditor for any reason or that server is suspend due to their problem.

column3: BHT Tenant Admin - Links - Thumbnail-uploading rules

** “File must be less than 10MB“: when admin uploads a thumbnail whose size is greater than 10MB, display the validation message “The uploaded file is exceeding the maximum file size (10MB)“
** “Allowed file types: .JPG, .GIF, .BMP, or .PNG”: when admins uploads a thumbnail whose file type is not one of allowed ones, display the validation message “The uploaded file is not an allowed file type“

column3: BHT Tenant Admin - Settings - Banner ad
column4:
As a BHT Tenant Admin, I should the ability to configure banner to dipslay advertisement on the top of BHT site. Bringing users a banner of crucial or special meetings is an effective method to help them to not miss any meetings or sale campaigns

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* There is a new tab called “Banner“ positioned next to “Experts“ tab
* Accessing “Banner“ tab sees the list of adversiethat will be displayed in Home page of user site

+_Advertisement creation_+

* I see following things
** “Event“: This an auto-suggest field. It lists out names of all active upcoming and past events from Events page. This list is sorted via alphabetical order
** “Host”: Fetch correctly data of selected event. This is a disabled field and displays host of selected event. If selected event does not have a host, do not display this field. For the first time using this feature, if there is no records in database, display nothing in this field.
** “Speakers“: Fetch correctly data of selected event. This is a disabled field and displays speakers of selected event. If selected event does not have any speakers, do not display this field. For the first time using this feature, if there is no records in database, display nothing in this field.
** “Start Time“: Fetch correctly data of selected event. This is a disabled field and displays start time of selected event. For the first time using this feature, if there is no records in database, display nothing in this field.
** “End Time“: Fetch correctly data of selected event. This is a disabled field and displays end time of selected event. For the first time using this feature, if there is no records in database, display nothing in this field. 
** “Content”
*** This is the content area where admin has to enter content of advertisement. 
*** Use ckeditor as we are using for “Experts“ feature to enter text. I should have the ability to make the text bold, italic as normal. Also, add a new option to change the text color (colorpicker)
** “Save“ button
*** Clicking on this saves the creation then is back to the list of advertisement
*** If admin does not select an event, display the validation text
*** If amins does not enter content, display validation message “Advertisement content is required“
*** After saving creation successfully, display the message “Successful to save advertisement“ and “OK button“. If clicking on “OK button“, the modal is gone.
** “Cancel“ button: clicking on this cancels the creation

+_Advertisement editing_+

* I can edit banner by entering new data then save as normal.
* Banner in BHT user site applies the latest change from admin configuration 


Mockup:
[https://xd.adobe.com/view/bd75e3f7-0e60-40dc-b920-ebe3b23f2b0b-e826/screen/d02754d0-e322-418b-99e6-83900d32be67/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/bd75e3f7-0e60-40dc-b920-ebe3b23f2b0b-e826/screen/d02754d0-e322-418b-99e6-83900d32be67/|smart-link] 
Use the type of modal below to notify the completion of creating advertisement

!image-20210323-110328.png|width=100%!

column3: BHT Web App - Banner
column4:
As a BHT user or guest accessing Home page, I’m able to see banner displaying crucial meetings or big sale campaign. This is for advertising purpose so that it will make BHT site more attractive in users' view.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Banner is positioned below the navigation bar
* Banner displays infomation of crucial or special upcoming events. 
* Content of banner is configured by BHT Tenant Admin. An event displayed in banner includes following things:
** Meeting date 
*** This is always aligned center
*** Display exactly the start time of the event configured by admin
*** The start time is converted into PST and EST format. The date is converted into EST
** Content: 
*** This is always aligned center
*** The content here is configured by admin, including color, style, font-size 
* If I click on the banner, it opens the modal to be ready to watch the event. The modal is the same with that in Schedule page, including:
** Thumbnail
*** When the event has not been started, display the thumbnail.
*** When the event is being happened, user can watch it as normal.
*** When the event is ended, display the thumbnail.
** Meeting (Event) name
** Host
** Speaker
** Start Time
** Status: this includes only LIVE
** “Close“ button:
*** Clicking on this closes the modal
*** User’s able to view modal again when clicking on banner
* If that event has been disabled while the notification is still being displayed, clicking on that notification displays the message “This event has been disabled by admin“

Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3c65e3a0-26b1-451a-b23f-e92abfbd4962-6936/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3c65e3a0-26b1-451a-b23f-e92abfbd4962-6936/|smart-link]

column3: BHT Tenant Admin - Create Events - Upload thumbnails
column4:
As a BHT tenant admin, I should have the ability to create events (meetings) that have thumbnails. The purpose is to give users a general look of events.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Add a new field to upload thumbnails when creating an event. This field is the same as when editing a past event.
* There are changes in rules for uploading thumbnail
** Remove “This banner should be 929x404px“ text next to Upload button
** Display and apply new rules
*** “Recommend resolution is 1280x720 (with minimum width of 640 pixels)“: when admin uploads a thumbnail whose width is less than 640 pixels, display the validation message “The uploaded file is being less then 640 pixels in width “
*** “File must be less than 10MB“: when admin uploads a thumbnail whose size is greater than 10MB, display the validation message “The uploaded file is exceeding the maximum file size (10MB)“
*** “Allowed file types: .JPG, .JPEG, .GIF, .BMP, or .PNG”: when admins uploads a thumbnail whose file type is not one of allowed ones, display the validation message “The uploaded file is not an allowed file type“
* Apply the changes above for editing upcoming and past events also
* We will no longer use the random thumbnail selection form JWPlayer

column3: BHT Web App - Schedule - View event details
column4:
As a BHT user or guest accessing Schedule page, I should the ability to view details information of events. Users can keep tracks information of events that they have interacted with

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* After accessing Schedule page, clicking on event names and camera icons displays a modal

+_Past Events_+

* When clicking on event names, display the modal including following things
** Thumbnail
** Name
** Host: if there is no hosts configured, do not display this field
** Speaker: if there is no speakers configured, do not display this field
** Time: this is Start Time (not converting into EST/PST time)
** “x“ button: clicking on this closes the modal

+_Today Events_+

* When clicking on event names or camera icons, display the modal including following things
** Thumbnail
** Name
** Host: if there is no hosts configured, do not display this field
** Speaker: if there is no speakers configured, do not display this field
** Time: this is Start Time (not converting into EST/PST time)
** Status: display LIVE with events that are being live on that day. The status is display next to name
** “x“ button: clicking on this closes the modal

+_Upcoming Events_+

* In the modal display following things
** Thumbnail
** Name
** Host: if there is no hosts configured, do not display this field
** Speaker: if there is no speakers configured, do not display this field
** Time: this is Start Time (not converting into EST/PST time)
** “x“ button: clicking on this closes the modal

Mockup:

[https://xd.adobe.com/view/3c65e3a0-26b1-451a-b23f-e92abfbd4962-6936/screen/c8848a63-664b-4d09-978e-e9d6a3d6c91f/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3c65e3a0-26b1-451a-b23f-e92abfbd4962-6936/screen/c8848a63-664b-4d09-978e-e9d6a3d6c91f/|smart-link]

column3: BHT Web App - Resources - Add drop-down menu
column4:
As a BHT user or guest, I should see Resources expanding a drop-down menu including options related to Links, Special Links and Articles

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* When selecting Resources tab, it expands a drop-down menu including following options
** Articles: selecting goes to Articles page as normal
** Links: selecting goes to Links page as normal
** Second Opinion Experts: selecting opens URL [https://biometrics.secondopinionexpert.com|https://biometrics.secondopinionexpert.com] in a new tab

column3: HYT Web App - Improve Video and Agreement pop-up display
column4:
*Acceptance Criteria:*
After a user logs in for the first time, we do not show the video and affiliate agreement by default. We wait until they make a *successful package purchase*.

* The user should not be able to do anything on the site until they make a *successful package purchase*. Let’s highlight the content of Product page and disable other items in the left menu
* If they select any of the affiliate packages (including HYTAPPER, HYT ZEVEN FOR EARTH, HYTAPPER BUSINESS) - they must view the video and accept the agreement
* If they select any of the other packages, they must accept the appropriate agreement
* Rules above are only applied for the first successful purchase, if I upgrade package on the next times, there is no thign displayed when clicking on “Upgrade Plan“

column3: Request a Phone Call for OTP
column4:
Currently, our system will send OTP via SMS when there's a new registered Merchant, forgot password, send money...etc. This caused an issue when Merchant using a landline phone which cannot receive sms. Even on mobile phones, there're cases the service provider turn off sms.

Solution: We build a function so that Merchant can get their OTP via Phone Call.

Scope: ARM Merchant Registration, ARM Merchant Change Phone Number

*AC1:*

1. Allow Merchant to use landline phone number

2. When Merchant provides a phone number. We have dropdown options for verify the phone number on the same screen, allow Merchant to choose: “Send OTP via SMS” or “Get OTP via Phone call”.

3. If Merchant chooses “Send OTP via SMS” but using a landline. We should warning:

3.1. When change phone number: “Unable to send OTP via SMS to your new phone number. Please make sure your new number is a valid mobile phone number and try again.“

3.2. Other cases: “Unable to send OTP via SMS to your phone number. Please make sure your number is a valid mobile phone number and try again.“

4. When Merchant chooses the Phone Call option, our system will make a phone call to Merchant automatically with a pre-defined message: "This is Kanoo calling with your verification code. Your verification code is \[OTP code]. Again, your verification code is \[OTP code]. Thank you.

5. Merchant confirms OTP.



Phone calls will cost a lot of money. We will need to prevent Merchant from repeatedly use this feature.

*AC2:*

Configure a rule for admin say: Maximum Phone calls request per day e.g 10 times / day

When the Merchant has reached limitation, we don’t make anymore phone call but warning the Merchant: “You seem to have trouble getting and verifying your OTP. Please contact customer service for support.“

column3: BHT Tenant Admin - Speaker - Rank
column4:
As a BHT admin, I should have the ability to edit the order of speakers displayed in Our Doctor page

*Acceptance criteria:*

* There are two ways to give speakers a rank. 


+_Speaker list_+

* There is a new column added in Speaker page. It is called Rank.
* I can input a number from 1 to 100 directly in each speaker row.
** For example, the speaker A has rank 2, the speaker B has rank 5 so that speaker A will be displayed first  in the carousel then speaker B.
** If two different speakers have the same rank, they will be sorted based on the alphabetical order.
* The default rank of all users is 100.


+_Speaker Edit Detail page_+

* There is also a new field Rank in Speaker Edit page.
* I can input a number from 1 to 100 to give that speaker a rank then save the change.
* Ensure the rank numbers of a speaker in +_Speaker Edit Detail page_+ and +_Speaker list_+  are equal.

column3: BHT Tenant Admin - Our doctors - Featured doctors management
column4:
As a tenant admin, I should have the ability to manage featured doctors display.

*Acceptance Criteria* 

* Add a new tab called Our Doctor positioned below Articles.

* There is a fieldset displayed as default
** One fieldset is equivalent to one featured doctor.
** In each fieldset, there are following things:
*** Doctor name: this is fixed field as default
*** Doctor images: this is fixed field as default. I should have the ability to upload one image of that doctor.
*** A default heading field and its value field. This can not be deleted.
*** Add heading button
**** Clicking on this add a new heading field and its value field. For example, I add a new heading named Education and enter its value is Graduated Cambridge University.
**** I can add many headings.
*** Delete heading buttons
**** Each heading field has this button.
**** Clicking on this button deletes the heading field and its value fields instantly.
* There is a button called Add Doctor at the top-right corner
** Clicking on the button adds new fieldset

** Email is a text field.
* There are two types of speaker for creation, BHT speakers and Outside speakers
** BHT speakers: This type is created based on existing users. When entering email of an existing BHT user then clicking on OK, it should display following information of that user, including:
*** First Name, Last Name, Email (fetch the correct data of that BHT user)
*** Specialist
**** If users has entered Specialist at the registration form, fetch the correct data. Otherwise, user should be able to enter specialist.
**** This is a required and text field.
**** Specialist defined here will be displayed in Our doctor page
***  Upload Avatar
**** This is a non-required field.
**** Speaker avatar is not related to user avatar.
** Outside speakers: This type is created without BHT system relation. When entering email NOT belonging to BHT then clicking on OK, it should display following fields to enter:
*** First Name 
*** Last Name
*** Email (show the entered email again)
*** Phone Number
**** This is non-required field. The same behavior as Email field
*** Specialist
**** This is a required and text field.
**** Specialist defined here is displayed in Our doctor page.
***  Upload Avatar
**** This is a non-required field.
**** Speaker avatar is not related to user avatar.
* While entering an email, there are some cases below need displaying validation
** “This speaker already exists“: when entering an email that has been used.
** “Please enter valid email address”: when entering an incorrect format email.
** When entering nothing, disable Next button.


+_Speaker editing_+

* Basic actions such as Edit, Disable/Enable, and Delete are included in three-dot icon as other pages.
* Edit speakers:
** Display correctly entered information.
* Disable/Enable speakers:
** Display a modal including a question: Are you sure to disable/enable this speakers? <speaker name>.
** When a speaker is disabled, 
*** Technically it is not displayed in the list of speakers in Our Doctor page.
*** It is not displayed within related events.
** When a speaker is enabled
*** If that speaker has been related to an event, just display it in each event again.
*** Display that speaker in the list of speakers in Our Doctor page.

* Delete speakers:
** Display a modal including a question: Are you sure to delete this speaker? <speaker name>.
** When a speaker is deleted
*** It is removed from the list of speakers in Out Doctor page.
*** It is removed from related events.

+_Speaker seaching_+

* Search speakers based on Name and Email


Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/ae5d49b5-485d-46ab-9f34-f4ceeaec9892/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/ae5d49b5-485d-46ab-9f34-f4ceeaec9892/|smart-link]

column3: BHT Web - Our Doctors - Connect with speakers
column4:
As a BHT user, I should have the ability to view the details of speakers. Basic information should be displayed to available to contact speakers instantly.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

+_As a logged user_+

* When selecting  a speaker belonging to BHT user in Our doctor page, display a modal being the same with that when connecting a BHT user, including:
** Profile image: this is user avatar, not speaker avatar
** Name
** Connect button
*** Clicking on Connect button works as the current behavior when connecting a BHT user.
* When selecting a speaker NOT belonging to BHT user (called it Outside speakers) in Our doctor page, display a modal including:
** Profile image: This is speaker avatar. 
** Name

+_As a guest_+

* When selecting  a speaker belonging to BHT user in Our doctor page, display a modal being the same with that when connecting a BHT user, including:
** Profile image: this is user avatar
** Name

* When selecting a speaker NOT belonging to BHT user (called it Outside speakers) in Our doctor page, display a modal including:
** Profile image: This is speaker avatar. 
** Name

column4:
As a BHT user, I should havethe ability to view all speakers mentioned in BHT system.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

+_The order of speakers displayed_+

* Speakers are ordered by ranks. Who having the higher rank are displayed first then others.
* If two speakers have the same rank, the priority is based on alphabetical order.


+_View all speakers_+

* Move View more button below the speaker carousel
* When clicking View more button, all speakers (including both outside and BHT speakers) are displayed.
* It displays all speakers without pagination.
* When all speakers are displayed, there is a button called View less
** Clicking on this is back to the default.
* Ensure all profile images of speakers are converted to black-white.

column3: BHT Tenant Admin - Articles management
column4:
As a tenant admin I should have the ability to manage articles. My work includes articles creation, editing, deleting. This is a new feature to make BHT content more attractive.

*Acceptance criteria:*

* Add a new tab called Articles to the left panel (below Events).
* Selecting on the tab leads to Article page, including article names, authors, description.
* Articles are ordered from the latest to oldest created ones as default.

+_Article creation_+

* There is a button called New Article.
* Clicking New Article button leads to page includes the following things:
** Article name
** Author
** Upload button
*** Allow uploading only PDF format.
*** No limit on PDF size.
*** After uploading PDF, display the cover as a preview image.
** Description
** Create button
** Cancel button
** All fields are required.

+_Arcticle editing_+

* Basic actions such as Edit, Disable/Enable, and Delete are included in three-dot icon as other pages.
* Edit articles:
** Display correctly entered information.
* Disable/Enable article:
** Display a modal including a question: Are you sure to disable/enable this article? <article name>.
** When an article is disabled, technically it is not displayed anywhere.
* Delete article:
** Display a modal including a question: Are you sure to delete this article? <article name>.
** When an article is deleted, technically it is removed from anyplaces.

+_Article searching_+

* Search articles based on names, authors, descriptions.


Mock-up: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/d37b38bd-757b-4805-bce0-6f3ee0243cd1/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/5b7760cb-77d6-4832-9633-a71854fb2d8d-0e24/screen/d37b38bd-757b-4805-bce0-6f3ee0243cd1/|smart-link]

column3: BHT Web - Articles
column4:
As a user attempting to explore BHT content I want to have the ability to see articles managed by tenant admin and download them directly. 

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Add a new tab called ARTICLE on main nav-bar. This is always available for both guests and logged users to access.

+_Article page_+

* Articles uploaded by BHT tenant amdin are displayed here.
* An article display includes:
** Title
** Author
** Publish date
** Cover image
** File type
** Size
** Download button
*** Clicking on the button downloads PDF instantly.
*** Guests are not allowed to download PDFs. When a guest click on Download button, display the login pop-up as a requirement.
* Clicking on aticle names or preview images navigates to article details page.
* Put articles in latest-to-oldest published date order as default.
* Display message "No articles found” in case there is no articles published.
* There is no pagination.

+_Search articles_+

* Search items based on article names and authors.
* Display message "No articles found”, in case there is no articles found.

+_Article details page_+

* Display the following information:
** Title
** Author
** Publish date
** Cover image with larger dimensions
** File type
** Size
** Download button
*** Clicking on the button downloads PDF instantly.
*** Guests are not allowed to download PDFs. When a guest click on Download button, display the login pop-up as a requirement.


Mock-up: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/ae3020ad-49b7-495b-af52-8d6b27b9ae7b-fb63/screen/cdc79c4c-e24e-42b1-8624-31bb99e68209/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/ae3020ad-49b7-495b-af52-8d6b27b9ae7b-fb63/screen/cdc79c4c-e24e-42b1-8624-31bb99e68209/|smart-link]

column3: ARM Master/Merchant & Visipay - Transactions - Fix Performance Issue
column4:
Currently, the system is down due to a memory leak if Admin tries to export transactions to CSV if it has a large of records. Please use the Staging environment to verify this case and implement the fix.

Please also show a progress dialog and disable the Export button when the current exporting request is being processed because it does not show anything for the processing and it causes users to confused.
column30:
[~accountid:5c6e23a18a38a065324b683b] 

Please also fix the timeout issue of Dashboard when it tries to get the report for the current year.;[~accountid:5e783beb2e3fce0c33c3e9f4] Please test export transaction in Transaction and Transaction Detail of Cash Card. The timeout issue of Dashboard is in progress;Solution to improve performance:

* Transactions & Transactions Detail: replace solution get raw content with download file with streaming response technology to prevent out of memory issue. With this approach the response will be send each package to client then release the memory of server immediately until the progress is completed,
* Dashboard: Root cause is client call the API get data in visipay then visipay call reporting service to get data so just need update the client call direct to reporting to prevent delay via network and reduce the time when calling between those services. Beside that, I removed some unused data to improve the performance (fee chart is not available on current version).

CC: c [~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] , a [~accountid:557058:4c602b42-35ce-411c-b900-8ebe293945b4] , a [~accountid:557058:a2d26b97-07cd-4a63-951d-795f3b39eac1] .;[~accountid:557058:4c602b42-35ce-411c-b900-8ebe293945b4] [~accountid:5e783beb2e3fce0c33c3e9f4] I assume this is released to production already, correct? Can I close this ticket?

column3: [Web] Tenant Admin - Create/Edit/delete Events for BHT community
column4:
Admin should able to schedule any events related to BHT. This can be recurring or meetings requested by the users.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* I should able to enter the topic of the discussion.
** This is required.
** Free text.
* I should able to set the meeting date and time (start) → this is required.
** Meeting Date
** Start/End Time
** Meeting date/time can not be in the past.
* I should be able to choose the timezone for my meeting.
* I should be able to enter the information of the person who hosts the events as a free text box.
* I should be able to fill in the conference URL that I set up for this event in Zoom.
** This is required.
* I should be able to fill in URL of the recording video of the event after it is done into the event so that it can be shown in the Archive screen for users to see past events.
** This is optional.
** If Admin enters an URL that is not from youtube, the system needs to ask Admin to upload an event thumbnail to show on the Archive screen.
** This field is active for Admin when the event is in the past. Other fields can be modified before the event happens.
* Send email for new and modified events to all existing BHT users.


{color:#ff5630}*\[AC update]*{color}

* The default order is created date of events

* Upcoming Events tab: include events on current and future days. Events that have NOT passed their End Times are displayed here.
* Past Events tab: include events in the past, meaning events that have passed their End Times are displayed here.

*_Event creation_*

* There are totally 5 fields when creating an event
** Event Name
** Hosted By
** Start Time
** End Time
** Description

* A latest event created is always displayed on the top of Upcoming Events tab.

*_Event editing_*

* In terms of Upcoming events, until the event is done (moving to Past Event tab), I can edit all fields
* In terms of Past events, when editing them,
** There is a field called Record to display recorded video of streaming
** When the video has not been fetched, there is a small message “Processing“.
** When the video is fetched succcessfully, display the default thumbnail of that video and duration. 
** I only have the ability to update the thumbnail. Other fields can not be edited.
column30:
Confirmation on this story:

!image-20201225-035720.png|width=100%!

* We should remove Time Zone field because technically, it is too hard for a normal admin to understand how Time Zone is meaningful. This leads to a complex time setting while creating or editing events.
* When creating a new event, 
** “Record URL” field should be disabled because before the video (or streaming) starts, there is no video links generated so that this field is only enabled when Admin edits the event. At that moment, JW player has generated a specific link for video.
* “Host field” is defined as a non-required field. I think every streaming should require a specific host?
* We have two email templates for notifying events creation and events changes
** Email subject of events creation: “*Get Ready For A New Event\!*“
** Email subject of events changes: “*What’s New At \[Event Previous Event Name]*“ in case I make some changes such as Start time, Event Name,.. etc
* Those emails are only sent to *active* BHT user

Thanks all

CC: [~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] [~accountid:557058:a2d26b97-07cd-4a63-951d-795f3b39eac1] [~accountid:557058:27d8b1c9-b5a9-4bcc-a002-d9834fc57e78] [~accountid:5c6e23a18a38a065324b683b] [~accountid:5f4dbaf3333edb00432f009e];[~accountid:557058:3c9d0205-242e-4af3-be20-9293b7a3ba27] 

For Time Zone: agree to remove it

For the Record URL: ok

For Host field: ok

For the email: [~accountid:5caacdb1055f3f7a1824b0dc] please check with [~accountid:5f4dbaf3333edb00432f009e] about the content and subject;I have updated AC to keep track of what we have handled until now

column3: [Backend] -  BHT Web - Donate transaction on tenant admin page
column4:
As a user, I want to be able to donate for BHT with the below options.

* Donate using a credit card as a guest user.
* Donate using money in my Kard wallet.
** I need to have Kard account and sign in to select a card in my wallet to donate.
* Transaction
** New transaction in Category “Cause2Fund” is recorded to ARM, Visipay, and Tenant Admin.
** New transaction is showed to Kard web/app for users who donate with their kard wallet.
** Default merchant of BHT tenant receives donate money.

*Note*: update Pay with Kard widget to have the above options.
column30: This tenant don’t use kash kard to donate, so new transaction don’t show to Kard web/app for users;Verified

column3: BHT Web - Donate
column4:
As a user, I want to be able to donate for BHT with the below options.

* Donate using a credit card as a guest user.
* Donate using money in my Kard wallet.
** I need to have Kard account and sign in to select a card in my wallet to donate.
* Transaction
** New transaction in Category “Cause2Fund” is recorded to ARM, Visipay, and Tenant Admin.
** New transaction is showed to Kard web/app for users who donate with their kard wallet.
** Default merchant of BHT tenant receives donate money.

*Note*: update Pay with Kard widget to have the above options.
column30:
Scope:

# Update Pay with Kard widget:
## Add CC payment section to allow guest make payment without login
## Custom transaction type, if user use Pay with Kard widget on BHT for donation, the transaction “Cause2Fund“ will be created instead of “External payment“
# Return the new transaction type “BHT funding“ in:
## Visipay
## ARM (Admin and Merchant view)
## Tenant Admin
### Admin of Kard will be able to see the transactions that made by Pay with Kard widget (login mode)
### BHT admin will be able to see the transactions that made by Pay with Kard widget in both login and guest mode
## Consumer app and web of Kard: If Kard user donate to BHT with Pay with Kard  widget, this transaction will be shown on user’s transaction list on Kard app / web.
# Process the donation request.
## If user donate with CC in guest mode:
### Create transaction “Cause2Fund“ with BHT tenant
## If user donate with login mode:
### Create transaction “Cause2Fund“ with Kard tenant
## Money will be transfer to the Default merchant of BHT tenant
## Errors and refund:
### Reuse the current flow of Pay with Card widget

column3: ARM Merchant - Password enhancement
column4:
1.Add one more field Confirm Password.

column3: Mobile Apps - Force user to upgrade new version
column4:
User should be forced to upgrade a new version of the app.

+*AC:*+

* Information on the pop-up:
** Title: Update Version
** Content: “_Version_ *\[Version]* _of_ *\[App Name]* _has been released. You have to update to this version to continue using the app._“
** Button: 
*** iOS: Open App Store.
*** Android: Open Google Play Store.
* When user haven’t logged in yet, the pop-up should be displayed when:
** User try to login.
** User sign up a new account (at the first step).
* When user is using the app, the pop-up should be displayed when they are doing something in the app.
* User cannot close the pop-up. They have only 1 option that is updating the version as required.
column30: [~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] Please help to review message for this popup;[~accountid:557058:a2d26b97-07cd-4a63-951d-795f3b39eac1] We’re missing ticket for BE to return new version name. And BE have to check API sign up have verify version app, yet?  API sign up: {{v1/accounts/signup}};[~accountid:5ba0c8f730b9c50ea5b9798e] I don’t think that we need to wait for user submit the signup form with full data input. We should check it when user move to signup first screen. I think we should have new API to get the version. How is it working with login right now?;[~accountid:557058:a2d26b97-07cd-4a63-951d-795f3b39eac1] User login will receive response with statusCode app_version_is_invalid. I don’t think we need new API only for get the version. We can check version in another API of flow sign up like checkPhoneEmailExist;[~accountid:5ba0c8f730b9c50ea5b9798e] It’s great. So we can do this ticket without any support from BE team, correct?;[~accountid:557058:a2d26b97-07cd-4a63-951d-795f3b39eac1] Above we are just talking about register flow. We still lack a *version name* to display when we show the force update dialog, and BE need to return it.;[~accountid:5ba0c8f730b9c50ea5b9798e] Do we release the new app with this feature?;[~accountid:557058:a2d26b97-07cd-4a63-951d-795f3b39eac1] My ticket has been in QA testing for a long time. [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-636|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-636|smart-link]

column3: VisiPay - Reserve Accounts - Display Crypto Accounts
column4:
As a Visipay admin, I want to monitor all Visipay’s Crypto reserve accounts with balances.

There is a new left menu which is called "Crypto Wallets". In that function, there are three (3) tabs that are showing the list of reverse accounts and balances which are retrieved from Crypto Server: 

BTC - 15zckzjK2penH2TfnBUBbG2FnKtGyqvFbt

ETH - \['0x9c5d1347Ed8f97E557555640558f0f304Ee82F88','0xf401420EB759b1f828b22d7f5d1Eda0330afEf18','0x1EDDA559ef4c6740D6A0CD82cfD5f72661a703E8','0xd6EA59250e1B426a69c225bd6609148116F4775E']
ETH MASTER - 0xF3318a3875e96Ae32cC55a029A460b63caA94701

KARD - \['0xf0aC46ef659871Db5BbfE364a2A00AA8C29EF700','0x7337EFa8A34cDEeCc2a7470e7F1De68b11850270','0x0bEC650800672F766Cce2D8131B7e8546CF8D208','0x6212E308B60b5bB489702c7A4146E2edFEbf469c','0xA04FC6fd5195BA0a eF42C7e22622733BBe8Cc9FF']

KARD MASTER - 0x512D31aaA5A4962e96F93aFbC5550B36243De2D0

ZVC - \['0x3e8A415b9657C2382dF03aF21da32fD390D1c606','0xcADb15696D031A0F7d57d7949daC919cbE9d7F00','0x5B370A558BFd14AEBCA3520B96b96aB55A60BD6a','0xaE17a718a494E54438854fbf4Cab15c112bCA359','0x8F708b7C39c3C6125 8C53DFa6F5cB290157FF6FE']

ZVC MASTER - 0x03ba17CE15825f3094Acc0Fc748AEB4687092516

*Important Note*: 

* All Crypto addresses are stored at VisiPay’s database for effective maintenance.
* Crypto balance will have X digits in decimal (follow the config from Visipay)
* We can setup a minimum threshold for each reserve account. If the reserve account balance goes below that amount, the account should be automatically funded to a specified threshold (UI will be updated later)
* Each 20 min we will check the balance with the threshold then fund to reserved account if the balance is under the threshold
** See updated API document with the new endpoint {{'api/admin/fund_reserve'}} to fund reserve accounts.
** When you call the endpoint, the account is funded from the master account. ETH MASTER, ZVC MASTER or KARD MASTER
* Admin can add/edit/remove the reserved accounts
* We should also display the balances of ETH MASTER, ZVC MASTER or KARD MASTER in Visipay
* Allow user to config the amount of auto funding for each address

[^Visipay Cryptocurrency API_v_1.0.2.pdf]

column3: Web Apps - Wallet PIN - Change and Forgot
column4:
As a customer I want to be able to change and forgot my wallet PIN that I enter when registering new account with the platform on the mobile and web app.

* After signing the app successfully, I have a menu to update my current PIN.
** I can only enter 4 digits for new PIN.
** Refer to UI of this feature on Kanoo app as the feature is the same.
** *Error Messages* 
*** Invalid current PIN: Current PIN is incorrect.
** I can use new PIN after the system informs to save it successfully.
* After signing the app successfully, I have a menu to forgot my PIN if I don’t remember my current PIN for some reason.
** I expect to be able to forgot my PIN through ether email address like Kanoo app.
** Format of email address must be validated as a standard in the system.
*** Email format is invalid: Email address has invalid format.
*** Email does not exist: Email address has not registered with the platform yet.
** I will receive an email with a verification code to enter into the next step if my email address is active.
** I will end verification code received in email to process to next step to enter new PIN.
** I can use new PIN after the system informs to save it successfully.

column3: Web Apps - daVinci MasterCard - View Detail with PIN
column4:
As a customer  I want to be able to view the detail of mastercard in my wallet in case I lose it for some reason.

# I sign in the app/web.
# I open an existing mastercard from my wallet and select View Info button.
# I must enter PIN that I set when registering my account to be able to view all details of mastercard including full card number and CVV.
# If I enter a correct PIN, I can see the details. Otherwise, the system will show error message “You provide an invalid PIN.“ at MasterCard detail screen.
# Not allow customers to copy any information from the MasterCard detail.

Noted: PIN is the wallet PIN not a master card PIN

column3: Create GoldZ Product
column4:
Create this new HYT GoldZ package on HYT Website with the flow and specifications:
1) User will buy this new package at $250, and $7 monthly fee. This new GoldZ is located next to the Gold (attached package and design).
2) After bought that package, user will:
    a) Receive 1000 ZVC (Internal ZevenCoin Card) immediately. Note: Add new row “ZevenCoin Package”: 1000 ZVC.
    b) Only earn 20% for Direct Bonus (10% for themselves while 10% for the sponsor).

3) Upgrading pathways:

     a) Silver → GoldZ.

    b) GoldZ → Hytapper.

Note: Attached are these package’s images:

# Metal.
# HYTAPPER.
# GoldZ.

column3: User role - Accessibility without KYC verified
column4:
As a logged-in user who hasn't verified KYC yet.  After entering valid credentials, user can access to insider pages with left menu:
1) Dashboard.
2) Member Accounts.
3) Genealogy.
4) Products:  click on the "Select Plan" buttons, then show a message "Please get KYC verified to use this feature." and "Get KYC Verified" button.  Once user clicks on "Get KYC Verified" button, user will be re-directed to the KYC Procedure page.
5) Transactions.
6) Commissions.
7) Account:
    a. Account Information: 
        1. Everything is the same,
        2. Except the "Billing Information" tab will show a message "Please get KYC verified to use this feature." and "Get KYC Verified" button.  Once user clicks on "Get KYC Verified" button, user will be re-directed to the KYC Procedure page.
    b. Payment:
       1. Hide the "Payment Method" tab and Kash HYT Card/Information.
       2. Show a message "Please get KYC verified to use this feature." and "Get KYC Verified" button.  Once user clicks on "Get KYC Verified" button, user will be re-directed to the KYC Procedure page.

8 ) Invite - Follow up.

column3: ARM Campaign - Konnect Category for Video
column4:
As I merchant I want to be able to create a konnect category to upload videos to show them to customer on store detail of consumer apps.

* Keep the current way of saving video files and we will enhance later to make this issue fixed quickly.
* Video library for the consumer apps to use will not changed in the scope of this update.
column30:
c [~accountid:557058:7a9d9191-dd75-4672-98d1-725766bcd349] the old way is we’re calling directly from the javascript to media service to convert the video without any authentication. I think that’s not the good way because if someone see this api they can upload anything that they want to our system. The root cause of error is we secured the request from ARM to core to make sure it’s internally. There are 2 options here:

* Keep the old way and take risk (as I mentioned above)
* Hide the video uploading for now and implement other way (javascript → ARM → media)

Please let me know your thought
